Summary: 5 day stay and house keeping only cleaned room 1 day despite calling front desk to confirm everyday.  Rooms need updating. Mattresses very uncomfortable and stains on the carpet.  Smallest bathrooms I've ever seen at any embassy suite.  Very poor lighting in both rooms.  If you go for breakfest be advised they are strict on end time.  They start closing down promptly at 9am despite people still trying to get food.  Felt bad for a lot of the guests was almost embarrassing how they had to grab food or utensils as workers were taking everything away.  Mentioned this to front desk and they just said they were very strict on end time which seems like a poor way to treat guests.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your valuable feedback.  We are very sorry to hear about the disappointments you experienced and we will address your concerns with the appropriate personnel.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to provide you with the outstanding service you deserve the next time you have lodging needs in the area.

Summary: We were quite happy with our stay at this Embassy Suites over presidents day weekend. The room was comfortable and clean, and looked like it had recently been renovated. Everything worked. The common areas all seemed very nice, and also appear to have undergone a recent renovation. We didn't use it but there's a very nice indoor pool. Free breakfast was a plus as well. If you're looking for a reasonably priced two room suite in the area, it seems hard to beat this place.
Manager Response: Hi Victorjw,   Thank you so much for taking the time to tell us about your wonderful experience with us. We are so encouraged to always do good for our guests.  Thank you for your compliments on our staff, hospitality, and breakfast. Our ultimate ambition is to provide a five-star experience, and we are thrilled to learn that we have succeeded. I am glad that we were able to meet your expectations of service and accommodations and we're all looking forward to your next visit!

Summary: We were lied to about the hotel not having any luggage carts at all - they have three for guest use but they are not always available. Bathroom was dirty in our room. Fridge did not work in our room. Graffiti scratched into elevator glass.
Manager Response: We are truly sorry to hear about your unsatisfactory experience.  We strive to provide outstanding service for our guests and it appears we feel short of that goal this time.  We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back the next time you have lodging needs in the area.  Thanks for your feedback!

Summary Heading: Freezing cold and they don't care

At the prices they charge for a room I should not have to sit in a parka. As a Diamond member I wasn't offered any waters nor was my complaint about the room temperature taken seriously. NEVER staying in another Embassy Suites again, certainly not this one.
Room tip: Choose a hotel that's less Siberia like

The armoire was slightly pulled away the wall, enough to prompt me to look behind it and saw an old towel. The bathroom is quite and the shower curtain disgustingly dirty. Summary: Has seen better days. Poor service, nobody answers if you attempt to call the front desk. Right off the highway and extremely LOUD. Seems quite dated. One elevator inoperable.   On the plus side, the breakfast is good!  My kid enjoyed the pool.

Adam at the front desk was outstanding; if he's not the manager, he should be. He helped us with everything that was within his control.

The breakfast was good enough, staff's communication was also good.  I thought it was a problem of management.

On top of that, I had a gift card and they had me swipe it, etc. at the front desk, then just billed the whole thing to my card and did not apply the funds from the Hilton Gift Card I gave them. After 15 minutes I called back and said I would take the room for the night since I was tired and would change it the next day if possible.

Very pleasant staff - easy on/off to highway - and good value for the overnight.

Summary: We are devoted Hilton fans but were underwhelmed by our recent stay at the Embassy Suites in Santa Ana. (1) The bathroom fan could not be turned off.  We were told the fan could not be turned off by us.  Engineering could turn it off for the stay but then we would have to deal with the humidity after showers.  We were told the fans were forced on to avoid mold because the hotel had had mold in the past. (2) The heat in the room was overbearing and could not be adjusted - it was like a sauna.  We were told we could have the heat turned off complete but it could not be turned down.  As a result, we had to leave the door wall open to be able to bear the heat in the room.  We turned the thermostat off in the room but it did not help. (3) When we had issues with getting bath towels
Manager Response: Dear sschanta,   Thank you for taking the time to share your candid and detailed review. This is excellent as it provides us with vivid insight and specific points our team can work to tweak and better for an overall improved guest experience. It truly disappoints us to hear your stay did not go as smoothly as we had intended. We only want the best for our valued guests and members, and clearly we missed the mark this time. We've shared the key points you highlighted with our team to use as training tools and step up our service delivery. We will continue to focus our efforts, and we hope the next time you are in the area you will allow us a second chance to deliver the stay you deserve.

Summary Heading: Terrible hotel, clueless front desk, inept manager
Summary: Horrible, terrible stay. Mold in the bathroom, window was drafty so cold air kept blowing into the master bedroom all night. Safe was never unlocked, so we couldn‚Äôt utilize it. Phone wasn‚Äôt plugged in, had no wires. Room was not vacuumed, paper was left on the floor, trash was left in the room. I told the front desk not to send anyone up to the room to fix issues; we were going down for a nap, but engineering knocked once then came into the room!! My mother-in-law wasn‚Äôt dressed! I said no, they had 6 hours to fix the issues and chose not too! So many problems and the staff kept promising to get a resolution and call me back, but never did. I guess I was too difficult, so I was passed on to Blake, since nobody else can make decisions. Blake was supposed to call me and let me

Summary: I usually go on vacations pretty often and when I do, I always choose Embassy Suites. You just can‚Äôt go wrong! Great breakfast, great WiFi, amazing staff and beautiful interior to top it off. I will always be sure to use this hotel whenever I travel!
Manager Response: none

Summary: the room are dirty, no running hot water, hair is all over the floor, breakfast area so dirty, i stayed three nights and only went there the first morning.  there are lack of service anywhere you look.
Manager Response: Dear jianl2017,  Thank you for providing your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We do apologize for these issues. Summary Heading: Do not stay at this embassy suites
Summary: The room was dirty with water damage, ac didn‚Äôt work, bathroom fan didn‚Äôt turn off and rattled, tub was filthy.  Had to move to another hotel at 10pm with my family and all of our stuff.  Tried to talk with Hilton to resolve and they gave us runaround

Summary: Terrible customer service- no housekeeping one night, no towels left for 2 days. Had to make several requests and still did not receive them. We had a leak in our room and we could not move rooms. Our carpet was soaked and it smelled really bad. Couldn't wait to checkout!

Summary: This Embassy Suites need to renovate all the rooms.  My room had a bad smell of old carpets and the bathroom was very old and not quite clean.  The bad smell and air in the room made us sick after 2 days and 2 nights.  We should have asked for a different room.  The water jug on the table in the lobby was never filled for guests.  Will never stay at this one again.
Manager Response: Dear Plant4AnhB,  Thank you for your review. We‚Äôre sorry we didn‚Äôt provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. Your feedback is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. If you return to our area, we hope you‚Äôll stay with us again.

Summary: 3 years of diamond status with Hilton, single worst hotel I've EVER stayed in. If it wasn't for free breakfast I'd nearly choose the closest hourly rate hotel over this Embassy.  Where to start...22$ a day to park, for what? I had to call for circuit breakers in the room to be flipped upon checking in. You can't set the temperature in the room because it's in neutral mode due to it being 75 and under outside (my room got up to 78* at one point). Instead of fixing problems in the rooms things are painted over. Phone cords and cables are hanging in the room. The room door connecting bedroom to common space is falling apart. Leak from above floor... Painted over. The back sliding door has either rust or mold on the edges of it. The air was so dry that night my son got a bloody nose

Summary: Water leaking from ceiling in room, fridge did not work, no one ever showed up to check on reported problems. Parking was difficult for full sized SUV and cost extra $$. Breakfast was just OK Checked out early and went to a different hotel.
Manager Response: Dear evansmatthew2019,  Thank you for your review. We‚Äôre sorry we didn‚Äôt provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. Summary Heading: Great Potential But Very Poor Housekeeping
Summary: This large property has great potential with its caring, professional staff (including, but not limited to April, Amy, Alex, Angela, Macri and Blake), great location that is central to Disneyland and the beach cities, and a cook-to-order breakfast.  Unfortunately, management has elected to comp rooms rather than hire enough employees to clean them or provide towels on a consistent basis.  In addition, the lobby restrooms are not maintained (no toilet paper, no towels and garbage strewn on the floor) consistently.
Manager Response: Dear Larry D,   Thank you for taking the time to share your candid review. We're elated to hear of your fondness for our hotel, however we would be amiss if we did not express our severe disappointment your stay was not the flawless experience we intended. We've shared your experience with our team and have committed to be more vigilant with our housekeeping standards. We welcome you to return next time you are in the area to see our improvements and receive the level of hospitality you deserve.

Summary: This was actually the worst hotel stay I‚Äôve ever had. I checked in around 6:30pm. I called down around 8pm to ask if they were doing construction on the 3 rd floor (I was staying in 320) There was banging and hammering going on. The front desk said they would investigate and call back. They never called back. Me and a couple other guest came out to the hallway to try to figure out what it was ( still no clue) but it eventually stopped at 9 ish.   At 1:00am I get jolted up out of my sleep by yelling and loud noises coming from the room next to me. I went downstairs to let the front desk know. They let me know that 318 the room next to me just checked in so they‚Äôre probably just getting settled . No they were making so much noise ! I go back upstairs and they are still going crazy
Manager Response: Dear Templeluvsyew,  Thank you for taking time to review your stay. We sincerely apologize for the noise issues encountered. Our guests‚Äô comfort is the number one concern. Summary: They will overcharge you not care to fix it when you call.  Make sure to use an AMEX so they can charge it all back.  I called the hotel I ask for the GM they told me it was a restaurant problem I called the restaurant and ask for the manager they told me the manager was not in. There was nothing I could do to solve the problem. No one wanted to try to help.
Manager Response: Dear johnrW166RJ,  Thank you for providing feedback on your recent visit to Santa Ana, though I am distressed to hear we have not resolved your billing concern. Summary: We are currently staying at this hotel.  We are in our third room since checking in tonight.  The first room, the bathroom was flooded. Back we went to front desk again, got our third room of the night.  We gave it a quick look and left for drink and dinner.  Upon our return, we realized that the carpet to the outside balcony is soaking wet.  Since we do not see ceiling leak we can only speculate that the rain earlier somehow managed to get in through the balcony doors.    At this point, we are tired and since we can access our bed from one side without getting our feet wet; we are just going to call it a night and try to get
Manager Response: Dear screenlin,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. Summary: I would have given it a two, but the fact that the hotel never answered my email earned them a one!   All looks good from the outside and the lobby is nice too, but sadly that's about it! The elevator floor was littered with crumbs and the general cleanliness of the conveyance was questionable, including the dirty windows.  The room was poorly appointed, and not very clean with various pieces of furniture showing several fingerprints. Also, there was no alarm clock, and one of the nightstands was missing a lamp altogether. Adding a chair at the desk in the bedroom would be very useful too! Further, various electric/telephone outlets are no longer attached to the wall and they are simply laying on the floor.  This was somewhat offset by the friendly staff both at the front desk

Summary: I was mostly looking for a good night's sleep and a good breakfast. My suite was clean and comfortable and I had a good night's sleep. The omlet prepared for me at breakfast was great but most other hot food items were not avaible as containers were empty. I was unaware that this property charges $22 per day for guest parking.
Manager Response: none

Summary: First, we booked and paid extra for a premium suite with upgraded amenities. We were assigned a standard room without the advertised amenities. It was only a few $$ more, but they should provide what's advertised.   I couldn't get the digital key till late evening.   We think we left an item in the room, but they will not tell you if they have it or not. I had to go to a website and leave my details, hoping they might get back with us in a day or two. Gone are the days when a hotel might want to help guests.   Overall, not a great experience and would think twice about booking this property, which is too bad as the room was quite nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was hot and even though air was running temperature never went below 69 (and that was only for a few minutes) I mentioned at front desk and they said they would have it checked (never happened).  Called front desk and the recommendation was that I shut off the system completely and maybe open slider.  (That would be great if the room wasn‚Äôt over the highway). Lobby was nicely renovated, but room was average. Very disappointed overall

Summary Heading: NOT and no way to fix it.
Summary: Disappointing and HOT! Coming back to your hotel room at 10pm to find it 80 degrees and NO AC :( This hotel switches to heat mode ONLY when it's comfortable (60) outside. You can't even run just the fan. Even though the common areas are cooled you can not cool your room. Seriously?! I've stayed in so many Hilton properties and this is the first time I've ever been unable to cool my room. Today they must have decided it was OK to NEVER ALLOW AC because the room was 80+ all day and there was no AC available.  I STRONGLY recommend you find another place to stay.  Other than being uncomfortable, it was clean and well kept...but I won't be back.

Summary: This hotel is beautiful from the outside and the lobby is gorgeous. The rooms, however, are disastrous and unsafe. When we called the front desk to let them know, they said it happens all the time, has been that way for years and there was nothing they could or were prepared to do about it. They could bring us towels for the floor or switch us rooms. We chose to switch rooms and they said they would credit us 10,000 points for the hassle. We thought that was nice. Summary: Mary at the front desk when we checked in was a superb example of not only professionalism but of personal concern for my wife and I.  All Hilton Honors issues were ready for us.  Morning complimentary breakfast was really good.

Summary: A very good older property with some upgrades,.Good value in spite  of the parking cost.  The morning breakfast was easily worth the parking cost. Summary Heading: Ok compared to other Embassy Suites
Summary: Stayed for a night before an early AM flight back home.  The bed was comfortable and room was clean - which are most important.  Did not like the heat/air restrictions - it was 74+ in the room and AC is regulated - for the price we pay - should be able to make it cooler in my room in December without having to open the sliding door in the rain.  Staff wasn‚Äôt the friendliest - the driver to the airport, however, she was very friendly.  I didn‚Äôt have time for the breakfast, but did try their evening get together - it was not up to par compared to other embassy suites I stay at.  Overall, if you aren‚Äôt parking, and are staying for a night of sleep before flying - it is good.
Manager Response: Dear erik f,   Thank you for taking the time to share your review. We are in the business of comfort, so we are no stranger to the vital role this plays in your travel choices. It truly disappoints us to hear a comfortable temperature for your room was not achieved during your stay, and we hope you accept our humblest apologies. We will keep your insight in mind when we look to make improvements on our room quality and be sure to have maintenance follow up on the thermostat issue to prevent recurrence. The next time you stay with us, we aim to deliver a much more rewarding and restful sleep.

Summary Heading: Great value if you can take the heat!
Summary: Pros:  Nice room, great service, good happy hour, and awesome breakfast.  Cons:  Room too hot (cooling system doesn't work in December), bartender chintzy with the drinks, and bathroom door had holes in it.
Manager Response: Dear Frogsie57,   Thank you for sharing your review. Thank you again for your candor, and we hope the next time you visit the area, you'll consider staying with us again.

Summary: Lovely hotel but parking fee of $22/day was exorbitant. Requests to have locked safe (from previous occupants) fell on deaf ears, despite promise of help. Breakfast excellent. Well-located near highway access.
Manager Response: none

Summary: my family would love it more if there was connecting rooms but other than that we love  staying here special thank you to the breakfast crew, the security guard and the valet parking attendants super happy and best thanksgiving time there ever
Manager Response: none

Summary: Backed up tub with gross hair.  Dirty towel on rack.  Requested an extra blanket which never showed up.  Called again and promised, but never showed up.  Advertised free parking, but parking was $22.  Won't stay at this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Dear clovis786,  We appreciate your review of your recent stay at our hotel and we are very sorry that you had a disappointing stay with us, and experienced a poor level of service. Summary: This unfortunately was one of the times Embassy Suites has let me down.   The bathroom was not cleaned very well and the forgot to service the room the second day we there and the room smelled.  Overall a bad experience.
Manager Response: Dear sayshum,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your recent visit to the area. Summary: Stay started with no heat or air in room. Had to sleep with balcony door open for 3 nights with traffic noise and outdoor lights shining into my room to keep below 75 degrees. When I asked the front desk about it, the first day they told me they would send someone up (never did), the next morning the same story. As I was leaving for the day, I stopped by the desk to tell them I wasn't sticking around waiting for someone and the front desk said that engineering said there is nothing they could do and thats why no one came. Come to find out the system wasn't broke like they originally told me, it was turned off for the entire hotel. The last day, someone threw up in the elevator and it was left there for hours without shutting down the elevator, cleaning it or at the very least,
Manager Response: Dear NorthStar53076787641,  Thank you for taking time to review your experience with us. Summary: After reading recent reviews, I was hesitant to book my business meetings here, but the hotel was perfect. Front desk staff were not engaged, but everyone else was great to work with. My room was clean with no issues, the meeting space was set-up perfectly and the catering staff and breakfast staff were amazing!

Summary: Our house was getting tented for termites. Had to stay locally.  The staff is awesome, breakfast is fantastic, room size great.  Could use better upkeep of the rooms.  Paint coming off walls and shower rail hanging off half way because of rust damage.  Rooms could be cleaner.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent Service by Hotel Valet Staff
Summary: Overall great experience at the hotel, especially by Yosef who drove me to the airport when I was running late for my trip. I called my Lyft later than I should have, and he instantly offered to get me there. Hotel staff is very friendly and accommodating and willing to go above-and-beyond for guests.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have often stayed here over the past 10  years or so when I am in the area on business.  The entire hotel has been remodeled and updated and the breakfast service is included.  I don't think the quality can be beat for the price.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Choose another Embassy Suites in the area.  There are plenty to choose from.
Summary: Great valet and breakfast staff.  Check in was pleasant and then I got to my room.  The smell of pesticides overtook me along with the heat in the room.  I noticed that the shower was leaking and the lamp was broken.  I dropped off my stuff, went to the front desk and requested service on the above items plus 3 towels and a blanket.    I returned to the hotel 9 hours later and nothing had changed.  I called down to the front desk and was told that I would be called back.  I waited 10 minutes and nothing.  Called again and was told that nothing could be done.  I then went downstairs and talked to a supervisor.  He told me the hotel was sold out but he would send up towels, blanket and air freshener.   I waited 45 minutes and the items never showed up.    The following morning I
Manager Response: Dear 937allisonh,  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience at our property. The experience you had is unacceptable and rest assured, it will be handled and made right. Thank you, again, for alerting us to these issues.

Summary: Hilton brand hotels are my go to and to have the worst experience at this location was disappointing to say the least. Stayed here for 3 nights/4 days with my family. Experience upon check-in was totally disappointing, didn't receive any kind of information about the hotel, I had to ask questions re. parking, room, etc. At one point the agent who checked us in was chatting on the phone with someone else about their dog. Our suite did not receive housekeeping after informing the front desk two times, ran out of clean towels, toilet paper, kleenex on the second day. Had to inform the front desk again. Not sure what management is doing about the terrible experience at this location but they need to do something fast.

Summary: Did not tell us construction would be going on during are stay. Manager did not care about me wanting to relax. He was no help . His explanation was yes we are having construction nothing I could do for you except give me one day of free parking didn‚Äôt care about parking. We wanted to relax all day and sleep and watch tv . Could here the TV in our room

Summary Heading: Not as good as most Embassy Suites
Summary: Last night of a 6 night conference with 3 ladies staying in one room.  We picked the Embassy Suites because of the 2 room layout and extra sink in the kitchen area - it always helps when you have several girls all trying to get ready.  This was standard Embassy Suites layout, huge central area with restaurant / bar and seating and room in 8-10 floors overlooking that atrium.  The room was more run down that other embassy suites I have been to, a hole in the bathroom door, dingy furnishings - but it was functional and comfortable.  Slept well in the beds.  The evening reception happy hour was included in the rate and had minimal snacks and drinks for 2 hours.  My drink was pretty tasty but I can not remember what it was called - it was green!  Morning breakfast was hot made to
Manager Response: Dear WeAlwaysWAnder,  Thank you for sharing this invaluable insight into your recent visit. We strive to ensure your every need is met, but it seems we can do better. Please know our team is reviewing your comments as a way to better serve you and other guests going forward. We hope to regain your trust whenever your travels bring you back to Santa Ana.

Summary: Spent three nights with the family here.  Ishan ensured our stay was a 10/10.  The service was above and beyond.  Great breakfast, large rooms, secure parking, and great location.  This will be our permanent So Cal destination.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If the noisy, stuffy rooms don't deter you and you don't fall in the shower because the grab bar is not secure, then you may have housekeeping banging on your doir delivering things you didn't order.  After you enjoy a nice breakfast, you can wrestle with the ridiculous parking contraption to exit the lot.  No thanks!

Summary: All staff where so friendly and knowledgeable . The room was clean and beds super comfortable. The restaurant was delicous as was the evening reception & complimentary breakfast. Parking is limited and tight . Overall enjoyed our stay !
Manager Response: none

Summary: I picked this hotel as I love their made to order breakfast.  I visited for my 40th birthday weekend, this was a mistake.  Air conditioner didnt work, they had to bring me a fan. My license plate was stolen when I let the valet park my car, I had hair in my food I ordered for room service and they brought the wrong food, the bathroom door jam was broke, once maintenance came to fix, it no longer closed all the way or locked.  I had a two year old with me - being able to lock bathroom doors is IMPORTANT with a two year old, parking was horrible, room needed work...
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us! Improving our guest experience is a priority for us and it seems we fell short in more than one occasion during your stay. I'm so sorry we had such an impact on your family's time together. Please reach out to Blake or Peter at 714 241 3800 as we would like to Make it Right!

Summary: The staff at this property are very nice and helpful! It was clean as well. However, parking is $22-26 a night, you can't adjust the temp in your room (air conditioning is on 24/7), and the bathrooms need updating.
Manager Response: Thank you for your sharing your experience with us! The team will be happy to hear the acknowledgement of their efforts. My apologies that we fell short in regards to the room condition and comfort. Please reach out to at 714 241 3800 and ask for Peter or Blake as we would like to Make it Right for you.

Summary Heading: Avoid - traffic noise, old rooms, and over cooked food
Summary: After staying at many hotels any several Embassy Suites, I was disappointed with this site.  The rooms are outdated and exposed to loud traffic noise.   On a positive note the hotel staff try too make the best of the location around highways and the facility age, which is reflectected is the bargain prices. Another positive is the free happy hour.  Bottom line is, you get a hotel for rest, which isn't possible here given the highway traffic noise that is especially bad!
Manager Response: Our team will be happy to know that the staff service was helpful. My apologies that there were challenges with noise and room condition. Should you choose to stay with us again in the future, we do encourage the selection of your room through our Hilton Mobile App as a possible solution. That said, I want to be sure that you feel valued for the time you spent with us. Please call me at 714-241-3800 and ask for Peter or Blake as we would like to Make it Right.

Summary: I was over charged. I was charged for parking even though I did not have a vehicle. At checked out I asked to have it removed. I was assured it would be taken care of. It wasn‚Äôt. Got an email of the bill. Called back same day. Week later no refund. Called back 2 more times and send messages via the app. I had to message corporate Hilton today to get this resolved.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience. My humble apologies regarding the delay in billing issues, as this certainly isn't the level of service we are looking to offer. Please call 714-241-3800 and ask for Peter or Blake, as we'd like to Make it Right!

Summary: I was very satisfied felt like I was at home with my visit I would recommend this Hotel to any of my family and friends front desks was very helpful and friendly very professional. I have no bad experience.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice property. Well-maintained and every staff member was polite, professional, and accommodating. Easy access to freeway and John Wayne/Orange County Airport. The hotel is undergoing remodeling at this time, although you'd barely notice it. Filling hot breakfast each morning. Just get there early to avoid the long line for omelets. Only drawback was parking is a bit on the pricey side.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Easy access and convenient location to interstate and airport.  Friendly staff.  Updated reception and dining area with pleasant bar offering happy hour for guests.  Rooms are a bit dated but spacious and comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay was pleasant and very relaxing. The breakfast was good and the housekeeping was very efficient. The only thing is I think I didn't get the patio that was requested on booking but otherwise we had a good time with my family. I would stay with you again. Thank you for your good service.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I wanna thank Alex for being Great at what she does, even though it looked like the hotel was going through some technician difficulties she still had a smile on her face making sure we were taken care of! Will definitely visit this location again thank you embassy suites for having such great staff like Alex
Manager Response: none

Summary: The first room was dirty. toilet ran all night. Just old. Second room smelled so bad we could not stay in it. Third room was fine. Just wondered why it took three rooms to get one right. I will not be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear securescreenings2019,  Thank you for your review. We‚Äôre sorry we didn‚Äôt provide the quality of amenities you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the issues encountered in each suite, and we are working with our team to correct the problems and avoid recurrence going forward. Your feedback is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. If you return to our area, we hope you‚Äôll stay with us again.

Summary: Stayed here for business and I experienced some of the best customer service ever from Alejandra at the front desk. She made me feel welcome and had a wonderful attitude and demeanor. That first impression goes a long way and as someone who stays in many hotels throughout the year I can appreciate that. The hotel is lucky to have her! The property itself is great as well although the paid parking seems unnecessary considering its location.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Reserved three  rooms for three couples. 2 of 3 rooms had plumbing issues. 2 of 3 rooms had AC issues. 1 room's smoke detector chirrped all night. Maintenance response time to address issues was poor. Parking is poor.
Manager Response: Dear Robert_C_Robert_C,  We appreciate your review of your recent stay at our hotel and are very sorry you had a disappointing experience with us. We‚Äôve addressed the issues you described with our maintenance staff to avoid recurrence going forward. Exceptional guest service is the foundation of our hotel's promise, and your feedback helps us improve. Thank you once again for your comments.

Summary: I've stayed at other Embassy Suites & this was my worst experience. Check-in was fine but once in room noticed puddle at threshold of bathroom. Felt water drip on head, looked up, realized AC vent was dripping & carpet was saturated. Called downstairs & got another room. Upon entry to new room it was HOT! Could not get AC to work. Called downstairs several times & were told someone was on their way.  Finally someone showed up with a fan. AC started working by 2nd day. Bathtub faucet dripped constantly & tub wouldn‚Äôt drain so ended up standing in several inches of water when taking shower. Was sitting on couch & noticed evidence on ceiling of a large leak that had been repaired. Next day we found out from co-worker who was also staying there, that she woke up in the night to the
Manager Response: Dear cathysP9196ZG,  We apologize you weren‚Äôt provided with the quality of amenities and service you expect and deserve from Hilton during your recent stay. We are very sorry for the issues in your room and are working with our maintenance team to ensure this is not recurring going forward. If you return to our area, we hope you will consider staying with us again.

Summary: Paid parking make sure you're aware of this. The hotel has great friendly helpful staff although happy hour not so happy especially when you go back the second time for another drink.  Avoid the room service as uber eats would be a better decision simply due to the fact that they automatically charge 18% plus delivery 2%. The complimentary internet is good enough to get your office emails and browsing done efficiently.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was clean and comfortable, the staff was friendly and accommodating and the breakfast was great! Will stay here again.  The treadmill on the right sounded like it was breaking down, might want to check that out.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Expect much better from Embassy Suites
Summary: This hotel is badly in need of an upgrade. The interior lobby and breakfast area was nice, but our room was simply gross. Bedsheets were stained in multiple places, the sink bowl was broken and stained, bedding for the sofa bed was missing (and we got exasperated attitude from staff when we called to ask for it as if we hadn't already checked), and the safety bar in the shower was not secured at one end (so actually less safe than having no bar at all).  We stayed two nights and our room was not serviced at all during our stay, which is gross, especially when we were hoping to have our stained linens changed out for clean.  Parking is difficult within the lot. Even if you can find a spot the lot is extremely difficult to navigate.  The lobby and breakfast area was nice and the
Manager Response: Dear Matthew P,  Thank you for sharing your stay with us on Trip Advisor. We understand guest suite presentation was a concern, as it is for us as well. Our location is scheduled for renovation within the next few years, although the exact date has not yet been set. I do hope that the next time your travels bring you to the area you will stay with us and provide feedback about our new suites; we would love to have you.

Summary: Alejendra was absolute best , check  in was fast and she was sweet made sure I was happy with my service which I was  rooms were great we had balcony and a separate room for our son that work out perfectly and breakfast was included .
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: In need of renovation. W side
Summary: The bedroom suite was severely bowed in the middle, all of the furniture tilted toward the center.  The bathtub did not drain at all. Showered in 6 inches of standing water. Finally there was dried vomit n the bed skirt n the window side f the bed.
Manager Response: Dear LawrenceS873,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback on your recent stay with us. We're very sorry to hear you experienced an undesirable stay due to maintenance and housekeeping issues. We assure you that this is not typical of our hotel, and we have addressed the problems you mentioned with our front desk and engineering staff. We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you in the future.

Summary Heading: Nice lobby, but the rooms need to be maintained better.
Summary: The lobby and food/bar service were very good, and the front desk staff were very helpful. However, several of our group had problems with the overall maintenance and condition of the rooms - the hotel doesn't seem to make basic repairs before guests check into a room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel has been undergoing renovations.  We've used it several times in the past because of the location and room size.  It's improving but very slowly.  Positives: The complimentary night snacks/drinks are very nice.  The breakfast is very good and has a wide variety of food items to choose from.  Negatives: The room air quality is very musty and bothered me the whole time.  Be warned of the cleaniness in the pool area.  Both of these need to be improved.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your feedback about your experience during your time with us. Our food and beverage team will be happy to hear your compliments regarding their service. I do want to apologize that we fell short on the room condition. Please give us a call at 714 - 241 - 3800 and ask for Peter or Blake, as we would like to Make it Right for you!

Summary Heading: Embassy Suite Santa Ana Orange County Airport
Summary: The hotel had been re-model since I was here couple years ago; the bathroom is smaller now and the tile color on the bathroom floor is not an attractive color at all.  Room is spacious and it is two-rooms suite.  Make-to-order breakfast and Happy Hours Reception were great...the best of all the hotels I stayed so far; parking now is $22 a day not free anymore.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay. Our team at the reception and breakfast will be happy to hear the wonderful remarks regarding their service. Thank you so much for sharing! My apologies that combination of our restroom sizes and the parking charges impacted your time with us. We do continue to try to stay competitively priced in the concern, but will take note to continue to improve our services. Please reach out to us at 714 241 3800 and ask for Peter or Blake, as we would like to Make it Right for you!

Summary: , Food was good, check in was awesome, room cleaning was a bit off, untimely and sporadic. Parking was a bit tight and the valet was not the best. Small valet area for cars. I will go there over and over again. I like the easy access to the wild La freeways. Weather was great and night scenes was good too.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Tustin is a QUICK turn to the left
Summary: Super quick drive to Disneyland. And immediately close to a Massive shopping center INCLUDING COSTCO GAS and great restaurants. Turn left on Dyer to Tustin! Great made to order Omelets and a relaxing/welcoming managers reception with complimentary beer and wine and appetizers
Manager Response: none

Summary: Recently stayed here for a family trip and it was exactly what I hoped it would be. Especially enjoyed the pool since we don‚Äôt have one back home and the weather was perfect! Alejandra at the front desk made check in easy and delightful! She has such a welcoming attitude and made our stay that much better! Will definitely stay here next time we‚Äôre in town.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great potential, however, the cleanliness of the entire site, both in and out requires attention. Strong urine smell in the parking lot, presumably from the homeless should have been a tip-off. Restaurant sticky and smelly. Dishes on the floor in the hotel not pleasant to look at and things did not work like digital key, TV.
Manager Response: Dear nickQ9903DN,  Thank you for your review. We‚Äôre sorry we didn‚Äôt provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the issues encountered, and we are working with our team to correct the problems and avoid recurrence going forward. Your feedback is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. If you return to our area, we hope you‚Äôll stay with us again.

Summary: I texted this hotel prior to arriving asking for a Diamond upgrade and 3 foam pillows. Was told yes to both. Arrived and no upgrade available. Given a room that had a linking air conditioner that made carpet wet and room smell like mildew. Should have known as I checked in someone else was leaving for bad smell. The tub was also clogged. Next day hotel texted me to see how things were. Told them all problems and the response was, we have an upgrade we can move you to. When I said yes, then I got a text from ‚ÄúPeter‚Äù who claims their upgrades weren‚Äôt room upgrades but $25 for snacks and premium internet (didn‚Äôt need) but said fine but please fix room and send pillows. Got a response that all will be set right. Got back to room: pillows were there but no voucher, no unclog tub, and
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience. My apologies in regards to your stay. We do try to offer a seamless experience at our property, and it would appear that we fell short on this regards. Please reach out to either Blake or Peter at 714 241 3800 as we would like to Make it Right for your stay.

Summary: Hotel breakfast was great.  Evening reception was also pretty good.  Room was spacious and bed comfy (pullout is NOT). Pool does not have change room, showers or outside patio area. Also chlorine was extremely harsh.
Manager Response: Dear LightPacker547268,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback on your recent stay with us. We're very sorry to hear of your disappointment with our pool and common areas. We have shared your feedback with our maintenance team, and we will keep your suggestions in mind as we strive to enhance our guest experience. We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you.

Summary Heading: Room(s) Desperate need of repair; Staff great, friendly and really try to accommodate
Summary: Checked into 1st room to find tools on the floor and the kitchen sink p-trap exposed.  Reported to front desk and maintenance came up to "finish' the job while we went to dinner.  Returned back to the room to find the living room floor soaking wet. Front desk moved us to another room the same night. Again, room had a leaky shower head.  Maintenance came up and replaced shower head, however, the stem shut-off valve continued to leak through the night.    Moved again on the 2nd night to the 3rd room.  Bathroom had peeling wall paper with shower valve stem leaking.  Staff is great, and work very hard to accommodate.  Breakfast was excellent. Embassy Suites, Dyer Rd, Santa Ana does not live up to the Hilton image.  Property is in need of major renovation.    Lobby nice, friendly
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience. There is no excuse for checking into an unready room. I'm so sorry that we fell short! Please reach out at 714 241 3800 so we can Make it Right for you. Please ask for Peter or Blake

Summary: The first room was not clean when we checked in. There was dirty water in our bathtub. Once that was cleaned, we discovered the tub filled with soap and dirty water from another room due to back flow from the plumbing. We were given another room, but it was ready two hours later than promised. It had broken drawers, a leaking tub, rust in the tub, thick and heavy lime deposits around the faucet of the tub and shower head. The sink had mold and a thick yellow film around the hot and cold handles. Lastly, the HVAC didn't work properly. Blowing cold air in the living room area and hot in the bedroom. This was the worst experience I have ever had at this property. After coming yearly for 8 years, we won't be back again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us and I'm sorry to hear we fell short in regards to the condition of your room. We would like an opportunity to touch on how we can Make it Right for your time with us. Additionally, we would like to gain further insight on the specific room that you stayed in so we can target these areas of opportunity. Please reach out to us at 714-241-3800 and ask for Peter or Blake.

Summary: Staff was helpful, breakfast good, room was dirty; kitchen area was dusty, coffee pot disgusting, wires exposed from the wall, holes in the bathroom door, and roaches coming from the bathroom fan, which was taped off and hanging from the ceiling.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience. The team will be happy to hear that their service was helpful and it's kind of you to brighten our day by sharing that. However, I understand that the room condition is a significant part of your experience with us and that we fell short in that regard. Please call us at 714-241-3800 so that we can Make it Right for you. Ask for Peter or Blake as we will be handling your case!

Summary: Awful experience. Have stayed in the past this same location 2 years ago. Was a much better experience.  Complex now gated - room had musty smell coming from bathroom. Shower had missing shelf from wall. Could hear all noises from outside parking lot.
Manager Response: Dear elizabethdart,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and are very sorry for the condition of your room. We will address your comments with our team as we work to improve our guest experience. Your input is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. We hope you will come visit us in the future.

Summary: I am sorry to say but this hotel is an embarrassment for the Hilton Family. First, the ladies who work at the front desk need to learn to be Welcoming to their Guests. One simple welcoming comment sometimes is worth a lot! The Lady who checked me in did not clearly appreciate my business at all. She seemed bored and lazy. The room smelled so bad, carpets in rooms are disgusting! Hair in the bathroom is usual for this hotel. The AC was broken and could not be controlled. Had to call TWICE for maintenance as no body came the 1st time and you just keep waiting in the room. I don't know if the ladies in the front desk really care! Gym - 2 treadmills only and they are both just about to break apart - Noisy as Hell.  I don't think I will be there again in future.  Disappointed is the
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback Dr. Stroykov. Comments like yours will go a long way in helping us resolve the issues we need to address. However, this is no excuse to not have the best service promised to you by the Hilton brand, and it seems we've fallen short in that regard. Please reach out to us at 714 241 3800 and ask for Blake or Peter as we will be handling your case!

Summary: The Embassy Suites in Santa Ana are old and the management either doesn't see what's happening, or short staffs the hotel to wring the last bit of profit out of the facility. The parking lot is difficult to navigate with anything larger than a subcompact. The entry/exit ticket machine just doesn't work. You have to always buzz the staff who are overwhelmed by people standing in line at the desk to get out of the lot.   We left our room at 8:00 in the morning and returned at 5:30 only to find out that the housekeeper had not yet been into the room. We wanted to watch the Sunday night baseball game, so the housekeeper had to work around us when she entered at 5:45. The vacuum cleaner that was in the hallway when we checked in was still there when we checked out two days later.
Manager Response: While our breakfast and front desk team will be happy to hear about the gratitude, we are deeply sorry that you didn't have a great stay.   My apologies that we performed the housekeeping services for your room so late in the day. While we do try to accommodate our guests with an ideal time period for cleaning service, we understand that the hours your recieved your service was not ideal.   Saturdays and Fridays can get quite full in our parking spots. Should you find yourself at our hotel in the future, I'd like to share that our valet does offer to accommodate parking as a complimentary service during these peak days. Feel free to utilize this service in the future.   We'd like to make it right for you. Please reach out at 714 241 3800 and ask for Blake or Peter, as we'll be handling your case.

Summary Heading: a disappointing way to start a holiday
Summary: I booked this hotel on AirMiles for two nights.  When we arrived to check in, they had record of our reservation however, they didn't have any record of it being pre paid on points.  THEY told me to call Hilton Honors to get things straightened out.  We went to out room and I made the call from the room.  I also had to call AirMiles to get the reservation straightened out properly; which it was. However, upon check out, they charged us $0.75 for each phone call.  I mean, what kind of hotel charges for phone calls??? I only had to make these phone calls because they didn't have my reservation correct, and THEY told me to make the phone calls.  They did NOT tell me they were going to charge us for the calls.
Manager Response: My apologies regarding the challenges you experienced with your reservation. While we do hope for a seamless experience from reservation to check-in, we understand that this was not met during your stay. Please reach out so that we can Make it Right for you. Ask for Blake or Peter at 714 241 3800, as we will be handling your case.

Summary: Very disappointed with the quality of the service at this hotel. My bathroom did not have towels or bath mat and when I asked for it, they failed to deliver even after 35 mins. I had to go down to the main lobby to pick up myself. No one greets you in the morning, bad service at breakfast. Close to airport but loud noise from freeway.
Manager Response: We are truly sorry that you did not receive the services you requested from us. Service is an ongoing discussion at our property and we hope that we can have a chance to Make it Right for your last stay with us. Please reach out to either Blake or Peter at 714 241 3800.

Summary: While our family loves Embassy Suites and has stayed here before, the hotel had renovations and since then, nothing good has happened.  Our hotel room was "cleaned" everyday, but to a very small extent.
Manager Response: Dear bachmai,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback on your recent stay with us. We're very sorry to hear you experienced an undesirable level of housekeeping service and assure you we have addressed the problems you mentioned with our housekeeping staff. We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you. Safe travels.

Summary: My room didn‚Äôt have hot water for 2 days and housekeeping didn‚Äôt clean my room for 2 days. When I expressed my concerns with the staff, I was told several times "this is an old hotel." If that's the case maybe they should put a disclaimer on their website saying "caution this is an old hotel!!" This hotel fell far below my typical experience with the Hilton Brand. I've been a Hilton Honors member for 21 years and was very disappointed with my stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Not having hot water during your stay is certainly inexcusable. The age of the property should be irrelevant and I am deeply sorry for the comment you received as it is certainly inappropriate. Please reach out to Peter or Blake, as  we'd like to get further details in regards to your interaction. We can be reached at 714 241 3800. We'd like to Make it Right for your stay.

Summary Heading: At best okay... that is, if you can get into your room.
Summary: Two sides of the hotel face the interstate. If you like the sound of traffic all night long then this is the hotel for you. Each room as sliding glass doors that don't seem to seal well enough to keep the noise out. If noise isn't an issue, the hotel staff is sure to disappoint. I had an issue with the door lock/handle that was obviously broken. I've encountered a few maintenance issues in the past, but never dealt with hotel staff that wasn't interested whether I could get into my room until I stayed here.
Manager Response: We are deeply sorry that the noisy location and condition of our entry door impacted your stay. We would like to Make it Right! Please reach out to us at 714 241 3800, and ask for Peter or Blake as we will be handling your case! We would like to gain further details on the room that you stayed in as well, in hopes of improving the experience for future guests!

Summary: Great weekend.  Except for Saturday night with that loud drinking group in the restaurant.  Like I stated earlier I think the restaurant should be for paying guest to enjoy their meal.  Overall we really enjoyed our stay.  We wish the roof of the pool area opened up.  On such a beautiful weekend we did not feel like being indoors.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Broken AC, Run down rooms, maintenance in shambles
Summary: This hotel on the surface looks very nice- the lobby is clean, the building exterior is appealing, and the staff is generally friendly. Where it suffers is the worn down interiors and equipment in the rooms. It‚Äôs clear that standard maintenance is not a priority here or that they‚Äôre letting it wear prior to major upgrades. During my 1-day stay (left to go to another hotel after one night) i encountered a room with more chipped dry wall spots and botched paint jobs than I could count. The TV was broken and the electrical wiring behind the TV was exposed. But the real kicker- the AC was stuck in Heat mode in August! Multiple staff members tried to fix it but it was determined broken- they offered me a fan as there were no other rooms available. Overall I think this hotel needs
Manager Response: My apologies regarding the condition of our room during your stay. Rest assured that it is our priority to correct the issues you described during your stay. I understand how frustrating it can be to check into a room with conditions that don't meet expectations. Having comfortable temperatures and a working television are minimum expectations when I travel, and I'm deeply sorry that those expectations were not met. Please contact Blake or Peter at 714 241 3800, as we will be handling your case!

Summary: Suite Bathrooms need a facelift. The rest of the rooms appear to have newer items. The atrium has been updated and looks nice....the bathroom in your individual suite.....not so much. The hotel needs to hire (or at least schedule) a few more employees in the evening. I hate calling the front desk and being placed on hold for 15-20 mins
Manager Response: You'll be happy to know that we have projects underway to improve decor and conditions. The bathroom area is one of our central focus. My humble apologies that this has impacted your stay! Your hold times should not have to be that long and we will be sure to take this into consideration when addressing our staffing needs and procedures! In the meantime, please reach out as I'd like to be sure you feel valued for choosing us! Call us at 714-241-3800 and ask for Blake or Peter, as we'll be handling your case!

Summary: We stay almost exclusively at Embassy Suites properties. This one has a gate controlled entry-exit that was mostly non-operational all weekend. Parking is wholly insufficient, as a large part of the lot is reserved for valet. After returning from dinner on Friday and Saturday nights, no spaces were available, and we had to wait for something to open up. The lot is extremely tight and had one-way dead ends. Our room was at 79 degrees when we arrived and the AC would not come on, but maintenance fixed it, our Premium Floor room had no snacks that we paid for. Breakfast in the morning did not start until 7 AM on the weekends and several sports teams had to leave with no breakfast. The staff was responsive, but the facility has issues. Not our best experience, and certainly not what
Manager Response: While our parking lot does get a fair amount of traffic during peak occupancy, we do encourage our guests to utilize our valet! There is no additional charges when our lots are full! Should you find your way in our area in the future, be sure to enjoy this benefit!   While we sincerely regret that your family's breakfast needs were impacted by our chosen hours of service, we would like to remind you that our designated breakfast hours are based off of guest feedback for the 7am-10:30am designation during weekends! We certainly do not wish your family to leave our facility hungry!   Please reach out to us at 714 241 3800 and ask for Blake or Peter, as we will be handling your case!

Summary Heading: Great experience, but sofa bed mattress is terrible
Summary: Very close to Los Caballeros Tennis facility where we had playoffs. Everything was good, reception at happy hour was good, but snacks were limited. Sofa bed mattress was terrible. Great breakfast. Will stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Eight different families stayed at this hotel during a softball national tournament. All eight families reported issues regarding service or the room at some point during the stay.  The pull out bed did not have a comforter, and after four calls to the front desk, we finally received our comforter about 1 AM. When speaking to the customer service representative at the front desk regarding the prior nights issue, she received a personal car and walked away from the desk with the issue left unresolved. The rooms are dated.  The cooling system never got the room up below 71¬∞, despite putting the thermostat at 57¬∞ when we first arrived. We were at the hotel for five days.
Manager Response: Dear benjamincripps,  Thank you for taking time to review your experience with us. We sincerely apologize that we did not provide you with the quality of services and amenities you deserved during your recent stay. Please know that the problems you encountered are not typical of our hotel and staff and will be addressed accordingly to avoid recurrence for future guests. We are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience, as your satisfaction is very important to us. We hope you will consider staying with us again soon so we may have the opportunity to make it right.

Summary: The rooms (we switched) smelled of urine/sewer gas.  The airconditioning unit did not work (we switched rooms).  The hotel in general is run-down and overpriced.  There is another Embassy Suites very close by that is in much better condition.
Manager Response: Dear dgrimmus,  Thank you for your review. We‚Äôre sorry we didn‚Äôt provide the quality of amenities and service you deserved during your recent stay at our hotel. We apologize for the issues encountered with the unpleasant smell and condition of your room, and we are working with our team to correct the problems and avoid recurrence going forward. Your feedback is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. If you return to our area, we hope you‚Äôll stay with us again.

Summary: Did Not clean our room for over 2 days.  Had to request towels and toilet paper because none were left in our room.  One room never had A/C.  Staff had attitude when problems reported, and response was slow or non-existent.
Manager Response: Dear SLewis1962,  Thank you for taking time to review your experience with us. We sincerely apologize that we did not provide you with the quality of services and amenities you deserved during your recent stay. Please know that the problems you encountered are not typical of our hotel and staff and will be addressed accordingly to avoid recurrence for future guests. We are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience, as your satisfaction is very important to us. We hope you will consider staying with us again soon so we may have the opportunity to make it right.

Summary: Have AC that work that wasn‚Äôt pumping in outside air (90F). The thermostat was already set at 50F and room temperature was 75F and very humid.   The desk clerk also never answer the phone.  Went down to the desk to asked for a different room was told that the hotel fully booked. The explained that they only have ‚Äútwo tubes‚Äù to pump air which maintenance current set at neutral.   The best she could was have maintenance check to see if the unit was working.  Waited over an hour no one came and when I returned from dinner no one to the front desk to answer any thing about it.   Room temperature throughout the night until temp range from 78 to 75.  Opening the balcony door didn‚Äôt help and traffic noise was bad even at 3am to leave open.
Manager Response: Dear LongtimeHiltonhon,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback on your recent stay with us. We're very sorry for the AC issues that you encountered and that you experienced an undesirable level of customer service. We assure you we have addressed the problems you mentioned with our front desk and engineering staff. We do hope you give us another opportunity to share a more positive experience with you. Once again, our apologies for the inconvenience.

Summary Heading: You need a -0 for my rating of your hotel
Summary: Do to the fact of the maintenance on this hotel not being done properly. 1- First elevator broke earlier in the week and was inop for most the day. 2-Elevator stuck with our kids inside for 1.5 hours. 3-YOUR staff waited 45 mins to call the fire department.  4-Both outside AC units bearings going out and a very loud high pitched sound coming from them all week. 5-The parking lot exit gate only work 1/2 the time and we have to buzz the front desk to let us out the other 1/2 of the time. 6-Our room never got below 77¬∞ all week and when we called the desk they sent a "fan" up to fix it. Again We Are Not Happy..  We will not be staying at your hotels again.
Manager Response: Dear johnstubbe,  Thank you for taking to time to provide such a detailed review, though I am sorry that we failed you.  I certainly understand how concerning it can be to have so many teens stuck in an elevator.  We take the safety and security of our guests very seriously, and immediately contacted our service company and the authorities for assistance.  The fire department was on site approximately half an hour after the situation was first discovered.  I apologize for any perceived lack of urgency on the part of my team.  Thank you again,  Adam Stanchina General Manager

Summary: Dirty bar with flys, tub backed up,  stained sheets & pillows covers, door wouldn't lock or open without being manhandled,  tasteless bland breakfast. Felt like a over priced cheap renovated motel stay.
Manager Response: Dear bettyzng69,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and are very sorry for the conditions encountered throughout. We will address your comments with our team as we work to improve our guest experience. Your input is genuinely helpful, as it is the first step in identifying areas where we can better our guest services. We hope you will come visit us in the future.

Summary Heading: The breakfast and evening social are amazing benefits. The rooms are big and spacious.
Summary: We actually had a bad room to start, but the staff willingly got us a better room and upgraded our room.  The first room had a leak and was missing lighting so it was very dark. 2nd room was much better and they gave us the upgraded room at no additional charge. We have stayed here many times as we have a daughter nearby this area. The breakfast buffet and evening social are amazing. The lobby has been redone and is very nice although we enjoyed the stream that use to run through the middle of the lobby area. We like Embassy Suites for the large rooms. We particularly like the rooms that have an extra sink area in the bedroom providing 2 places for people to get ready for the day. Rooms could use some updating. Our first room was very bad and had a leak and bad lighting.  Door
Manager Response: none

Summary: Three persons on duty at front desk when I walked in and not one person would bother to acknowledge that I was alive. It took them five minutes to offer to see why I was standing at the check in counter. That was the introduction to a lousy hotel experience.
Manager Response: Dear Dan L,   Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay.  A warm welcome is at the heart of every hospitality experience, and I am so sorry that we did not make you feel appreciated as a guest.  We are working closely with our front desk to make sure they understand the importance of a great first impression.  Thank you again,  Adam Stanchina General Manager

Summary: Upon entering the room , my kids asked what was that smell ? It had a strong unpleasant odor . We proceeded to check out the bathroom.  It was disappointing. The sink was dirty and the shelf filled with dirt in the corner where they stacked the towels   Literally we would hear when people use ‚Äòprivate room‚Äô upstairs .  It was an aweful 3 days 2 nights stayed . Forget about housekeeping also . We had to walk over and ask our room to clean to get it cleaned.   I would never stay here again this time  The only thing was great  ... breakfast !!!!!
Manager Response: Dear WaterXO,  Thank you for sharing your experience at our hotel.  We strive to provide all of our guests with a great experience, and I am sorry that we failed you on your recent visit.  Based on feedback like yours, we are making changes throughout the hotel to improve our offerings.  Thank you again, and I truly hope we will have another chance to show you a true Embassy Suites experience.  Adam Stanchina General Manager

Summary: Dear Mr. Nassetta,  I am a longtime customer of Hilton brand hotels from Fiji to Europe. I have never experienced such abysmal customer service at a Hilton chain as I have at the Santa Ana Embassy Suites. I can envision no path forward to ‚Äúundo‚Äù what my family has experienced here, but I can only hope that with awareness at the highest level of leadership of your corporation that the experience for other customers at this property might be improved in the future.   1. At approximately midnight last night, I asked for the bright spotlights shining into our room be addressed or that our room be moved. Photo is below of the spotlights.   2. I was met with indifference, sarcasm, and an invitation to leave the hotel immediately to resolve the issue. When I said leaving with a 12 year
Manager Response: Dear Mrs. Tam,   Thank you again for sharing your experience and I am very sorry that I was unable to resolve your concerns while you were a guest.  I understand you are in communication with the Hilton corporate office, however if I can be of any assistance in restoring your faith in Embassy Suites please do not hesitate to contact me at adam.stanchina@hilton.com.  Adam Stanchina General Manager

Summary: The carpets are filthy. The property is old and shows it. Typical Hilton service at the front desk but when I found the maid in my room at 10 AM when I needed to make a conference call I could not get her to leave or to work quietly. I would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Isneed2019,  Thank you for sharing your recent stay.  I am sorry that our housekeeping team did not meet the same standard of service you received throughout the rest of the hotel.  While I understand your frustrations, I sincerely hope the next time your travels bring you to Orange County, we will have a chance to show you a true Embassy Suites experience.  Adam Stanchina General Manager

Summary: Always a good place to stay.  Location is great, rooms are clean.  Restaurant food could be much better with all the up grades they have made throughout the hotel over the past few years, you would expect better food.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was surprised and disappointed in the condition of the suite. The cabinet in the living area was scratched and didn't close entirely or properly. The paint in the bathroom was scratched off the walls in a couple of spots. The desk chair tilted back dangerously and I almost fell backward when I sat in it and the sink in the bathroom didn't drain properly. Took about 20 minutes to drain completely leaving a soapy residue on the sink. I alerted the front desk of this the evening that I checked in asking that the chair be replaced and the sink looked into the following day while I was out at my client. When I returned on the second day of my stay neither issue had been addressed and I again almost fell when I sat in the desk chair. I went to the front desk and asked that both
Manager Response: Hello Ron. My humble apologies in regards to your stay. It appears that we fell short on your experience, and for that I am truly sorry. As you know, the Embassy experience should have functional furnishings, clean and comfortable rooms, and a seemless billing experience. The challenges you've experienced will be addressed with our team. However, I want to make sure that you feel valued for spending your time with us. Please call us at 714-241-3316, and ask for Blake, as I will be sure to Make it Right.   - Blake Roderick, Director of Operations

Summary Heading: Dirty room and they didn't try to clean it
Summary: Not even sure where to begin with this horrible experience.  Checked in, was given the room keys and they didn't work.  Went down and got them reactivated. unpacked everything, and then noticed that the bathroom sink had hair in it and hair on the counter, a used bar of soap was there too along with unfolded, possibly used towels on a chair.  Went to the front desk and spoke with a man who saiid he would send housekeeping up (it was after 8:30pm). we waited for a bit but then left to get something to eat. Came back later and room still not clean.  Should have demanded another room but didn't. Found   a stain on the fitted sheet the next evening (would have to be blind not to see it) which made me wonder if they ever changed the sheets.  Took pictures and showed them to the desk
Manager Response: The condition of your room is unacceptable and we are working hard to make the right changes in ensuring a better experience for our future guests. My humble apologies that your stay was impacted by our oversight. I hope that you will give us a chance to Make it Right for you. Please call us at 714-241-3316 and ask for Blake, as I want to be sure that you feel valued for your stay with us!  - Blake, Director of Operations

Summary: I would have never imagined that a manager of a hotel, specifically Peter Chang, would direct his staff to pack up and relocate a guest room without the guest's permission. However thats exactly what happened to us. We were away from our room the entire day and upon our return our room keys didnt work. At the front desk, I was told by Peter Chang that he moved us to a different room !! Instructed his staff to pack up our ENTIRE belongings and move them to a different room without our knowledge or consent. When I tried to speak with him about this unacceptable action, he was unapologetic and did not show any appreciation for the intrusiveness or the impact it had on our evening and the remainder of our stay. Up to this point our experience with Hikton had always been good. But we
Manager Response: I am sincerely sorry that I came across as rude in regards to your experience. I certainly did not intend to cause frustration for what should have been a fun event for you and your family. Your experience with the room move has since allowed us to revise the way we conduct this procedure. There is no excuse to not have the best service promised to you by the Hilton brand, and it seems we've fallen short in that regard. We have refunded your night for the experience, please reach out if there is more I can do.  - Peter Chiang, Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Worst Embassy Suites experience in 25 years - always 4 or 5 stars vs this 1 star.
Summary: First the people were all kind and helpful. This isn‚Äôt concerning people but rather the facility. First the parking lot is a mess. The turn to the get to the exit gate is ridiculous and the gate is slow to read the room key. Also part of the parking lot is so tight that it is impossible not to hit the car beside you. We got lucky to find larger spots close to the hotel. Next the rooms are falling apart. The towel rack fell off the wall the first day and was never put back up over the next 4 days. The desk chair was clearly broken as I sat in it and it leaned to the side. I requested a chair and the front desk said they would send an engineer. They may have sent an engineer but the chair was in the same condition. The doors sounded like something from a scary movie. Plates from
Manager Response: You'll be happy to know that our team is working on solutions to your experience and I do apologize for the condition of your stay. We are anticipating a fix the the HVAC noise, and we are looking into better utilization of our parking area. My apologies that these shortfalls impacted your stay with us and I want to be sure to Make it Right. Please call us at 714 241 3316 and ask for Blake, as I will be handling your case.  - Blake Roderick, Director of Operations

Summary: We stay at Embassy Suites all over the US due to the convenience and value they offer. This is the 3rd time we have stayed at THIS LOCATION. They fell short compared to other locations. We had to be moved twice due to non-functioning AC and cleanliness. Restaurant staff is rude. Our waiter would rather be on his cellphone (visible to guests) rather than be attentive. Bartender had NO personality, yet expected a tip.
Manager Response: Comfortable tempuratures and clean rooms are certainly minimum expectations for me as a frequent traveler. My apologies that we fell short on your experience during your stay. Feel free to reach out to us at 714 241 3316 and ask for  Blake, as I would like to Make it Right for you.  -Blake, Director of Operations

Summary: Close to airport, freeway, beaches and restaurants. Room service was very good- quick service, reasonable prices and food was tasty. Only downside was it was very noisy outside with traffic at all hours of day and night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I arrived at 2 pm but room was not available. So waited and given room 606 but:  1. Toilet light is not working cos bulb is totally missing.  2. Dressing table 2/4 are not working 3. Fridge leaking with water.  4. 5 hangers for 3 weeks stay. Asked additional 8 at 6pm. Till 11pm only managed to give 2 hangers.  5. Washing basin choked and burst out dirty and smelling water 6. Having 3 Laundry machines for a hotel of over 200 rooms and do not accept foreign country master card 7. Customer service stop taking your call after several complained. Put you on hold as they know your room number when picking up the call.
Manager Response: Hello Cindy, My apologies regarding the condition of your stay. It would appear that we fell short on several areas. Service and standards are an ongoing discussion at our property, and we would like to discuss an opportunity to Make it Right for you. Please reach out to me at your earliest convenience. My direct line is 714 241 3333.

Summary Heading: Poor customer service and poor response time
Summary: After the first night, it was very cold, being from AZ. I had to call down numerous times to get extra blankets for my kids. The pullout bed‚Äôs mattress was horrific! There was no padding in those mattresses which caused my kids to feel every spring, and required 6 blankets to be placed on before anyone could lay on it. I also was in need of a plunger for the rooms toilet. I called down numerous times for someone to come to our room and after about 5 hrs of waiting and continued calls, I went looking for a plunger myself and eventually found one and plunged my own toilet. Normally this would not be an issue but having to go 5 hours without being able to use the rooms toilet and paying well over $100/night, this was unacceptable. Lastly, we stayed for 11 nights and requested our
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. What you experienced is not Hilton standard and is not usual for our property. We are reviewing what we could have done differently that evening in an attempt to continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: Great service all around...Luis C was great along with Juan...tip me off to some great restaurants. Bar tender was very good....Good food from the restaurant....breakfast was very good also big selection of fresh fruit,eggs pancakes made to order omlets!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hole in the hollow core door between the rooms. The bathroom door so it opens properly. We had four people in the room but only got 3 towels from housekeeping everyday. The dresser drawers don't open/close smoothly  because the floors are not level. The wardrobe was leaning. Windows are not double pane so the room was very noisy and hot from the western exposure. Multiple times our key failed at the parking gate. Way overpriced parking for tight parking. What does $22 get me? Nothing. Might as well stay at Holiday Inn.  $22 would get a better breakfast. Your motto is "we will make it right". Good luck.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We understand that the issues you have listed  all would detract from a positive stay. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary Heading: Average stat for an overpriced hotel
Summary: Average stay for an overpriced hotel that has gone downhill. Been coming to the hotels in the circle for 20 years.
