Only hotel in the area that seems to be going up in price and down in quality and respect from employees. Despite remodel, underlying problems with cleanliness. The remodel was a ‚ÄúLipstick on a pig‚Äù fix. New floors don‚Äôt make up for poor customer service from front desk.
Manager Response: Dear Stay60787011979,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay.  As you noticed, we have worked hard to improve our quality,  recently completing a full update of our offerings.  I am saddened to hear that these efforts were overshadowed by a poor service from our team.  A true Embassy Suites experience includes not only comfortable accommodations, but also seamless and uncomplicated service.  We will be addressing your concerns, and I do hope that the next time your travel bring you to Santa Ana, we will be able to welcome you back.  Thank you again,  Adam Stanchina General Manager

Summary: Our family loves Embassy Suites and we try and stay at one whenever we travel as we like the two rooms you get and the freshly cooked breakfast.  However THIS particular Embassy is very dated and not run like other Hilton properties we stay at.  The air conditioner would not turn on (only allowed HEAT or FAN only)  eastern facing room heated up to 77F in the morning, tub faucet dripped, paint in bathroom peeling, the room smelled musty and the cleaning crew left the room half made up (couch cushions were not replaced, tub left full of water, etc)   This one will definitely be on my avoid at all costs list in the future.
Manager Response: Dear krkn2002,  Thank you for taking the time to share you recent experience.  I am so sorry that we failed to live up to the expectations set by our fellow Embassy Suites.  We are actively working to update our guest suites, including providing a greater level of independent control of the air conditioning system.  When your travels bring you back to Santa Ana, hopefully we will have the chance to restore your faith in our hotel.    Adam Stanchina General Manager

Summary: This hotel is tired; the suites all need an upgrade. The lobby makeover is lovely, but the suites have not been updated and it shows--damaged doors, loose faucets, etc. We have stayed here several times and this time we were pretty disappointed. The breakfast selection is great, BUT all the food on the buffet is so, so greasy.
Manager Response: Dear Explore62763650609,  I am so happy that the changes to our lobby made an impression, though we strive to have that experience continue throughout the entire stay.  Our team is committed to providing a comfortable suite, and I am sorry that your recent stay didn't showcase their efforts.  When you are next visiting Santa Ana, please let me know so that we can ensure you do not encounter the same concerns.  You can always reach me at adam.stanchina@hilton.com.    Thank you!  Adam Stanchina General Manager

Summary: We had a five day birthday trip planned for our son. We are Hilton honors and thought our stay would be the same as every other embassy suites that we have been too. But were we wrong. The best part was the breakfast staff who manged to make us smile every morning. Bathrrom door look like it was kicked in, big red stain on the bedroom floor (Blood or Hair dye) we were told red hair dye and nothing could be done about it. Air conditioner leaked on the carpet for three days until we were finally moved to a new room. Wallpaper in bathroom torn from the wall, leg on coffee table was broke, to many things to mention.
Manager Response: Dear resee332000,  Thank you for choosing us to celebrate your son's special day.  I'm glad our team was able to make you feel welcome, though I can certainly understand your disappointment in the challenges you encountered in your suite.  At your convenience, please contact me at adam.stanchina@hilton.com.  I would like the opportunity to learn more about your concerns, and to try and restore your faith in the our hotel.    Thank you again,  Adam Stanchina General Manager

Summary: Room reeked as did the shower curtain. Front staff failed to answer calls from room. Ice machine did not work. Parking lot is a navigational nightmare if you drive a Ford 150 or larger vehicle. Only one exit.
Manager Response: Dear Relax61585815101,  We are very sorry we were not able to provide you with the quality of services and amenities you deserved during your recent stay. Please know that the problems encountered are not typical of our hotel and staff and will be addressed accordingly to avoid recurrence for future guests. We are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience, as your satisfaction is very important to us. Thank you again for your feedback. We hope you will consider staying with us again soon so we may have the opportunity to make it right.

Summary Heading: Fell way below the standard set by other Embassy Suites
Summary: A lot of little things went wrong. Things that would be acceptable or at least expected at someplace like Motel 6, not Embassy Suites. The toilet would periodically run for 10-15 seconds and shut off. Maintenance called twice and couldn't do anything about it. The toilet often got stopped up. The sink was mostly clogged so it drained really slow. A simple act of washing hands and the sink would stop up and black stuff would float out of the sink. On Saturday the eggs on the hot buffet were disgusting. Tasted like soap. Only one time were there enough towels at the pool. Again, because this is the Embassy Suites and other Embassy Suites have set the bar high...apparently too high for the Embassy Suites in Santa Ana. Simpy putting up a sign that says due to high demand you're
Manager Response: Dear disneyof4,  Thank you for sharing your recent stay.  I am so very sorry that we failed to provide the level of service you should expect when visiting an Embassy Suites.  We are currently working to make updates in our suites that will have an immediate and positive impact.  While I completely understand how the issues you encountered would put you off of the hotel, I sincerely hope that the next time you are in the area, we will have the opportunity to show you a true Hilton experience.  Thank you again,  Adam Stanchina General Manager

Summary: This is the 3rd time I have stayed at this hotel in the past year and a half. Each time I decided to give it another chance but unfortunately it was a mistake. The first time was okay but I felt like the rooms and hotel were significantly dated. The second time there was construction going on for a remodel which was great. But the construction was terrible. The center of the hotel was under construction with the work and jack hammering starting pretty early in the morning. This trip we got into our room at 4pm and found the temp in the room to be a humid 76 degrees on the thermostat. We turned down the air and left for dinner hoping to come back to a nice cool room after being in the heat all day. Nope. Back in the room and it was down to 75 degrees. It stayed there all night.
Manager Response: Dear amandarQ4851IE,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experiences here in Santa Ana.  We strive to provide a seamless experience for our guests, and I am so sorry that we failed.  As you noted, we recently completed a renovation to update the hotel to the standards you should expect from an Embassy Suites by Hilton.  Our next steps are focused on updating the cooling system provide a greater level of control in our suites.  I would like the opportunity to restore your faith in our hotel.  At your convenience, please contact me at adam.stanchina@hilton.com so we can Make It Right.    Thank you,  Adam Stanchina General Manager

Summary: When we checked in at 8 pm, we had three rooms. They gave us the keys, and upon opening the doors, one was an undone filthy used room, one room had a filthy bathroom with dirty bath tub and mold on the ceiling. We asked for the rooms to be cleaned, but by 9:30 pm, there was no sign.   We checked out. One star is given for easy checking out and refunding out money back. Went to La quinta Inn next door which was 4 plus stars.
Manager Response: Dear Yatz31,  A clean and welcoming suite is the minimum you should expect when joining us as a guest, and I am so sorry that we were unable to provide that when you arrived.    I would like the opportunity to speak with you to Make It Right, and ensure that we can improve our service.  At your convenience, please contact me by calling the hotel at 714-241-3800 or directly at adam.stanchina@hilton.com.  Thank you,  Adam Stanchina General Manager

Summary: Staff was very professional and friendly, the happy hour at the bar was very relaxing after a long trip, the rooms are very clean and large, and the made to order omelets are great. Overall the experience was EXCELLENT. Will keep coming back to this Hotel, never lets me down.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This location is not indicative of the Embassy Suites we all know. The Breakfast was excellent,  the people were friendly and professional. Having said that, unfortunately the housekeeping was horrible,  the rooms are dated, the Tv didn't work,  the lamp didn't work,  the sofa bed is not comfortable,  the mattress is nothing but springs. They kept messing up my bill by charging me for things I didn't have, not to mention charging it on the wrong card.
Manager Response: I would love to speak with you further about your experience at our hotel, it doesn't sound like we were able to Make it Right for you this time. If you'd like to call our hotel directly our Guest Service team will be more than happy to assist you in investigating the reasons for your lack luster experience.  Thank you for your valuable feedback!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: Enjoyed hotel stay during family vacation. Location was less than 15 minutes from Disneyland and area shopping and food options. Only drawback was room that could use an update. Patch on the walls and some minor holes should be taken care of.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I liked my experience.  Excellent location for the business I had to conduct.  Only complaint was the living area where I had my meetings was too dark.  Need more lighting.  Other than that I recommend to others in the area or going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I hope my experience is an isolated event
Summary: Liked the shuttle service. Makes it very convenient. Front desk personnel were not coordinated and unprofessional. Room was not ready despite of request for earlier arrival. Room smell like moldy. Clean bed sheets.
Manager Response: I would love to speak with you further about your experience at our hotel, it doesn't sound like we were able to Make it Right for you this time. If you'd like to call our hotel directly our Guest Service team will be more than happy to assist you in investigating the reasons for your lack luster experience.  Thank you for your valuable feedback!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary Heading: Rooms are dated, and in rough shape.
Summary: The rooms are in bad shape. My sink was broken and filled with a previous guest‚Äôs wastewater when I arrived, the ceiling was peeling, the walls were in rough shape, two lights were burnt out, and there was mold in the bathroom.  I would expect this level of quality in a Motel 6.  Not a midrange Embassy Suites.
Manager Response: I would love to speak with you further about your experience at our hotel, it doesn't sound like we were able to Make it Right for you this time. If you'd like to call our hotel directly our Guest Service team will be more than happy to assist you in investigating the reasons for your lack luster experience.  Thank you for your valuable feedback!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: The hotel is dated but nice enough to be comfortable.  I got exceptional service upon check-in.  Emilia Cerdas helped me with a few issues I was having after a long day, which was very much appreciated.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed at this property many times and we love it.  There's a Subway, Jack in the Box, and 711 within walking distance.  Freeway is super close.  Ron, the manager of the valet service was so helpful, really good customer service provided by him.  I love the breakfast and they are not in a big rush to clean it all up if you 're running a bit late. The breakfast staff are all very friendly. We had a great balcony view, watched the planes come out of the clouds one night, beautiful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked this Embassy for the location, size of suite, breakfast and happy hour. We were disappointed on ALL accounts. We were met by a welcoming staff. Once to our room there was much disappointment. Mold on ceiling, mold in bathroom, no air conditioning for evening and part of the day, staff walking in our room without knocking at least three times, large disgusting stain on fold out bed mattress, wet sheets on fold out bed, hole in wall barely covered, dirty carpet and so much more. This is a no stay at hotel. We did call the front desk, speak to a representative and the main hotel representative to our unliking.Hopefully this hotel will get their act together.
Manager Response: Oh dear, I'm so sorry that his was the experience you had at our hotel! I can personally guarantee this is not a typical Embassy Suites experience, however, I would love to speak with you further about your experience at our hotel as it doesn't sound like we were able to Make it Right for you this time. If you'd like to call our hotel directly our Guest Service team will be more than happy to assist you in investigating the reasons for your lack luster experience.  Thank you for your valuable feedback!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: Overall, enjoyed staying at hotel and easy access to restaurant and freeway and Disneyland. Beware of homeless people sleeping on the sidewalk behind hotel. Cleaning staff & room service was very good. I always like the breakfast there.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We spent the weekend at this hotel with a few other families. First, the front desk people were great - super helpful and friendly.  But housekeeping and the service at the bar were lacking.  Rooms:  we were gone for 7 hours one day, and our room wasn't clean until after we returned so we had to leave the room so housekeeping could clean; Did not have toilet paper, rooms were not vacuumed, tables/countertops were not wiped down, and housekeeping did not leave any towels. We had to get some from the front desk.  Bar Service:   We asked the server if we could put together a bunch of tables together so all of us could sit together and she said no because she would have to put back all the tables and chairs.  Seriously?!  We told her we would put together the tables and put them
Manager Response: My apologies for the frustrations you've experienced during your stay. That certainly isn't the Embassy experience we're looking to provide. We are currently transitioning our teams into new means of guest oriented service however what you've described would be unacceptable at any hotel, let alone an Embassy Suites. It appears we have fallen short on this aspect and would like to Make it Right for you. Please reach out to us at 714-241-3800, Our Guest Assistance team will be expecting your call so that we may look into the issue further.   Thank you for your valuable feedback,   April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: Hotel was nice looking but lack of customer service follow through and cleaning staff never showing up after multiple requests after toilet overflowed in bathroom and room.  Very disappointing for a Hilton.
Manager Response: My goodness, I'm so sorry for the lack of responsiveness on our end. This is not standard for a Hilton hotel, let along an Embassy Suites. If you would like to speak with us directly our Guest Service team will be happy to investigate this further and see what we can do to make it right.   Sincerely,   April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: The property is pretty to look at, but it is old and needs repairs. I arrived a few hours earlier than expected and was told "no clean rooms were available" So I settled in the lobby and did a few conference calls. I watch 5-8 people be given rooms immediately. I finally walked back after 1-1/2 hours and asked about my room. To which they replied "we have been waiting on you" Individual rooms have no AC control, meaning you have a thermostat but it doesn't work. So if 70 is too warm stay elsewhere. The rooms are spacious. However in my room The smoke detector was hanging by the wires.The staff is for the most part very helpful. But you can tell there is no pride in the place. I'm was a HH member and have decided that they can have my points and someone else can have my business.
Manager Response: Thank you for writing to us here at the Embassy Suites in Santa Ana. We are sorry to hear that your stay at our establishment did not meet your expectations. You stated that your room was not ready when you arrived before the established check-in time. We are sorry to have inconvenienced you on your visit. All employees have been reminded that the appropriate procedure in this situation is to hold the guests' bags and offer vouchers to the hotel restaurant. as well as service a room to be ready at the earliest available time.  Please accept our most sincere apologies. Given the unfortunate experience you had here at the Embassy Suites. We hope that your next stay with us will better meet our standard of excellence.  Sincerely,  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: I originally went to the Hampton next door and it was the worst one I've ever been to.  I walked across to the Suits and Emilla was very understanding and found me a room to finish my week on CA.  She along. with the rest of. the team are very friendly and will go out of their way to provide top of the line customer service.  Best stay so. far!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I am a Hilton honors member and stayed at many Hilton brand hotels and never had a bad experience like this. When my fried checked in I was told that there are two reservations in my name. I only made one reservation and they told us that I have to pay for 1 night to cancel the other reservation. I only got one reservation reminder and only one reservation in my Hilton honors profile. I don‚Äôt know how they had two reservations in their system. They told me I had to contact the corporate office and when I called the corporate office they told me that I have to call the hotel. I was transferred to many people and spent over an hour to get someone to cancel the reservation but finally they disconnected me and never called me back. When I arrived the hotel the receptionist named
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.  Sincerely,  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana Airport (714) 241-3800

Summary Heading: Things Are Messed Up - Staff and Management Don't Care!
Summary: Two issues:  1) I spent 40,000 HH miles on a room.  When I checked out, I noticed my credit card was charged.  Front desk told me to work it out with HH.  Called HH they said they had to call hotel.  Called hotel.  Spoke to manager Carl and tell him I am frustrated.  Carl puts me on hold and next person says Carl is not available.  Funny how I call back in 15 minutes and Carl answers the phone.  I should have just bought the room because spending over an hour on the phone to spend miles makes it not worth the effort.  2) My wife checked in ahead of me. They almost would not let her check in.  I called and told them she was authorized.  They said "we can't accept verbal".  No empathy.  No effort to work towards a solution.  Just "these are the rules".     I will avoid all Hilton
Manager Response: That does not sound like the Hilton Honors experience you were expecting, John. I'm so sorry that we failed to make you feel appreciated as a guest, let along a valuable member! If you could give us a call our Guest Service Team would very much like to discuss this further with you to see if we can rectify this experience.  Thank you so much for your feedback,   April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: Wall chipping. Room didn‚Äôt feel clean. Bathroom is super small. If it‚Äôs not hot outside you can‚Äôt use the AC! Parking was a mess if you come in late. Location is convenient but that‚Äôs just not enough.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feed back! Our job as a Hilton Hotel is to provide quality service and Make it Right for each and every guest. This didn't sound like the best experience we had to offer, and our Guest Service team would like to speak with your further about your stay.  Again, we thank you for your valuable feedback!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: We booked two rooms, each suites and upon arrival both rooms air conditioning wasnt working properly. Notified front desk of this and phones not working in our suite. Said engineering would come to check out-never happened. Notified front desk again of air issues  Monday morning before departing for Disney and also ri shower backing up onto bathroom floor. Upon return from Disney neither issue fixed but given fans for room. Tuesday morning notified of issues once again& again return hotel nothing fixed. Desk clerk said  air cond. 2 pipe system-top of the line 35 yrs ago??? nothing could be done, too expensive to repair 1.6 million, seriously! next day room flooded from backed up shower onto carpet-again told front desk-nothing done upon return to room. Moved us to another room
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a  Hilton Honors member, you are among our most valued guests. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.  Sincerely,  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana 7142413800

Summary: The hotel is dated and the floors in the suites . are not level. The dresser had a wedge under one leg so it would stay level on the floor. The concrete ceiling are cracked.  I didn't feel very safe at this hotel it seems that it could collapse any time. The breakfast was good. The parking fee is a cash grab. The evening cocktails were good and the snacks weren't very good. I wouldn't recommend this hotel to a friend.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a  Hilton Honors member, you are among our most valued guests. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.  Sincerely,  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana 7142413800

Summary Heading: Grading:People A+ Breakfast A Facility C Housekeeping Fail
Summary: The people at the Front ,Engineering and Shuttle driver were all 5 STARs. In alphabetical order: Angelo, Ishran, Jacob, Jesse, Lloyd & Shuttle driver Scott!!! Hilton we will make it right. Well, they did all they could. Breakfast was consistently good as expected. The facility is showing its age, little nicks and bruises here and there. Housekeeping! We had 2 rooms our family in the next room for 3 days never got any service. We were there 5 days and got minimal service and also ZERO on 3 days. Self-parking $22/day tight spaces, when the hotel is high occupancy. Because of the wonderful people up front. 3 Stars otherwise 1or 2.
Manager Response: Dear 12EvanH,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience.  We are so glad the team made such an great impression!  They will certainly be celebrated at our next team member event.  I am sorry that their high level of service did not extend throughout your entire stay.  Based on your feedback, we are revising our inspection process to ensure that guests receive the cleaning service they should expect when visiting an Embassy Suites.  Thank you again,  Adam Stanchina General Manager

Summary: The parking is the only drawback of the hotel, not enough parking, spots appear to be sized and designed for golf carts. Then on top of that they charge way too to park here. Everything else is great.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Do not book this location EVER!
Summary: I am currently sitting in the parking lot of the Embassy Suite Santa Ana waiting for the police because my car was broken into. So while I wait let me tell you about the experience. Upon arrival, I noticed immediately that the hotel was overbooked for Memorial Day weekend, which really wasn‚Äôt a problem, but the things that I requested prior to my arrival weren‚Äôt accommodated. There was blood stains on the master bed comforter, no blankets for the fold up out bed EVEN THOUGH I listed us as a family of 3 with a 10 year old child. No batteries for the remote, Hell, I didn‚Äôt even get my ‚ÄúHilton honors‚Äù bag upon arrival. Now, we called the front desk over and over about the blankets, they told us they were over booked and they couldn‚Äôt accommodate us. So, the next day, we called all
Manager Response: My apologies for the frustrations you've experienced during your stay. That certainly isn't the Embassy experience we're looking to provide. We are currently transitioning into a new management team, and while realistically, we expect our transition to be overall positive, we were hoping that it would have minimal impact during the stay of our guests. It appears we have fallen short on this aspect and would like to Make it Right for you. Please reach out to us at 714-241-3800 and ask for Peter, as I will be handling your case.

Summary Heading: A property that needs update in AC and ducts
Summary: All the aspects of my stay were acceptable but the air circulation that caused a bad smell and obnoxious noise. If you are allergic, this is not a suitable place for you. My room was located on the noisy side of the building and I could not leave open the window (Against the freeway).
Manager Response: Dear Lena H:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry you were unhappy with our guest rooms. Certainly poor air circulation, bad smells and noises are not circumstances we want our guests to encounter. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.  Sincerely,  Karl Dunn Guest Service Supervisor Embassy Suites Santa Ana

Summary: I love the Embassy Suites brand, but this is lower end version of it. I‚Äôve stayed twice this year and both times had issues with out of order equipment. e.g. BOTH phones not working, but never fixed while I was there.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.  Sincerely,  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana Airport (714) 241-3800

Summary: I‚Äôve been to this location several times. Rooms are always really clean. Only a few hiccups this time. I was trying to enjoy Mother‚Äôs Day so I wanted everything perfect. Everything I called for was fixed in a timely manner.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was great 10 years ago, but now the rooms are run down, paint peeling in the bathrooms and bedrooms.  No entertainment on the TV (not even a guide).  This hotel needs to be gutted, we will not stay at this location again until it is.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry you were unhappy with our guest rooms. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.  Sincerely,  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: Last minute stay in town for a funeral. Everything was great with staff and room except the sofa bed was uncomfortable and room very cold and evening reception didn‚Äôt have much for snacks and wasn‚Äôt expecting a parking fee but otherwise very nice hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Looks great from the outside and inside, but motel 6 showed its evil eye.
Summary: 5/3/19 Room 717 We were greeted after a 41/2 hour drive, the counter person read over our reservation, 4 sets of towels and 4 extra pillows (not so hard as the reservation was for 4 people) Stooge sent up 4 bath towels, the room had 3 bath, 3 hand, 2 washcloths and 1 bath mat, my with said we will make due, also never received. the pillows  Day 2, woke up early to shower and get an early breakfast, planned to get back to room and relax before our sons CIF-SS Track meet the reason we came down early!! But guess what no HOT WATER! Called front desk and woman said they kjnew and would comp all room effected? Breakfast was insane, children running wild cutting lines, found out there were 400 student there, were told that most rooms had 7 to 8 per room? Before we left for the day we
Manager Response: I would love to speak with you further about your experience at our hotel, it doesn't sound like we were able to Make it Right for you this time. If you'd like to call our hotel directly our Guest Service team will be more than happy to assist you in investigating the reasons for your lack luster experience.  Thank you for your valuable feedback!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: We (my wife and I) had no issues with the staff. They were very accommodating when we interacted with them.   We were assigned to room 536. The door is extremely difficult to open. After going up to our room after checking in, I went back down to the front desk and told the the desk person that we could not get into our room. He gave us some suggestions on how to get the door to open. He seemed to know there was a problem with the door. Neither phone worked in the room. One of the phones is missing the cord that plugs into the wall jack. The floor is literally higher on on the right side of the room. (The right side would be when you were walking into the room from the front door.) There are wedges underneath the furniture in an attempt to level it out to compensate for the tilt
Manager Response: Sounds like out that room is in need of some maintenance! I apologize for the issues you experienced at our property. As a Hilton hotel it's our job to make it right for our guests and I would like to try and do that for you. You feedback is valuable to us; it allows us to understand the nuances of a guest's experience and where we can do better. I will be reporting the issues for this room to our maintenance department. If you would like to give our property a call our Guest Service team will be happy to speak with you about your stay.   Thank you again for your feedback!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: Room was clean and roomy.  Beware of fan, it doesn't change to what you select.  Contact front desk for advise. Complimentary Breakfast was great, fresh made omelet was wonderful. Overall great stay, I would recommend.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We arrived early on a Sunday and was pleased that we could get early check in about noon. Check in service was nice and friendly. We had a room on the 7th floor with a balcony. I will say facing the 55 freeway and if you opened the sliding glass door it was quite noisy. The 2nd queen bed near the window you could hear the traffic also. Our in room A/C stopped working the 2nd day as it was rainy & quite humid outside. We could not get the air temp below 75. I informed the Front Desk clerk and he tried to argue with me that is was Eco something system for the entire hotel. I told him I knew what I was talking about since the day before it worked fine with air about 71 degrees on Auto. So I left a bit frustrated. I also feel the price for self parking $22 daily is very steep since
Manager Response: none

Summary: Although Embassy Suites off Dyer road has done an amazing job at remodeling the lobby and exterior; they have completely missed the boat on what's most important.  The service, and quality of the rooms you pay for.  Inspect what you expect and check the amenities in the room (ensure they work bottom line).  The room quality is very poor and does not warrant the rate they charge.
Manager Response: I would love to speak with you further about your experience at our hotel, it doesn't sound like we were able to Make it Right for you this time. If you'd like to call our hotel directly our Guest Service team will be more than happy to assist you in investigating the reasons for your lack luster experience.  Thank you for your valuable feedback!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: High volume of hs bands and sports teams due to proximity to Disney Land so there was always a shortage of plates and silverware at breakfast. Desk chair had broken wheels, and the dresser drawers did not function (one handle came off when pulling the drawer out and the drawers could not be pushed in easily). Also it was very crowded at meals. The lobby was freezing to the point we had to wear coats to breakfast.  It was warmer outside. Our room was not cleaned one day either. Standard maintenance should be a high priority and it was lacking.
Manager Response: I apologize, here at the Embassy Suites in Santa Ana we understand many guests come to our property to relax and spend time with loved ones and that having a large number of guests in and out of rooms would detract from the desired experience. In addition to this the maintenance issues you experienced were also something we understand can damper a stay. We have alerted our upper management to your concerns and are working towards solutions for these problems. We sincerely hope that you try us again the future so that you may experience that progress we have made.   Thank you again for your valuable feedback!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: The staff at this hotel was exceptional in every area. The breakfast was outstanding with many choices and the rooms spacious and clean.It was an easy location to get to and shuttle service available. We would stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed 4/26-4/27 in suites on 10th floor. The shower water didn‚Äôt work. When we turned it on no water came out. Thus 2 days without a shower. The light bulbs were blown in two lamps in the common room . There was no drinking water provided. We had to purchase our own supply. You could hear every conversation and loud noises from room next door. In addition kids were using the hallways as a raceway to yell and scream at all hours.  The free breakfast was a greasy spoon dripping in fat. Kids run wild there too.   We had to check out early and were charged a $75.00 penalty which is not indicated anywhere in their policy.   The person we checked out with told us that was policy. On Sunday morning the hotel was half empty.  We are Hilton Honors members and WE WILL NEVER AGAIN at a
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay. I know that when I travel, being able to take refreshing shower is simply a minimum expectation! Rest assured that the experience you had was isolated, and we have since addressed these issues in the room you were assigned. However, I am sincerely sorry for the impact it had on your stay. Please reach out to us at 714 241 3800 and ask for Peter, as I will be handling your case.

Summary Heading: Loud and not all that clean...
Summary: The exterior of the hotel and the lobby are great. The greeting I got from Amelia was wonderful and I felt like a valued guest. The problem is on the interior - my room. Though upgraded to a two room suite, my room just isn't right. There was a faded pubic hair on the toilet rim and the fan in the bathroom doesn't shut off.  There's an explanation on air conditioning unit that says that between 55 and 70 degrees, they neither heat nor cool the building.  Turning on the A/C only serves to turn on a noisy fan. The carpet is old and needs a shampoo. The desk chair seat is ripped and seems like it hasn't been upgraded in a decade. I haven't had the breakfast yet, but was told to get down to it (on a Saturday morning) before 7am because the property is booked to capacity and it'll be
Manager Response: My apologies regarding the condition of the room that was selected for your stay. Clean and comfortable rooms are our priority, and it seems we fell short on that goal. Please be assured, that your comments have been relayed to our managers to address.   I apologize for the disturbance coming from other guests at our property. While, we hope that some of the larger groups that stay with us have minimal impact on other guests' experience, we understand this was not the case in this instance. At your earliest convenience, please call our property at 714 241 3800 and speak with Peter, as I will be handling your case.  Peter, Front Office Manager

Summary: Hotel was okay. Wish they had more Wish there was more outdoor grounds to enjoy. Wish the phones in the room would work and sleeper sofa was horrible. Breakfast is excellent! Evening reception is nice.
Manager Response: Oh no! Sounds like we missed the mark this time. A comfortable room should be the least of your concerns when traveling and I apologize that we failed to make that happen for you. However, your feedback is highly valuable as it allows us to understand where we can do better for our guests. We hope you choose to stay with us next time and allow us to rectify this previous stay.  Thank you again for your feedback!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: Very beautiful hotel.  Lobby is well maintained, breakfast is excellent.  Rooms are great, however bathroom could have been cleaner.  Excellent wifi for being complimentary.  Evening social is a nice touch.  Always appreciate a cold brew after a long work day.  Very friendly staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I reserved online and joined Hilton Honors. April sent me a text explaining they were looking forward to my visit and another to welcome me after we checked in. Ishan was very pleasant and informative..checked me in very fast. Provided me with 2 bags for being a Hilton Honors member, with 4 waters for the kids and Candy.  There were kids there in the pool(which is inside and felt cozy) and walking around with their parents and it made me feel at ease.   Breakfast was great.. plenty for each one of us to choose from..  Hailey went out of her way to help calm my 2 year old down and  gave all 3 of my kids Easter eggs.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Floors are sloped & drawers won't stay shut. Room was 80* & can't turn air on until outside temp is over 70*. Had to leave sliding door open & couldn't sleep due to freeway noise. Expect more from ES.
Manager Response: That doesn't sound like the best experience, I'm so sorry we failed to meet your expectations! As a Hilton Hotel it's our job to Make It Right for our guests and we would like to do that for you as well. Please give us a call here directly and our Guest Service Team would be more than happy to try and rectify your experience with us.   Thank you for your valuable feedback, we hope you choose to stay with us next time!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: Our check-in process was a breeze, they were not busy.  When we got to our room, one of the outlets (on the wall by the desk) missing a couple of screws. So when you plug in or plugged out your cord it‚Äôs pretty dangerous as you have to hold on to the plate to keep it stable on the wall. Our bathroom has molds on the ceiling, on the corner of the tub & on the floor. Also, there was missing/cracked tile on the floor by the bathroom door.  Breakfast was great, as always in all Embassy Suits hotel, a very good value! Never disappointed.
Manager Response: I apologize for the room condition during your stay. That's not the Embassy Suites experience I would be expecting; a clean and comfortable room are the least of my expectations when traveling and I'm sorry we missed the mark for you. We would like to try and rectify this and make it right for you, if you could give us a call at the hotel our Guest service team would be more than happy to speak with you directly!  Thank you for your valuable feedback!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary Heading: Business Trip, and brought my wife and Grandson along.
Summary: My only complaints are the AC is not controllable in your room, it is a piped system controlled by a person wearing a winter coat...And the cribs they supply are metal, and not supplied with a comfortable mattress. Besides that, it is a nice property.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback! Every experience shared is a chance for us as a hotel to understand what we're doing right and what we can do better. We hope you choose to stay with us next time!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary Heading: Uncomfortable rooms, dated furniture, but friendly staff and a renovated lobby?
Summary: Enjoy sweating yourself to sleep in a poorly appointed and dated room? Then this is your hotel!   First-off, you should know I'm a loyal Hilton customer. I stay in their hotels multiple times a month. This hotel does NOT meet the standards of other Hilton properties, outside of the renovated lobby.  I was very disappointed with the comfort of the room itself. The bed's mattress was old and tattered, as well as incredibly uncomfortable. The sofa bed for my guest was even worse than one could expect a sofa bed to be. Though I cannot blame the property for it's proximity to the freeway, freeway noise was unbearably loud.  Most of all, though, was the lack of air conditioning in the room. As soon as I opened the door, the smell of the warm, musty room hit myself and my guest. We
Manager Response: Dear soarwiththeeagles:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry you were unhappy with our guest rooms. We understand the value that a customer controlled heating and cooling system can bring to your stay and are taking yours and others comments under consideration as we consider possible solutions to this particular issue. We sincerely hope you stay with us again in the future to experience the positive changes we have made to the property in part to you bringing your experience to our attention.  Sincerely,  Karl Dunn Guest Service Supervisor Embassy Suites Santa Ana

Summary: I have stayed at the Embassy Suites Santa Ana several times. Before during and after the renovations. The grounds have improved and so has the overall appearance. Service on the other hand has not. It is the small things that make a hotel stay memorable and my last stay at the Embassy Suites Santa Ana was memorable. Spotty quality at the breakfast buffet, extremely slow responses from the front desk to problems and mostly the numerous messages from Jacob and April thanking me for being a diamond member and asking if everything was ok or if I played the trivia game. To waiting over an hour for a space heater to warm up the 69 degree room.
Manager Response: That doesn't sound like the Hilton Honors experience you were expecting! Let's see what we can do to make this right. It's our responsibility as a hotel to accommodate each and every one of our guests to the best of our ability, and I know the service provided for you was not the best service we could have given. If you have time please give a call to the hotel directly, I would love to speak with you personally on what we can do to rectify this experience.   Thank you for you valuable feedback,   April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: We've been to this hotel over and over again. The staff is gracious and professional, and the hotel itself is clean and comfortable. They've just finished renovations, and we had a great stay. We're never disappointed here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I met Tony at the front desk, very helpful making sure we had a great stay. :) Tony took the time to ask questions and with the best answers.  Everyone was pleasant and the hotel looks wonderful with all the new look!  Good job!! Well done!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Stay at home or a motel 6 vice here
Summary: Too cold. Lots of broken items in room. Staff has no ability to remedy issues. All resolution must go through manager who is typically not around. Often told after noon is only time to get contact. Charged for six days after checking out.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. A comfortable room is the least of my expectations when I travel and I apologize we could not meet that expectation or you. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.  Sincerely,  April Stephenson Guest Service Agent Embassy Suites Santa Ana Airport (714) 241-3800

Summary: From the a/c not working , door handle has to be lifted up first then pushed down, no lamps or bedside lighting at all, door does not close on it‚Äôs own, parking exit mess, bad dent shut overall, especially in the breakfast/ dining area, this is not a good place for a business traveler. Was told I would get a credit for parking and the front desk had no record of it.. fortunately I saved the text from the previous night to prove them wrong...
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.  Sincerely,  April Stephenson Guest Service Agent Embassy Suites Santa Ana Airport (714) 241-3800

Summary: Worse and most disgusting hotel. Dirty dirty dirty and full of mold. No cable, loose wires, smelly mold, dirty floors. Workers just said oh yeah that's a lot of mold. The keys to doors didn't work and had to go get new ones and wait in line
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed at every one of the Embassy Suites in Orange County. This is one isn't bad, newly remodeled, very clean, friendly staff. Parking is tough though, especially for $22.00 a night. Great location, I'd stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel needs a major reconditioning. Peeling paint, water damage, calcium buildup, and stained linens were the theme of the stay. The lobby is nice and the breakfast was good, but that's it. To top it off the service was non-existent.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.  Sincerely,  April Stephenson Guest Service Agent Embassy Suites Santa Ana Airport (714) 241-3800

Summary: Good hotel for the price I paid. But rooms are very hot at night, since the air and heat is controlled by the hotel. Staff sent up a fan, which was super loud, which made it hard to sleep. Staff suggested we open the front and back sliding door to the room to air out. Was a joke
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy with our heating and cooling system. We will take your comments under consideration as we seek to make adjustments to this very area of our property.  Sincerely,  Karl  Guest Service Supervisor Embassy Suites Santa Ana

Summary: Once you get checked in and enter your hotel room, you will see a sign near the thermostat saying that they "have a two pipe system".  This means that the entire hotel gets either Air Conditioning, or Heating.  If the outside temperature is above 70, you get AC.  If the outside temperature is below 55, you get heat. In between those, you get nothing.  My room face west and gets the afternoon sun beaming in, and turns into a sauna, even though its only 68 degrees outside.  Want to change hotels to get some air conditioning?  That will be a $75 cancellation fee.  Ridiculous.
Manager Response: Our apologies in regards to the two-pipe system. The two-pipe system is California's first attempt at an environmentally friendly HVAC unit. Unfortunately, the design requires the mentioned restrictions. You'll be happy to know we are working towards a solution that will allow you more precise control in near future. While we do hope that the design has minimal impact on our guest's comfort, we also understand that this is not always the case. We have since waived the cancellation fee on your account. If you have any questions, comments, or concerns, please do not hesitate to contact us at 714 241 3800.

Summary: Repeatedly asked for room service menu, one of the main reasons I chose this hotel was room service, as I was traveling with an infant. Called and asked, said they would send one up An hour later I called again, repeatedly put on hold and dropped Called a third time, was told that ‚Äúyes, several of the rooms are missing the guest services books, I don‚Äôt know why people would take them, as souvenirs I guess‚Äù Still never got a guest services book, finally went down and got the menu myself When I tried to call room service it was ALWAYS busy, I NEVER got through, so I called the front desk to see if there was something wrong, ‚Äú No, just keep trying‚Äù Finally I went downstairs to get something ordered,  2 women at the bar said they were closed, they closed at 10PM...it was 9:50, went
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Ok, but not the best in the area
Summary: I stay at a lot of Hilton family hotels in the Santa Ana area, and this one is only OK. The common area is brand new, but the guest suites are very dated. This is an average hotel at best. Don't hesitate to stay here, but don't expect much
Manager Response: We do appreciate your feedback on the condition of the rooms. This is something we are striving to improve upon and welcome any critiques which will aide us to provide the best possible stay for our guests. We do hope you will visit us in the future to see the positive changes that we have implemented in part to the suggestions you have made and allow us the chance to provide you with a satisfactory stay. -Karl  Guest Service Supervisor

Summary: Old building very poor maintained, room was very dirty and noisy. Only one person at front desk, he was answering call during our check in which made the experience long and not pleasant. Breakfast ok.
Manager Response: Thank you Carlos for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. As a Hilton Honors member, you are among our most valued guests. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. We will take your comments for staffing and room quality under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will continue to use the Hilton brand in the future.  Sincerely,  Karl Dunn Guest Service Supervisor Embassy Suites Santa Ana karl.dunn@wcghotels.com  7142413800

Summary: Rooms were not clean, the first room was dirty had smelled like smoke a leaky bath and the bathroom was not cleaned. They changed us to another room and that room was not clean as well the bathroom had rust and residue in the shower like it had not been cleaned for sometime and the the bedroom door had a big crack in the door. The pool water was cloudy green and the spa was milky. I will not be coming back to this embassy suites again we have been to other embassy suites and we were really impressed and pleased but this location is sub par by far.
Manager Response: I apologize on behalf of the Hotel for your experience. I completely understand your frustration, I wouldn't stand to stay in hotel without at least a clean and comfortable room. Please give us a call and I'll  be happy to discuss your experience further.   Thank you for you valuable feedback,  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary Heading: Steadily gone downhill the past 2 years.
Summary: Hilton member, stayed in this hotel several times in the past 2 years.  Two years ago it was acceptable; however, they renovated their ground floor to accommodate conferences and have not kept up the rooms.  TVs often don't work in the bedroom area, hot water (none) is an issue on some sides of the hotel; Maids don't replenish stock daily; parking is a nightmare - can't figure out how to get the digital keys to work, hard cards get cancelled so won't work to get in or out of lot; room temps cannot be controlled unless outside temps are below 50 or over 70, leaving rooms hot & stuffy for most of the year.  I travel most weeks for work and used this hotel exclusively for a while.  Not going back.
Manager Response: You hit it right on the nose, yes our hotel is some definite need of repair. The fantastic news is our Corporate office has decided to focus on our hotel specifically for all internal renovations such as out HVAC and water systems. I understand this doesn't do much for you as a previous guest and I apologize for the experience you had with us. If you could please give us a call directly I'd like to see what I can do to try and salvage this stay so that we can accommodate you for future stays.  Thank you for you valuable feedback,   April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary Heading: Great price for all you get!
Summary: Can't beat the two hour open bar from 5:30 to 7:30, great service, never more than 3-4 minutes in line for free drinks!  Service was great, flatbread pizza's we had were great.  Room was comfortable and quiet.  Morning breakfast buffet is a great freebie!  Food was good, the only thing negative at all here was the line for the omelette station was long.  But big deal right?  Great for a business trip or just a casual getaway like we did.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Staff needs raises, room needs renovation
Summary: This is absolutely no reflection on the staff. They were great. As for the room, we were on the "premium" floor. This is what we got: 1. It was freezing. Apparently the heat had been turned off and we had to call for a space heater (brought to us almost immediate by a housekeeper - as I said, staff is great), which we had to cart back and forth between our two rooms; 2. There were two electrical outlets that didn't work; 3. It looked like there had been a scuffle involving the bathroom door;  4. The office chair was ripped up and looked like it was the result of a dumpster dive; 5. My husband sent an email to Hilton, who said they would make amends by paying for our parking. But it could not be applied to our current stay unless he called Hilton and requested that it happen.
Manager Response: While I am happy to hear the staff were able to provide an Embassy Suites experience I apologies that the room did not live up to the same standard. It's our job to make it right for all of our guests, and while I will be happy to speak with you directly to see what we can do for you I will also be reporting the condition of the room to my upper management so that we may address and fix it for all future guests,   Thank you for you feedback, It it always appreciated!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary Heading: Worst Embassy Suites I‚Äôve stayed at
Summary: I‚Äôm a Hilton member and have stayed at this location many times before.  This was the worst I‚Äôve seen or experienced. The AC stopped working and it was hotter in the room than it was on the outside.  They moved us and the temperature was the same. They had to give us fans because the rooms never got below 71 degrees. This is what the bathroom looked like. Trash unemptied and bathtub in terrible shape.  I will never stay here again.
Manager Response: I wish I could see the photos so I could have a better understanding of the quality of your room, but it sounds like it was less ideal. I know when I travel a comfortable and clean room are the least of my expectations and I'm sorry we couldn't accommodate that for you. Please give us a call here at the hotel so we may investigate this further.   Thank you for your feedback,  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary Heading: Mold and running water in tub, room reserved not available at time of checkin
Summary: The day we checked in the hotel didn‚Äôt have the room we reserved available and placed us in a single king room which didn‚Äôt accommodate five people. That night was so rough. The pullout bed was so painful to sleep in. The thermostat was not working and the room was so cold. We tried to ask the front desk about it and they said it was controlled through their central system which could not be controlled in the room. There was mold in the bathroom ceiling. The next day, we were moved to a two queen bedroom but had the bathtub water continuously running. Overall, was not happy with the experience. Would not go back until improvements are made. Mold in both bathrooms not acceptable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel staff was not responsive to my request for repair. You have limited control over the A/C & heat system. There were hundreds of teens staying there which made getting breakfast impossible. Overnight parking is overpriced as well.
Manager Response: That doesn't sound like the best stay we could have given you, lets see what we can do to Make it Right! If you would like to give us a call I would be happy to look over your reservation and see what I can adjust to make your stay with us a valuable experience!  Thank you for your feedback!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: I needed a place to stay an extra night in Southern California. I found it as I searched the Hilton brand website. I thought why not see how this hotel compares to other Hilton brands I have stayed at in Southern California. I arrived and was quickly checked in at the reception desk by an amazing receptionist. I requested a room on the first floor to assist my parent due to her walking issues. The receptionist attempted to locate a room but the hotel was filling up. I received a higher floor, but I thanked him for attempting to help me. I entered my room and found it to be in Need of a remake. The room is looking outdated and worn. It has nice paintings that look modern, but the couch is old as well as the chair in the suite. It offered a nice 43 inch LG flatscreen in both the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Rooms need TLC. Bathroom door had hole
Summary: Made reservations for several rooms for a family wedding. Asked for rooms to all be on one floor. This did not happen. Needed a handicapped room for elderly mother. This did not happen. The parking is a nightmare. The parking stalls are extremely small even for a compact car. The key entey/exit from the parking lot didn‚Äôt work for several guests over several days.
Manager Response: That doesn't sound like the Embassy Suites experience you were looking for. It's our job as a hotel to make it right for all of our guest and I sorry we fell short for you. We'd like for you to reach out to our property so that our Guest Service team and directly handle your case and see what we can do to reconcile this stay.  Thank you for your valuable feedback,  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: I like staying at Hilton properties. This one is pretty much run down. Bathrooms in rooms are really small the shower drain is backed up. The shower runs from hot to cold and dripped all night long. The furniture needs to be updated as well as the kitchenette area. Breakfast at this hotel is probably the only thing that is good and keeping this place going.
Manager Response: I apologize for the lack luster experience you had with us. A clean and comfortable room and the least of my expectations when traveling and to fall short of that for any of our guests is unacceptable. Thank you for your feedback, I will be sure to pass along this information to our management so that we can address it going forward.  Thank you again,   April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana  (714) 241-3800

Summary: Great location  For the Anahiem area. Outstanding breakfasts each morning w everything you could want,  plenty of variety even for picky eaters . Missed the nightly receptions but have taken part in them in the past which is always a nice perk to staying at the embassy suites
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Bit old...not the best...not the worst.
Summary: The hotel needs an update but like most embassy suites, we weren't expecting much.  We needed a room with a suite so this was the only option available at a reasonable price.  The rooms are decent, clean enough but the location is near the highway so you hear a lot of noise at night and in the morning.  The breakfast was hot...not the best but OK, filling and convenient.  The coffee was great...that was the only thing the adults enjoyed the most, the coffee!  The service is mediocre at best.  There was food in the elevator from a lazy and rude guest that must have dropped it and didn't pick it up...not sure how long it was in there but I blame more of that to the guest than the staff as I don't know if they were aware and we were headed up to our room and didn't mention it.
Manager Response: Thank you for the helpful feedback on our hotel!  We strive to make every experience a unique and enjoyable one, and I'm sorry we failed to full-fill that for you. However, we will take this feedback into great consideration moving forward and apply it for all future guests.   Thank you again,   April Stephenson Embassy Suite Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: If there is any other hotel open in the area I recommend you go there. My company will not come back to the ‚ÄúRace Way‚Äù hotel. The front of the building is right next to the highway that is super loud in your room if you are on the front side of the building. The customer service is not good and Karl Dunn is proof that they don‚Äôt care there at that hotel. The food in the bar was served like warm. I could go in but you have been warned.
Manager Response: I sincerely apologize for the quality of stay you experienced with us. We at the Embassy Suites do our best to Make It Right for all of our guests and the very least we should be able to provide a comfortable room and respectable staff. We will take your feedback to heart and move forward with it in mind for all guests in the future.   Thank you again,   April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: While I appreciate the fact that some schools have the opportunity to take their wonderful and entitled children on school music trips there need to be an empathy for the rest of the traveling public.
Manager Response: Hello Mrs. Leslie, I apologize for the experience you had with other guests at the property. We did have a few sports groups in house. And while they do have an opportunity to stay at our property, we do hope that it is minimally impacting to other guests. I would like to be sure that you feel valued with us. Please reach out to us at 714 241 3800,   - Peter Chiang

Summary: Was very unhappy, room was always warm, couldn't control your own temperature, bath tub needed to be fixed as is was leaking.  Eve reception was never much food out to pick from or ever restocked much.
Manager Response: It sounds like you didn't have the best experience we could offer. Please give us a call directly so that we can try to salvage the experience for you and set up your next trip into town!  Thank you for your feedback!  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary Heading: Not The Gem It Once Was!
Summary: Ok.  I have been retired for 6 years and have not been to this hotel since I retired.  I used to stay here routinely and loved it!  I was SO disappointed on this trip.  I totally agree with everything that the past reviewer stated in his/her review.  I will not continue by belaboring the point.  Sadly, I will not stay here again.  Thanks for the memories!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We typically never travel without reading reviews.  In a real hurry hubby booked this given embassy suites is generally okay when we are looking for basic accommodation.  This place is an absolute nightmare.  The A/C of the full building is kept on Neutral when Temp is between 55-70!  It was about 56 that night and we froze.  The next night we were apologized to and a heater was on the way - never came!!!  That hotel policy is not negotiable.  Our room was left open for several hours after service.  The beds are absolutely uncomfortable.  The pillows couldn‚Äôt be worse.  The carpets dirty, toilet smelly, bath leaking.  Breakfast poor quality.  Parking cards don‚Äôt work..  The only good thing is half the staff are quite polite and pleasant... I won‚Äôt get started about the rude
Manager Response: It sounds like you stay was less than optimal. I'm very sorry for the experience you had with us and would love to speak with your directly about the issues you've described. Please contact us here at the hotel so we may discuss your experience in greater detail.  April Stephenson Guest Relations Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: Good breakfast and food in general, but rooms had a bad smell and uncomfortable temperature control, making the stay unpleasant.  Even after elevating the complaint, the response of management was below expectations.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. Our breakfast team will be happy to hear you enjoyed your time with them. I would like to offer our apologies that the room was not to your standards. Please contact the property at your earliest convenience to discuss how we can Make this Right for you!  -Peter Chiang Front Office Manager

Summary: Our rooms (2) were clean and well appointed. There was quite a bit of space, with the living area separated from the sleeping area by a door. The breakfast buffet was fantastic every day. Hotels are hotels, but what set the Embassy Suites apart was the incredible staff and the services they provided. Sadly, we were in town for a family funeral, and the staff made us feel welcome and at home during our stay, providing us a safe haven of comfort during a difficult time. The airport shuttle was a welcome bonus.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The best part of this hotel is the generous square footage of their rooms though bathrooms are tiny (one at a time). Embassy is also known for above average breakfasts, cooked onsite with variety for everyone. The hotel is clean and attractive. Staff is friendly. The onsite restaurant is a good place for an evening meal or drink. The location is excellent for experiencing the attractions of southern California.  Regardless of the good qualities of this hotel, we will not be staying here again when we often visit our family in So. Cal. They have no HVAC a good part of the year (we visited in Feb). Their antiquated system will deliver only AC or heat, not both and not what the tenant desires. If outside temps are not low enough or high enough, they don't provide HVAC at all. Our
Manager Response: Dear drfwilson  I am very sorry we were not able to provide you with the quality of services you deserved during your recent stay with us. Please know that this is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we are sorry we didn‚Äôt meet your expectations during your stay. We are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience as your satisfaction is very important to us. We try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. Thank you again for your feedback. We hope you will consider staying with us again soon so we may have the opportunity to make it right.					  Thank you, Miri L.

Summary: Older Embassy Suites in need of refurbishment. Lots of wear to paint, furnishings, etc. Rooms have a slight musty odor. During my stay there was no hot water the morning I was flying trans-Pacific, the exit barrier to the parking lot was not working and no one was a the front desk to fix the situation. Breakfast is good, but the dining are is always very crowded, such that you often have to sit at a table with someone else. This hotel seems popular, but I suppose this is because the price are quite low for the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback, Edward! Our hotel has been going some major projects in the last couple of years and room renovations are definitely in the future. I apologize that we failed to meet expectations and it sounds like we couldn't make it right for you. Please feel free to give us a call directly so that we may try to rectify the experience for you.   Thank you, again, for your feedback.   April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: Very long morning with 3 meetings back to back. Came in town from Boston. Stand in line. Not remembering anything. Nice young lady name Madisyn very nice ask me what would I like . Made many offers on different drinks (coffee) have.  Nice for changed when someone can help me. Thank you Ms Madisyn. For being so helpful.   Mr C Thomas CEO
Manager Response: none

Summary: Run down. Our first room the ceiling was leaking bad and the ceiling was fallen off really bad. The 2nd room was leaking still the 3rd room was fine. The planter in the atrium was being worked on no notice and both my daughter and I tripped over broken brick. Due to heating controlled by hotel not room our room was was 72 degrees. Way to hot to sleep. Front hotel staff not very helpful. Bright side the breakfast was great and the kitchen staff was wonderful. Loved the omelet station. Would not stay here again.
Manager Response: I apologize for the quality of your stay! We aim to give all Embassy Suites guest a Hilton Hotel experience and it was clear we did not realize that standard for you. A clean and comfortable room is the very least I expect when I travel and to have failed in providing that for you is a clear indication of where we need to improve as a hotel. I will be sure to pass this along to our hotel's management.  Thank you for your feedback.  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana (714) 241-3800

Summary: Hotel is located near highway 55 ease of access is excellent. Rooms very very clean and comfortable. I personally felt room lighing could be upgrade, but that‚Äôs just me. They charge you for parking self less than valet. I think that is a distraction but most properties do as well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I'm not a terribly picky traveler but I like to read,  and leave,  honest reviews.  This hotel experience was fair.  The hotel was in good shape,  we really enjoyed the pool and hot tub, and the breakfast is excellent.  The pool is a little chilly compared to most indoor pools but not so cold the kids didn't enjoy it. Hot tub was toasty. Room was clean in good condition.  Bed was fair. A few ahead of arrival I received an email ask6about upgrade options (usual with Hilton hotels). Premium room upgrade was only $8 night. Upon arrival, the nightly rate had gone up $25, not $8. Front desk fixed the problem. Premium rooms include a snack tray with drinks, candy bars, chips, etc. Ours was not in the room and after two calls to the front desk, it never showed up. Internet connection
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was nice.  Issue with bedroom tv was not resolved.  Roof in fitness area leaks severely.  Managers reception was less than impressive compared to other Embassy Suites I‚Äôve stayed at.  Location is so so.  Airport proximity would be the only reason I‚Äôd stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback on your experience at our hotel. We strive to make every guest's experience a new and enjoyable one, and with every comment of praise and criticism, we are able to learn for our guests on what we can do to improve. We will take what you've said into consideration and move forward with your feedback in mind.   Thank you,   April Stephenson  Embassy Suites Santa Ana 1325 E Dyer Rd, Santa Ana  (714) 241-3800

Summary: Hotel staff was not helpful. Hotel rooms did not provide sufficient towels or change the linen. When asked for help from the front desk it was at least a 30-minute response if they respond it at all. Hotel rooms had a musty smell. Front desk explained that the hotel roof was leaking in most of the rooms.
Manager Response: I apologize for the poor room condition you experienced at our property. As a Hilton Hotel, we do our best to accommodate all of our guests' needs and it's clear we could not realize that goal for you. Please feel free to call us directly so that we may better address your concerns for all futures stays at our hotels.  Thank you,   April Stephenson  Embassy Suites Santa Ana 1325 E Dyer Rd, Santa Ana  (714) 241-3800

Summary: Hilton member staying here for 1 night-  very disappointed in air conditioning system.  Ridiculous that I can only turn the heater on & it was already 78 in the room.  No way to even just have fan on circulating in very stuffy room.  No fans available, guessing because others having the same issue.  Usually really like embassy suites, not this one. Will not stay again.
Manager Response: I am very sorry for the poor quality of your stay. It is not right that you could not enjoy your time with us. I know when I travel a comfortable room is the minimal expectation I have and to lack such a basic standard for a hotel is unacceptable. Please feel free to contact us at time to discuss your experience and we will be happy to receive your feedback.   April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana 1325 E Dyer Rd, Santa Ana(714) 241-3800

Summary: I recently stayed here before an early AM flight out of Santa Ana Airport.  I arrived about an hour before check in, but was able to checkin right away.  The two employees by the desk area were absolutely charming and so helpful.  My room was super clean and very comfortable EXCEPT for the bed (one reason for only a "4" rating instead of a "5").  The bed was hard as a board. I finally found a very plush blanket in the living room and folded it up to sleep on.  I had a sandwich and a glass of wine in the restaurant.  Service and the food was good.  The early AM shuttle ride was pleasant and the driver (who was the desk attendant when I checked in) was so friendly.  He had all of us chatting and sharing where we were from/where we were going.  One other thing to mention that
Manager Response: none

Summary: Paying nearly $200 for my stay I have expectations. This was the worst experience I have ever had. When it rained there was a puddle in my room and mold on my ceiling as well as significant previous water damage. I also had a personal item stolen from my room.
Manager Response: I'm so sorry for the terrible experience you had with us, Mr. Lucas! Please give us a call at your earliest convenience so that we may address these serious concerns further.   Thank you,  April Stephenson Embassy Suites Santa Ana 1325 E Dyer Rd, Santa Ana  (714) 241-3800

Summary Heading: A few bright spots, but otherwise truly awful
Summary: I was supposed to stay at this hotel for two nights while in town on a business trip. Because the hotel bills itself as an "airport" hotel, there are certain things that I expect. Number one is that the fitness center is open 24/7 to accommodate those who need to work out early before early morning flights (or late if that is your thing). Not here! Because the hotel is older, the fitness room is located inside the pool complex. I understand limiting the hours when the pool can be used. But when I asked at the front desk if I could be let in at 4:00 a.m., I was told probably not, and that I would have to come down at 4:00 a.m. and ask the front desk clerk if he would let me in. No offer to help with this issue, or write a note for the overnight clerk. I had a 7:15 a.m. flight the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Disappointed, poor customer service and room conditions
Summary: I am a hilton honor diamond member and stay mainly at hilton properties. I never really write reviews but decided to join Trip Advisor just to warn travelers about my experience at this property. I checked into my room on the top floor and entered to a very warm room at 79 degrees. I turned on the air to get it cool so I could sleep and couldn't get the room to cool down. It appeared that it was blowing warm air into the room. It was late so I opened my balcony slider, opened my front door and got a cross breeze to try and cool it but it didn't get below 78 degrees.  Next morning I called down to the front desk and explain that I would be away until 10:00 pm and that my room air-con needed fixed. I returned late to find my room in the same "hot condition". I called down to the
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay with us at Embassy Suites Santa Ana. I wanted to apologize for falling short on the service you received from our team. I know a comfortable room and pleasant staff are the minimal expectations I have when I travel, and I can only imagine your frustrations when these expectations were not met. I will be sure to address these concerns with my upper management to make sure we fix these problems for all future guests.
