I hope that you will visit us again when your travels bring you back to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Terrible parking , poor check in experience
Summary: Choose and checked in room via mobile app and choose 3pm as check In time. Arrived at hotel at 4pm and room was still not ready. Was told by front desk to wait for 10 mins door room to be ready. But had to wait for over 30 mins to get into a room. This is no way to treat a hhonors elite tier guest. Asked for front desk for help but they did not even apologize. Second issue was parking. The parking spaces were really tight and they charge  a ridiculous 15$ per night. Since there are no cashier at the exit gate we were stuck for over 10 mins each time trying to get the gate to work. Each time we has the valet guy help beep open the gate. If you are charging for parking at least make it easy to use and have wider spaces. Or only offer valet for free since there is not enough
Manager Response: Sidney L,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  I'm pleased to report that the hotel is currently under renovation!  Work on the 10th floor guest suites started on January 4th and we are scheduled to be under renovation until January 2017.  I'm sure you'll be very happy with our upgrades as they are unveiled and want to stay with us again in future.  To address your concerns about parking.  Please know that should there ever not be enough parking, you can always turn your car into the valet team and they will charge you the self parking rate and ensure a spot for your car.    Thank you again for your review.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again in the future.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Good Hotel - But a little expensive
Summary: Overall, this is a good hotel and with the usual Embassy Suites breakfast and reception included, it can be a decent deal for a family. Had some problems with the cooling/heating system - our room was very warm during one stay, then very cold during another stay. The system is old, and can only run in one mode - so there are problems when the weather changes. Also, the standard internet is pretty slow and there is a $15 charge for parking. Most other hotels in the area have free parking.
Manager Response: Dubos M,  Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to review your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana ‚Äì Orange County Airport. I was very saddened to read about the HVAC troubles that you encountered during your stay.  Please accept my apology on behalf of the hotel for the difficulties you experienced with our HVAC system. Having staying in the hotel many times before, I can certainly understand what a guest experiences and the challenges that it presents for our guests.  The hotel has a 2 pipe system, which was state of the art when the hotel opened up in 1984. However, in 2016, it leave some definite challenges to all parties concerned. With the concrete construction of all of our guest room walls, it has prevented the hotel from upgrading the system to current 4 or 6 pipe systems which allow a guest to dial in a temperature more to their liking.   Thank you again for bring your experience to our attention and I hope that you will still consider us again in the future.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Wait staff and housekeeping and most other personnel are over-the-top friendly.  Food is excellent.  Hotel is dated and security is an issue.  Management, while congenial, is not responsive.  We were advised that ownership is in the process of upgrading all rooms.  We experienced a security breach that went totally ignored by management; other than that, my wife totally enjoyed the people and the environment (some of the nicest folks we've encountered).
Manager Response: Dear Daniel,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel, and we appreciate the kind words regarding our staff. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry you were unhappy with your stay. Guest comfort and safety are our top priorities and we regret you did not experience this. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.   Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: I am a Hilton Honors Diamond member - stay at Hiltons all the time. This hotel is not worthy of the Hilton name. Room is musty. They charge for parking. Internet does not work. Shame on me - I had stayed here before and was disappointed but decided to give them another chance.  If anything they have gotten worse.  Never again - there are too many other hotel options nearby. Frustrating and disappointing.
Manager Response: J W,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry you were unhappy with your stay here. We will take your comments regarding the internet and room smell under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience.  We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.   Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: My husband and I stayed here one night to be near the John Wayne airport. Room was clean and very spacious. Breakfast is provided, but we had to leave before it was served. We were comfortable and felt safe. I would definitely stay here again, very convenient to airport.
Manager Response: l0vemyhusband,  Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to review your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport.  We greatly appreciate your positive comments and hope that your travels bring your back the area very soon!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: This hotel far exceeds my expectations every time I stay here! For a larger needed room for my family of 5 that includes a full made to order breakfast & nightly reception you can't find anything even close to the price I get at this Embassy!!
Manager Response: Julieb5412,  Thank you so much for the review!!  We couldn't agree more that Embassy Suites by Hilton provides an awesome value to our guests.  I could only imaging that breakfast for a party of 5 is about $50.  Take that breakfast cost off the room rate and you have a large room for a steal!  We look forward to having you as our guest again when your travels bring you back to the Orange County Airport area.    Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: It is a good family hotel, nice suits, good selection of items at Breakfast. Pool and the hot tub are also good. Plenty of towels in the pool area. Kids like the colorful collection of fish in the breakfast area.
Manager Response: Asmemon,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your stay with us.  We always appreciate great reviews and we are so glad to hear that your family enjoyed your stay.  We look forward to you staying with us again in the future.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel 2x.  The first, we had no issues.  The second time, 2 years later, was not great.  Internet was awful.  Pillows, linens smelled musty, and our room was HOT and HUMID.  We asked for the air conditioner and was told the whole system was down for the "season".  Our room was noisy, as it faced the highway.  Our flight home was cancelled and they made us move to another room with just one bed, rather than 2 Queens, as requested.  Parking our rental car was a nightmare.  So disappointed this time, I hope they make it "right" with us, some type of refund?
Manager Response: Cathy,  Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to review your recent stay with us.  Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel for the less than enjoyable experience. I can certainly understand how inconvenient it was to need to change rooms when trying to extend your stay due your canceled flight.  Please know that if our two queen rooms were not fully booked for the rose parade band's arrival, we would have certainly let you stay in the same room.  I have shared your comments regarding your noted housekeeping and engineering items and shared it with my department heads for correction. Thank you again for taking the time review your recent stay.  We hope you will consider staying with us again.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: The Embassy Suites is always known as a classy place to stay and this was our first time during a Xmas holiday.  We found the staff to be courteous, the service excellent and the accommodations exactly as promised.  The breakfast offerings are "second to none" and the Omelet station is well worth going through if you are into how efficiently you can mass produce custom ordered omelets.
Manager Response: David,  What a stellar review!  Thank you so much!!  We are so please to know that you enjoyed your stay during the Christmas holiday and that you were impressed by our ability to make 1,000+ custom cooked-to-order omelets for our guests daily.  We hope that you will come back and visit us gain sometime soon.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Very nice place to stay. Front dest staff very helpful from calling housekeeping to send extra towels and linens to scheduling us for airport shuttle drop off on our final day. Valet assisted self-park guests to exit parking lot when there was gridlock of cars. Breakfast buffet staff was awesome.  They were all friendly and greeted guests each morning. By third morning omelet station chefs knew how I wanted my eggs cooked. Location of hotel was very convenient to airport, freeways, and Disneyland. Hotel could use a little updating but overall our stay was nice. Heating and cooling system is dated. Swimming pool could have been set warmer but jacuzzi was nice and fitness room had all the basics for a good workout. Parking fee could be a little cheaper but it does deter outsiders
Manager Response: Athena R,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review!  It is always nice to read that our service is top notch and meeting all of our guest's needs.  We will take your comments regarding our parking offering under advisement as we continuously work to improve the guest experience.  Thank you again for your review and we hope that you have a wonderful New Year!  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: The amenities provided by this hotel catered to all of my needs. The 9th floor room that I got had a great sunrise view. The breakfast options were 'theeee' best with a live omelette counter. Have seen many reviewers complain about the HVAC, but I did not face any inconvenience regarding this.
Manager Response: Sanoop R,  Thank you very much for the great review regarding your recent stay.  Glad to hear that you thought our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast was "theeee best"!  It is one of our brands key offerings to all guests and adds a huge value to any stay.  I hope that you still stay with us again soon on your future travels to the Orange County Airport area.  Have a happy New Year!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: My mom and I spent 3 nights at the Embassy Suites in Santa Ana (12/18-12/21/15). This was not our first stay at this location.  We choose this location rather than one in our former home town of Costa Mesa, as it is centrally located to a number of our friends and family in the area.  In addition, we enjoy having the extra room that the suite offers. We have always been pleased with the service and amenities at the hotel. It has an intimate feel, despite being 10 stories tall.  The atrium is pleasant and relaxing, both for breakfast (the cooked-to-order omelets are not to be missed), and for the manager's reception in the evening.  While the evening offerings are not as extensive as at their sister property near Boston airport (the best of the Embassy manager receptions I've
Manager Response: Cynthia K,  Thank you very much for the great review touching our many great features and service.  I'm sorry to hear that you were disappointed in our parking offering.  In December 2014, the hotel hired a parking management company to better manage our parking lot and begin offering valet parking services.  We were the last full service hotel in Irvine, Tustin, Costa Mesa, and Santa Ana to not charge for their parking.  However, we still have the lowest overnight parking rate in the Orange County Airport area.  I hope that you will still consider us again in the future.  Thank you again for your review.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: I love staying at the Embassy Suites ever since I was a little girl, my family has been staying at these hotels.  We enjoy the complimentary breakfast and the evening happy hours.  My children now enjoy the swimming facilities and gym.  This is the hotel of choice for multiple generations of my family.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone who asks.  The staff was very helpful and courteous.
Manager Response: Tanya,  Thank you so much for your review.  It is excellent to hear about your family's generational loyalty to the Embassy Suites by Hilton brand.  We look forward to having again as our guest for many generations to come.  Have a wonderful holiday!  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: The accommodations were beautiful and the staff was great, after shopping all day, it was nice to have a glass of wine (complimentary) and a snack as we dressed for a Holiday Party. The breakfast (also complimentary) was excellent, it was a short stay, but a very comfortable one.
Manager Response: 559katrinal,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review!   We are all so glad that you enjoyed your stay and took the time to share your experience.  I hope that you will stay with us again on your future stays in the Orange County Airport area.    Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: OK Value, slightly less than OK room.
Summary: The hotel lobby was quite nice.   Check in staff was pleasant and professional.   Room itself was some dingy and louder than expected.     Having a living room separate from the bedroom was convienent, as I was traveling with my wife and 15 year old.     Strong $ Value as alternatively, i would have to book 2 rooms.
Manager Response: Ericnolanxtc,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent say.  Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel for your dissatisfaction with our guest rooms.  We certainly know how important guest rooms are to our guests and we are always looking for feedback!  Beginning next month, the hotel will be undergoing an 11 month guest room renovation project that will be bring about major changes to our guest accommodations.  Additionally, starting Q3 of 2016, we'll begin renovating all of our common areas as well.  I'm certain you will enjoy our new guest rooms and offerings on your future return visits to the hotel.    We look forward to having you stay with us again in the future.  Very respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: The hotel claimed the only had Heat or Air Conditioning - not both.  Unfortunately since the weather ranged fro 40 - 60 degrees neither worked.  I roasted in my room with an unacceptable evening.  Other guest froze. I had to sleep with balcony door open on freeway by airport.  Not acceptable and no offer of compensation from the hotel.  The remainder of the Embassy experience was the normal quality experience.
Manager Response: Lew H,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  Please accept my apology on behalf of the hotel for the difficulties you experienced with our HVAC system. Having staying in the hotel many times before, I can certainly understand what a guest experiences and the challenges that it presents for our guests.  The hotel has a 2 pipe system, which was state of the art when the hotel opened up in 1984. However, in 2015, it leave some definite challenges to all parties concerned. With the concrete construction of all of our guest room walls, it has prevented the hotel from upgrading the system to current 4 or 6 pipe systems which allow a guest to dial in a temperature more to their liking.   Thank you again for bring your experience to our attention and I hope that you will still consider us again in the future.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: I had a very long day and checked into the hotel after 8:00 pm. I was tired and exhausted. Check in went smoothly and I was able to get to my room quickly and relax. The room was nice, clean, and provided a comfortable atmosphere.
Manager Response: Monique,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review.  I hope that you get to stay with us again on your future travels to the Orange County Airport area.  Have a wonderful holiday season!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Poor quality rooms.  Lots of noise.  There were stains on bed sheets and towels.  Air conditioning did not work.  Went for business the conference area was nice but loud if you are trying to give a presentation.
Manager Response: Jessica D,  I am very sorry we were not able to provide you with the quality of services you deserved during your recent stay with us. Please know that this is not typical of our hotel and staff, and we are sorry we didn‚Äôt meet your expectations during your stay. We are always looking for ways to improve our guest experience as your satisfaction is very important to us. We try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding stay. Thank you again for your feedback. We hope you will consider staying with us again soon so we may have the opportunity to make it right.  Thank you, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: We enjoy taking short trips close to home and our go to hotels are Embassy Suites.  Always clean, quite, and well appointed.  We are never disappointed and we have stayed in Embassy Suites all over the west coast.
Manager Response: richardgD9391FN,  Thank you so much for the glowing review for your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport.  It is always great to have guests that are loyal to our Embassy Suites brand and Hilton Worldwide.  We look forward to having you stay with us again on your next getaway.  Hope you have an enjoyable holiday season!  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: So we stay at the embassy suites very often, really like the fact the they have a big cook to order breakfast and the free wifi and complimentary parking. However this year all those perks are no longer available. The hotel still has breakfast but now charge for parking and wifi when you add all this cost to the price it's no longer worth it your better off getting a Marriott with the same amenities and going to an IHOP and get a good breakfast and still pay less.   Embassy will be loosing out on 15 rooms this weekend for their extra cost they have added.
Manager Response: Latinos28,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton.  I was sorry to read that you didn't enjoy your stay with us and all of our complimentary offerings such as free wifi, a complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast, and complimentary evening reception.  To address to parking, it was certainly a decision the hotel did not make precipitously.  With the challenge of so many vehicles in the parking lot that did not belong to our guests, it forced hotel to hire a company to manage our parking lot.  In fact, we were the last full service hotel in Irvine, Tustin, Costa Mesa, and Santa Ana to start charging for parking.  Additionally, it was a fee we knew would not go over well with many of our guests.  Yet when pushed with the fact that there was no parking due vehicles of non hotel guests in our lot, it made us take action.  However, we do take pride in having the lowest parking rate around.  One of our biggest competitors, Marriott Irvine charges self parking at $22 per night compared to our $15 per night price.  Our goal was to just cover the costs to manage the parking lot.  However, as a perk, it did allow us to provide valet parking to our guests which we did not have before.  I hope that this information begins to restore your faith in us and that you will consider us again for your future travels to the Orange County Airport area.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: This hotel has one HVAC system for the whole hotel.  It was impossible to stay in the room during the day or sleep at night.  Air condition was turned off even though it was 75 degrees outside.  Do not stay at this hotel if you like your rooms nice and cool.
Manager Response: Felipe,  Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to review your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana ‚Äì Orange County Airport. I was very saddened to read that you were hot during your entire stay.  Please accept my apology on behalf of the hotel for the difficulties you experienced with our HVAC system. Having staying in the hotel many times before, I can certainly understand what a guest experiences and the challenges that it presents for our guests.  The hotel has a 2 pipe system, which was state of the art when the hotel opened up in 1984. However, in 2015, it leave some definite challenges to all parties concerned. With the concrete construction of all of our guest room walls, it has prevented the hotel from upgrading the system to current 4 or 6 pipe systems which allow a guest to dial in a temperature more to their liking.   Thank you again for bring your experience to our attention and I hope that you will still consider us again in the future.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: we stayed at the embassy suites during thanksgiving weekend. considering it was a holiday and most people would want to be at home, the staff was very friendly points go to the waitress in the sports bar she was very nice and the valet was friendly with us offering to help load our car when we were heading home. the breakfasts were amazing as always (get the potatoes) and the atmosphere was clean. the drive from the hotel to disneyland was maybe 15 minutes if that and after a long day and excitement the drive was nothing!only thing I would say is yes along with other reviews the rooms are a little dated, and parking was hard, the sizes of the stalls were a tight fit. but if you park on the far end it is easier to get out. the beds were comfy but the pillows were too soft but
Manager Response: Jasmine,  Thank you so much for the great review!  You've uncovered one of our best secrets.  We're close enough to the Disneyland Resort to be a hop, skip, and a jump; but far enough away not to deal with the Disney hustle and bustle!   I'm glad we could make your Thanksgiving weekend an enjoyable one.  Come back and visit us again soon!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Place near Orange County CA airport
Summary: Just minutes from John  Wayne Orange County Airport, but very central to many activities in the S. California region. Easy off and on for the highway system. Clean, Neat and well kept. I would highly recommend this hotel vs others in the area.
Manager Response: Mike S,  Thank you so much for the kind review.  It is always enjoyable to read about the many great experiences that our guests have.  We hope that you will come and visit us again soon!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice stay, mostly suited for families,buzzing with kids
Summary: Stayed in this hotel with my wife and 1.5yr old. Nice stay for kids,families ppl.Enjoyed the buffet breakfast and happy hour. Typical embassy suite hotel with lots of value for your stay.The pool was always crowded with lots of kids all the time. Business center is very helpful. They charge you $15 for parking but the spots are too close for parking watch out if you are driving bigger vehicles.Nice location,close to disneyland,huntington beach and newport beach,stripmalls and other freeways to LA.The waterfront in the ground floor is filled with turtles,fishes etc., which my 1.5yr old enjoyed a lot during the stay. Nice ambience and a good family hotel.
Manager Response: TripperAroundTheWorld,  Thank you so much for the great review!  We are so pleased to hear that you had a great time and that your 1yo enjoyed our turtles and koi.  I hope that you will visit us again on your next trip to the Orange County Airport Area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: We enjoy all of the amenities at Embassy Suites. It is our hotel of choice when we travel. The staff at this branch was impressive. The bartender for the Manager's evening reception knew how to mix whatever drink requested. He was very quick and congenial. The omelet chef at breakfast was equally efficient. The morning crew kept the breakfast items supplied in full and cleaned tables quickly. I am used to slow service almost everywhere so this service was noticed and appreciated.
Manager Response: Ronnie,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review about our stay.  It is one of our top priorities to provide each of our guests warm and friendly service in addition providing a location that allows you to make memories that will last a lifetime.  We hope that you will come and see us again soon!  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Where to start.. The rooms are dark and smell like mold. With the smell and the amount of moisture in the air it was making me sick. We went swimming the day we got to the hotel and the next day our swimwear was still soaking wet. That should tell you something. When we got home we had to wash all our clothes imidiately to get that smell out.  And on top of it all the room was freezing cold. And yes the swimming.. The pool is ok but the "hot"tub, it had cold water in it and it was dirty and even that had a weird smell. Couldn't be there more than a minute.  The wifi: nonexistent. Parkinlot is too small ang tight. We had to drive around for 20 minutes before we got a spot to squeeze our car into. Breakfast was nothing but ordinary. Everything was constantly out so you had to make
Manager Response: Dear Saija81,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry you were unhappy with your stay. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: I don't like to dump on places online but will share my experience. Take it for what you will.  1. Maids would only leave 3 towels for 4 people until we gave them bigger tips 2. Shower head exploded and it took 4 calls to get someone to fix it 3. Multiple times no one answered when we called down to the front desk 4. $15 a day to park
Manager Response: RyanMaz,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay.  I was saddened to read that there were areas where we failed to meet your expectations.  Please know that I will be sharing your comments with our front office manager, executive housekeeper, and chief engineer.  I believe it is important to learn from these experiences, retool processes where necessary, and train our staff accordingly.  I hope that you will still consider us again in the future.  Very respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Older Embassy.  All the usual amenities, breakfast, cocktail hour, two room suite.  Hotel staff was accommodating. Only negative on this trip was room temperature.  Cannot control temp. between 50 and 70 degrees..  Consequently our room was constantly cold and had to ask for blankets for warmth.  We were on opposite side of swimming pool  Have not had this problem with visit before this one.
Manager Response: Richard M,  Thank you very much for your review of your recent stay.  I was saddened to read that you were cold during your stay.  However, if a bright side can be found, I'm glad that our staff was warm and accommodating to your needs.  I hope that you will visit us again on your next trip to the Orange County Airport area.  Very respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Public space is gorgeous, rooms dated
Summary: The parlor of my suite had the stale smell of an old room and looked in need of refurbishing.  The bedroom was fine with a comfortable bed and pillows and a nice city view.  The staff were all very nice and helpful.  Met an old friend in their restaurant and they let us stay there talking even after it was officially closed.  Would definitely come back.  Excellent value for the cost.
Manager Response: Joanp41,  Thank you so much for your friendly review.  It is so great to know that you thought our staff was nice and helpful!  Please know that beginning next month, we will be beginning a major renovation of the hotel, including both public spaces and guest rooms.  Hopefully, these major changes combine with our great services will make your future stays extraordinary! Thank you again for the review and we hope to see you again soon.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Good Option when WiFi is working
Summary: I was here for a business trip.  The hotel met my expectations for a clean, and breakfast hearty hotel with amenities that school groups and leisure travelers should consider.  Let other Embassy Suites, the roomed are spacious, yet standard.  The breakfast options and manager happy hour are both extensive and consistent well served.  I would have to say the Wifi is inconsistent (coverage would be good near one part of the room, but would drop or timeout when moving away).  Which is unusual for me as I always have great experiences from a Hilton chain.  The stay met my expectations and would still make a recommendation to leisure and business travelers.
Manager Response: Fastball16,  Thank you very much for your review of your stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport North.  I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us.  One of our big capital projects for 2016 is improving our guest Wi-Fi experience.  The hotel and AT&T have been working up a new plan and I would expected to see a whole new offering beginning in Q2 of 2016.    Thank you again for review. We look forward to seeing you around the hotel again.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Clean facility with a friendly and helpful staff.  Parking is a bit of pain and lounge should explore craft/local unique beers and a new menu.  been the same old stuff for years time for a change.  facility is always in a state of renovation.  however, it is handled with little disturbance to guests.
Manager Response: Mitchealk,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport North.  I was so glad to ready your positive comments about our friendly and helpful staff.  It was also nice to see that our guests notice that we're always doing little projects to constantly improve the guest experience.    At the beginning of December, please stop by the Sweet Spot Sports Bar & Grille.  We'll be releasing our winter menu that has some more hearty items in addition to popular standard menu items.  Mitchealk, thank you again for the review!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Check in by Emily and Matt was great - thay are an awesome duo! Great customer service!!! The hotel was clean and quiet. Wifi was a bit weak and AC / Heat system was weird but it was California. GREAT STAY!
Manager Response: 62arig,  Thank you so much for the comments regarding Emily and Matt!  I will personally be sharing your review with them and the entire management team.  I hope that you will come back and visit us again sometime soon.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Stayed at this hotel recently and will not return.  They have a 2 pipe HVAC system which operates on heat, cool, or neutral (for the entire hotel).  So you have minimal control of the temperature of your own room.  My southern facing room had been heated by the mid- afternoon California sun to about 85 degrees before I arrived and since the system was in "neutral" there was nothing I could do to cool it down.
Manager Response: SafetyPro5,  Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to review your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana ‚Äì Orange County Airport.  I was very saddened to read about the HVAC troubles that you encountered during your stay.  Please accept my apology on behalf of the hotel for the difficulties you experienced with our HVAC system.  Having staying in the hotel many times before, I can certainly understand what a guest experiences and the challenges that it presents for our guests.  The hotel has a 2 pipe system, which was state of the art when the hotel opened up in 1984.  However, in 2015, it leave some definite challenges to all parties concerned.  With the concrete construction of all of our guest room walls, it has prevented the hotel from upgrading the system to current 4 or 6 pipe systems which allow a guest to dial in a temperature more to their liking.    Thank you again for bring your experience to our attention and I hope that you will still consider us again in the future.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Could only use wifi in sitting room section of our suite. Staff was courteous, professional and helpful. Sweet Spot bar definitely is not up to its name; one bartender wiped our table with a dry napkin when asked to clean it, the drinks were weak, bartender did not know how to make a drink - the garnish goes ON TOP, not on bottom. Room was large and comfortable, but glad it wasn't summertime because AC controls are very limited. Central AC - pro is that it's not a noisy little crappy wall unit, con is your temp ranges are limited. Being a wildlife nerd, my fav part was the fish and turtles in the lobby. Sadly, they are going to remove the ponds in a future remodel.
Manager Response: Crbmtb,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport.  We appreciate the feed back and friendly comments.  Although we will be removing the koi and turtle ponds during the hotels renovation, we will still have great water features to add a relaxing sound to our lush atriums.  We hope that you will visit us again sometime soon!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Embassy Suites @John Wayne Airport BEDBUGS, BEDBUGS, BEDBUGS  This was my regular stay in OC but the property has gone down drastically Property shows aging and appears dirty. Air conditioning system is straight out of the 1960s. You have either heat or cool depending on the season  No choice.  For the rate charged at this property you should expect much more. Hilton Honors member can expect a gift when checking in. Two bottles of water, it doesn't get any better than this. WiFi did not work. Breakfast was great.
Manager Response: Bob,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience with us and for answering our message to you via this platform to identify your reservation with us.  We were able to locate your claim, staff communications, and inspection reports.    Please know that your report that the room might have bed bug activity was taken very seriously.  Following in line with Hilton Worldwide‚Äôs national policy, any report of potential activity causes the room to be placed out of order until a licenses pest control company can thoroughly inspect the room. Our pest control partner, Terminix inspected the guest room you stayed in and found no bed bugs.  Additionally, there was no other pest activity found in the room and subsequent guests that have occupied the room since your stay have not reported any claims.  For your piece of mind, I have emailed, to your personal email address, Terminix‚Äôs inspection report stating that there was no bed bugs found in the room you occupied.  Thank you again for letting us know about your concerns.  We hope you will still consider staying with us again.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: What happens when you don't make a reservation . . .
Summary: We didn't think we needed a reservation for a Tuesday and Wednesday, but we couldn't be more wrong. The Embassy Suites we wanted in Irvine was full and so were a lot of other hotels for reasons still unclear to us, so we took what we could find. The room was average and over $200/night. There was a ginormous clump of black hair in the shower on white marble, so it boggles me how they missed it. Took the photo to the manager and he was very nice and comp'd the room for the night. We weren't even asking for that, but it was very kind and much appreciated. Two nights for $200 wasn't bad at all. Thanks, Embassy Suites. We'll remember your kindness next time we're in Irvine.
Manager Response: Caserini,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  I am so sorry read about the cleanliness issue which you encountered; however, I am very glad to read that the team went above and beyond to rectify the situation.  At Embassy Suites by Hilton, it is our service commitment that, "If you're not satisfied with your stay, let us know and we'll make it right."  We look forward to having you stay with us again.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: They ignored a Diamond member and made excuses along the way to justify it. Experienced issues with Housekeeping, Reservation, and A/C. I wish I could go a different route, and I will for sure net time.
Manager Response: Jared,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry you were unhappy with our your stay here. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. The condition of our suites is very important to us as we aim to provide guests with the best accommodations and service. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.   Sincerely, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Embassy Suites Santa Anna is a beautiful place for an excellent price. The staff is friendly and helpful. The rooms are big and comfortable. You get all the perks of the brand. The location makes it convenient to many activities. We had an excellent stay.
Manager Response: Marcia,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review.  We are so happy that you enjoy your stay.  Hopefully, you'll be able to get down from northern California sometime soon and stay with us again!  Hope you have a great Thanksgiving and holiday season!  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Extremely poor service and room conditions! Do yourselves a favor and stay away from this property! The A/C system in the rooms is archaic! Entire hotel is on a single setting so you're unable to control the climate in your room.
Manager Response: David,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry you were unhappy with our suites and service. Guest comfort and service are our top priorities and we regret you did not experience this. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.   Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Both the suite and the hotel provided room to stretch and walk around.  The indoor pool and fitness area appeared well used, but spacious.  The made to order omelettes were wonderful!  Excellent choice for a family or business trip.
Manager Response: Joanne,  Thank you so much for the great comments!  Having a spacious sweet is one of the perks associated with the Embassy Suites by Hilton.  Our guest suites are by far larger that the average hotel room and offer two separate area if you wanted to keep the kids in the front watching cartoons and parents in the back watching the news!  So glad to hear you had an enjoyable stay with us.  I hope you consider us again on your future travels to Orange County from the Moreno Valley area.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Spent three nights at this hotel when my wife and I first arrived in California and then one more the night before our flight home the following week (after attending a conference in Palm Springs). The first stay we had a premium room on the 10th floor, the second a king suite on the 7th. Surprisingly, the first room had newer and nicer furnishings than the second even though the layouts were the same. Furniture in the second seemed well worn and needing replacement. Wi-fi was impossible to stay connected to on both visits. The breakfast was very good and we enjoyed the complimentary reception in the evenings. Probably would stay there again.
Manager Response: GatorDWV,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport.  We couldn't agree more that our rooms are ready for a refresh and our renovation is slated to begin the first week in December.  We couldn't be more excited!  The renovation is going to cover both guest rooms and public spaces.  We hope that you will come back and see us again on your future travels to Southern California.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Checked in to my room and it smelled terrible! Bedroom had a dehumidify in it due to mold. Could not believe they would check someone into that room. Front desk staff very apologetic. Was to stay there 7 nights, barely last 1
Manager Response: Lorraine,  Thank you very much for the comments regarding your recent stay.  I'm sorry to hear that you were checked into a room that was being worked on by our Engineering team.  I will personally be reviewing this situation with our Front Office and Engineering management teams to identify what lead you to be checked into a room under repair and prevent the issue from occurring in the future.  I greatly appreciate your feedback and still hope that you will visit us again in the future.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: When we checked in, my wife told our hotelier Chantal that we were celebrating our oldest daughter's 21st birthday.  To our great surprise and excitement, Chantal sent up a complimentary slice of cheesecake and a bottle of wine to help us celebrate!  We experienced world-class service and accomodations at our favorite place to stay.
Manager Response: Gordon,  Thank you so much for the shining post!!  I have personally shared your post with Chantal and the entire management team.  Although the travel from Chino to Santa Ana is relatively close, I hope that you will come back and stay with us soon. Thank you again for the stellar comments and I hope that you had a magnificent birthday!  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: For a week, this was a fine place to stay. Close to work, close to good dining choices, and well run facility. Staff were friendly and helpful. The breakfast choices were plentiful. The happy hours was simple but fine.   The room was good size, and the bed was quite comfortable (as hotels beds go). My room faced the second set of elevators but I did not hear them. The "ding" is shut off at night. The room was clean and well kept.   You need to rent a car to get around in Orange County. The public transportation is not convenient. Taxis and Uber are available.
Manager Response: ColbertGD,  Thank you so much for your positive review.  It is always great to be able to share reviews, such as yours, with the entire Embassy Suites team at our monthly employee luncheons.  They are always so motivational and uplifting.  We look forward to having you stay with us again when your travels bring you back to the area.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Love, love, love, love Embassy Suites! The beds are comfortable, the rooms are clean and the living room separating the bedroom from the entrance makes couple's time all the more intimate (the Mrs. isn't as quiet and reserved, if you know what I mean).  The made-to-order breakfast is great. The atrium is beautiful to wake up to. The location is close to the airport and 10 minutes to Disneyland, 15 minutes from the beach.
Manager Response: Greg,  Thank you so much for your kind comments about your recent stay with us.  I much agree that we have a great location and are close to all of the popular Orange County amenities.   I hope that you will come back and visit us again on your next visit to the area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Room was not properly cleaned prior to arrival. Found used wash cloth in bed after pulling down covers. Microwave on floor making it difficult to use. Smoke alarm went off in spurts every 10 seconds for 2 hours starting at 5AM and light switch just inside front door was not working. Smelled sewer odor in bathroom area and this area was only large enough for 1 person at a time.
Manager Response: Gregg,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport.  I was sorry to read about your less than satisfactory stay.  I have personally shared your comments with our Director of Housekeeping so that she can take corrective actions with her team.  Thank you again for you review, I hope you will still consider us again on your future travels to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: This ES location is lacking greatly. It is not up to par of other ES locations. Bad odors, poor hospitality, parking fee, dirty sheets, etc. I was given information that wasn't true and based our room choice on it. Not happy and staff did not fix problems we had during our stay. Will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Erin,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry you were unhappy with our your stay here. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.   Sincerely, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: During my 3 night stay at this hotel - I was treated very well.  All of the staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful.  The Shuttle driver - David - was ultimate touch to a good stay, as he provided safe, and friendly transportation (6 times during my stay), while providing good information and directions.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Douglas,  Thank you so much for your kind comments regarding your recent stay.  I will be sharing your sentiments with our General Manager, Director of Guest Services, and of course, David.  I'm sure it will make his day!  We look forward to seeing you again when your travels bring you back to the area.    Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Maintenance man walked into my room announced!!!
Summary: Checked in after a long flight.  Walked into my room and the AC was not working.  They switched me into another room right away.  2nd room has had a musty / febreeze smell.  Worst of all is that I just had a MAINTENANCE MAN WALKED INTO MY ROOM UNANNOUNCED.  HE DID NOT BOTHER ASKING IF ANYONE WAS IN THE ROOM EVEN THOUGH THE LIGHTS & TV WERE ON.  I walked from the bedroom to the front LR area and was shocked to see this maintenance man in my room.  I screamed for him to get out. He said he was told that the room was empty.   Called the front desk, the supv. offered a free night but that doesn't begin to lessen the blow of a very scary experience.  Mistakes can happen, but this maintenance man could have at least announced himself when he walked in.  I will NEVER stay at this hotel
Manager Response: Kfsupermom,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience at our hotel.  We certainly appreciate the feedback.  Please accept my apology on behalf of the hotel.  I can share your shock at having someone enter your room, and I realize what a potentially embarrassing position in which this can put both parties.   Please be assured that this type of mix-up s extremely rate and we do have safeguards in place that greatly reduce its possibility.  I have personally talked the situation over with our Director of Engineering and heeded your recommendation at announcing yourself when entering any room, regardless of if it is occupied or vacant.    Thank you again for sharing your thought.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: We arrived from a long flight to be picked up at the airport and delivered to the Suites.  The shuttle driver, the valet/bellmen, and Matt at the front desk were welcoming, fun, efficient and helpful-- what more can you want. Oh, except maybe a clean, comfortable and quiet room, which we had as well.  I had been worried about the negative reviews, but I didn't have any of the issues others have cited.    The breakfast was good--omelet station, eggs, breakfast meats, potatoes, baked goods, fruits, both cut and whole; oatmeal and a selection of cold cereals, juices, milk, coffees and tea. I think that one could stay for awhile without duplicating.   We didn't participate in the Happy Hour, but overheard other guests at breakfast saying it and the breakfast really made their stay.
Manager Response: AkGal43,  Thank you so much for the great review.  The team here at the hotel is very eager to see the designer rendering for the upcoming renovation starting in December.  There are many facets of this hotel that we would like to retain, however, we know that we must also update to Embassy Suites by Hilton's current image and direction.  I'm sure everything will turn out awesome!  We hope to see you again on your future travels from Alaska.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel twice in the past two months.  It's a very nice hotel like others in this chain.  We stayed in the same corner room and it was very quiet.  Unfortunately, both times were during a heat wave in the 90's and 100's, so we couldn't open the windows during the night.  We got used to the constant hum of the air conditioning system from the bathroom.  One drawback is you have to pay for overnight parking, but the breakfast buffet and manager's reception make up for it!  We plan to stay here during our visits over the next two years to visit our daughter who's in a master's program in Irvine.
Manager Response: Toywoon,  Thank you so much for the great comments about your stay.  We are so glad to hear that you have plans to come back and visit us several times over the next couple of years.  Repeat business is an awesome compliment!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: The hotel is clean and quiet despite the number of children who stay there for the Disney experience. Located next to 55, it is in a convenient location for exploring Orange Co., and the seaside cities.  The complementary breakfast is beyond all expectations, but rise early if you enjoy a nice quiet breakfast.  The expensive pay-for-parking was a surprise, but necessary with the other hotels vying  for space. The Hell's Angels stayed there the same weekend, but parked two bikes per space. The hotel staff is very strict concerning the parking and were willing to call out a wrecker service for individuals who took up more than one space with a vehicle.  The only bummer part of our stay was a female desk clerk who was very rude and snobbish. The other staff members were extremely
Manager Response: Gene,  Thank you very much for your warm review of the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback and hope that you will come back and visit us again.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Hotel is ready for renovation which is scheduled for the end of the year.  Had a special price for a 7 plus day stay which included free parking , Premium wifi. Breakfast and evening managers special (happy hour) was average, although the cook to order omelets are always a big hit.  All staff encountered was very nice and responsive for the most part.  Phone didn't work for the entire week I was there. Maintenance took a look and said it is the phone company problem and he would call it in. No offer to change rooms with a working phone.  Employees should be trained to report this type of issue to the front desk so that they can address it.  I was satisfied with the hotel and would stay there again.
Manager Response: 345eileenh,  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts on your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport.  I am so glad to see that you thought we were an excellent value and our package offerings meet your needs.  We are very excited for the upcoming renovation and can't wait till we receive our color boards to share with everyone.  Thank you again for staying with us and I hope you will visit us again soon!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner  Assistant General Manager

Summary: Enjoyed the hotel and staff. Enjoyed the complementary breakfast with the many different choices. Liked the ambiance and pool. Close to freeway and easy to get to business locations. I rate the hotel and service as very good.
Manager Response: Edward,  Thank you very much for your kind comments.  It is always great to hear from satisfied customers.  I hope will visit us again when your travels bring you back to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: A beautiful lobby is about the only redeeming feature.  Room smelled moldy - desk chairs from the 1980's, shortage of outlets and a fan in the bathroom that rattled and wouldn't turn off.  Food at the evening reception was a joke.  Saw at least three people at the front desk over two days complaining about something.  Had to return my dinner from the bar & grill - it was dried out and tasteless.  Worst Embassy stay ever.
Manager Response: Michael,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana orange County Airport.  I'm very sorry to ready that you were dissatisfied with your stay.  Please know that the experience you encountered is not typical of Embassy Suites by Hilton or what the brand has become to be known for worldwide.  I hope that you will consider trying us again in the future.    Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: My husband and I brought or granddaughters, 4 and 7 years old, with us to take them to the zoo. We chose Embassy Suites for it's outstanding reputation. We wanted to ensure we were in a comfortable room, with services that could be utilized for the girls. We were delighted upon arrival. This facility was not only clean and comfortable, it was pleasing to the eye. Unfortunately, I was disappointed in two things. First, Disney was not a channel offered so that the girls could watch appropriate shows. Second, the pool itself was chilly. I did not expect it to be very warm, yet the chilly factor was a problem. My 7 year old granddaughter had asked that we stay in a place with an indoor pool for her to swim in. This was the "selling point" in choosing this facility over others. It
Manager Response: Invkjt,  Thank you so much for your positive review.  I'm sorry to hear that the pool was a little cold for your taste and that the Disney channel is not in our television lineup.  Please know that we do offer Nickelodeon and their family of channels, incuding NickJr for your grandchildren's entertainment.  I hope that you will still consider us again for your future travels to the Orange County Airport area.    Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Nice hotel but the room we stayed in needs some major TLC.  The bathroom sink had a crack and a funny smell and it appeared it had been there for some time. The ceiling by the balcony door was also peeling from water damage. We noticed fruit flies in the living area by the sink and when we got ready to check out there was a fly floating in the coffee cup. We notified the maintenance on duty before we checked out. On the upside the room was very quiet and the view from the balcony was beautiful and the breakfast was very good. I just think that the hotel needs to do a better job at cleaning, up keeping and repairs.
Manager Response: Christy,  Thank your taking the time out of your busy schedule to review your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport.  We greatly appreciate the feedback and I will be personally sharing your comments with our Chief Engineer and Director of Housekeeping.  Thank you again for your review.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Nice comfortable space for a family of 6.  Thank your to hotel manager Victor for sending a little surprise treat for my son's birthday!  Food was great and managers special was awesome!!  I would totally recommend this hotel.   Only issue was the wifi will come and go.  Having 2 teenagers in our trip causes issues for them. Not so much for me. :)
Manager Response: Xochitl,  Thank you so much for your kind words.  We greatly appreciate the positive feedback and an opportunity to make your son's birthday a special one.  Please come back and see us again on your next trip to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Only issue was that I thought I was getting free parking & wasn't aware of the $15/night fee until checkout. Also the remote for the TV in the bedroom area was a bit tricky to figure out. Otherwise, everything was great.
Manager Response: William,  Thank you very much for your review of your recent stay. Please accept my apology that you were unaware of our paid parking offering.  I will pass your review along to our communications team who makes sure all of our booking channels are aware of our paid parking offering.  Additionally, I will personally double check our website, where your reservation was booked, and automated confirmation letters to make sure the parking information is correctly listed for all guests to review.  I hope that you will come back and see us again on your future travels to the area.    Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: We were here for my 50th high school reunion and were extremely happy with everything at the Embassy Suites.  Our past reunion gatherings were at the Embassy in Anaheim and it was relocated to Santa Ana due to construction and are so happy with you all.
Manager Response: Linda!  Thank you so much for your wonderful review!  It was great having you high school's reunion here at the hotel.  I hope for future years, that you will consider Santa Ana as your prime location.    Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Not a bad place to stay for business.  Staff friendly and professional.  Rooms very nice but baths very small.  They need to upgrade A/C and heating systems. Room either a little warm or cool Parking can be a problem. Doesn't seem to be enough space sometimes Nice little bar with great staff Would recommend for business stay
Manager Response: Lope1430,  Thank you so much for your kind comments!  We are a favorite of business guests in the area with an ideal location in Orange County.  So glad to hear that you would recommend us to other future guests.  We hope you come back and join us again too!  Thank you again for your review.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: A fine stay but it's time for a renovation
Summary: I know just what to expect when I stay at this brand: cooked to order breakfast, evening drinks and a little more space than a normal hotel room. I got all that.   The staff was nice, the valets very friendly but the overall look of the hotel, while once grand is now tired and worn. I believe a remodel is coming and would stay here again after it's done.   The parking lot was often full to the gills and the spaces were very small for our full sized rental car.
Manager Response: Didntwinthelotto,  Thank you very much for the kind comments about our service and product.  You are certainly correct that a renovation is coming and we couldn't be more excited!  Construction is scheduled to begin the first week of December.  We look forward to having you again as our guest!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: would highly recommend to anyone. excellent service; convenient location. breakfast was excellent. couldn't ask for a better place to stay. We even left something in the  room and the staff located it 2 days later and sent to us.
Manager Response: SomeBeach55,  Thank you so much for taking the time of your busy schedule to review your recent stay with us.  I am so delighted to hear that you had an excellent stay with us!  It is one of our goals to provide each of our guests with a magnificent stay.  I hope that you will come and visit us again on your future travels to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: I have had good experiences here in the past.  However, on September 17 I stayed here and was given a room on the third floor. The room smelled horrible. It was dirty. I went downstairs and requested another room. Management only offered to send housekeeping up to my room. Upon returning to my room after dinner, I could tell someone sprayed for Fabreeze inside the room. However, the room smelled very musty and disgusting.The hotel staff told me there was nothing more they could do as they were sold out. I advised the hotel staff that my stay was unsatisfactory. Hotel staff indicated they would speak with the manager about about making it right. Over a week has passed and I have not heard from the management. I left a voicemail for the manager and have not received a return call.
Manager Response: RM,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  Please accept my apologies that the my front office managers have been unresponsive to your needs.  As I am unable to identify who you are from your posting, please know I am available to address you concerns if you choose to reach out to me personally.    Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: This hotel needs renovation and smelled musty.  Upon return to my room after a long day, I found a dehumidifier and two other machines running in my room.  Apparently the rain that day had cause the carpet in my room to get wet (the room was on the third floor!).  It took three visits or calls to the front desk to get the machines removed from my room so I could retire for the evening.  The staff was not very caring or attentive to my concern.  I would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Maureen,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay with us.  Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel for the water intrusion that you experienced.  It is certainly not a typical encounter to have at an Embassy Suites by Hilton.  I hope you will give us another opportunity on your future travels to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: This hotel was great. I stayed there because it is walking distance from the office. The staff were accomodating and made my staff nice. The room was clean and spacious. The fitness center was small but nice to use. I wish the tv access on the treadmill work but that is minor. The breakfast was great! The hotel is a short Uber from The District shopping area too.
Manager Response: Sarah,  Thank you so much for your kind comments!  It is always great to hear from our business travelers; especially since you're always on the go.  We hope that you will come back and see is again soon.    Warmest Regards! Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Not too shabby, especially for the price
Summary: Yes, this hotel is on the older side, and yes it is due for a remodel, but you really can't beat the price, and it really isn't that bad.  If you feel like splurging at a newer Embassy Suites, then there is another newer one in Irvine, but be prepared to spend an extra $50 a night there, or any of the other decent chain hotels in the area.  For the price, in this area, you really can't do much better. Free made-to-order breakfast each morning, happy hour with complimentary cocktails, and other perks.  It is annoying that they started charging for parking. Last time we were there we were using Uber, but I believe parking was only $10 or something, (less if you are a diamond member, I think) which is much less than the $25-$30 most hotels charge for parking.  The staff is
Manager Response: Kayla,  Thank you so much for the positive review.  We certainly appreciate your recognition of the many amenities the hotel has to offer and the many complimentary features.  We will be beginning our renovation in December 2015; which will include both guest rooms and public spaces.  We look forward to have you as our guest again in the future.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Fee for parking now, housekeeping knocking despite Do Not Disturb
Summary: This place has several things going - good location, made to order breakfast, and cocktail hour.  Unfortunately, the addition of a daily parking fee has brought down my rating of this place by a notch.  As many of you hate the so-called 'resort fees' you encounter elsewhere, it's no different with this parking fee.  Tip to management - roll in the cost with the room fee so customers do not feel ripped off.  It's an easy solution that any first-year MBA student can solve.  Also, despite the "Do Not Disturb" sign in the keylock - and despite the time before the check-out 12:00pm - housekeeper insisted on knocking on my door.  I was working in the room so I ignored her/him.  She/he tried to get in, but the secondary door lock prevented her/him from entering.  "Do Not Disturb" means
Manager Response: ydrone,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience about your stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport.  We greatly appreciate the feedback and I will personally relay your concerns regarding housekeeping procedures to my director of housekeeping.  A basic function of any housekeeping department should be respecting a do not disturb sign before the coordinated checkout time.  Please accept my apology on behalf of the hotel for our failure to respect yours.  To respond to your concern about parking, the hotel's management team did strongly consider rolling parking into the room rate.  However, we had to take into consideration the thousands of guests that come to us each year via the John Wayne Airport and never use our parking lot offering.  As an alternative to the separate charge, the hotel has created inclusive packages that are available to all of our guests.  One of our most popular packages is the "get it all free" package which includes parking and premium Wi-Fi service.    Thank you again for taking the time to share your experience.  I hope that you will stay with us again when your travels bring you back to the Orange County Airport area.  Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: very relaxing stay at this hotel.. the managers cocktail hour is fantastic as well as the morning breakfast.. Great job done with those!  Rooms were comfortable and large.. I guess my only negative comment would be that the trash in the front of the hotel as most of the trash cans were overflowing with garbage and they stayed like that until we checked out.
Manager Response: Vgham,  Thank you so much for your positive comments and praise of our complimentary cooked to order breakfast and evening cocktail reception.  Additionally, it would be my pleasure to communicate your concerns about our trash cans to our Director of Housekeeping.  Thank you again for your feedback.  We hope that you will stay with us again on your future travels to the OC Airport area.  Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: This property needs to be remodeled today not months from now
Summary: The people working here were all excellent from the time we arrived to people responsible for breakfast to cleaning crew.  What was bad was how  worn down the facility had become. The smell in the rooms not so nice, the chips everywhere in the paint, the parking which one pays extra -some days no parking available. And the quality of food for the free breakfast was not that of Embassy in the past. For example pancakes no longer made by a chief but reminded me of cold Eggos not warm .  I read the reviews for this place going in. I was prepared but Hilton has a brand and it is quality. Why was this place not fixed up sooner..?...This is not Quality except for the help.
Manager Response: Myr1944,  Thank you so much for the positive comments regarding the staff here at the hotel.  It is certainly one of our goals to provide excellent service to our guests.  I am happy to share that beginning the first week of December, we will be under renovation.  During this expansive multimillion renovation, we have renewed public space and guest room.  I hope that you will still consider us again in the future.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Perfect place to stay for Disneyland and visiting our daughter and family.  Breakfast is terrific, wide choice but as an added attraction there is a bridge with a waterfall and lots of turtles and Koi fish.  The most we counted while sitting at our table was 22 Koi fish and 10 turtles entertaining us all at once.
Manager Response: SusankV9590CK,  Thank you so much for the glowing review!!  Embassy Suite by Hilton's complimentary made-to-order breakfast is one our cornerstone offerings and can add a huge cost savings to any family's stay.  We are so glad you enjoyed our lush open atrium and water features too!  We hope you will come back and see us again soon.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Just too noisy for a comfortable weekend stay
Summary: I used to love staying at Embassy Suites hotels. Unfortunately, this hotel has just become much too noisy during weekends, filled with kids running recklessly through the lobby and hallways. The added cost of parking recently added does nothing to make the stay more enjoyable. Since there are other Hilton properties close by, I would suggest business travelers avoid this property on the weekends. I thought we were far enough away from Disneyland to avoid some of the commotion; I was wrong. The morning breakfast is worth skipping. Head over to one of the plentiful restaurants near South Coast Plaza or even ones down in Newport Beach.   The hotel rooms are standard fare for Embassy suites. The bathrooms in this hotel are just small.
Manager Response: Acoach,  Thank you for your review and your recent stay with us.  I was saddened to read that the hotel's weekend mix of guests did not meet your travel needs.  However, we certainly appreciate the feedback and your comments on our parking offering.  I hope that you will still consider us again on your future travels to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: We stayed here for work for over 6 weeks and the staff was amazing during our stay.  the Hotel is dated but the they do there best.  Breakfast is great to have every morning.  Only negative is the internet is the worst.  Cuts in and out a lot,  it made it very hard to get work done.
Manager Response: Leftywalk,  Thank you very much for your great review about our service!  Also, thank you for the feedback on our internet.  It is something that is actively on our radar and we are always looking for new innovative ideas from our purveyor and system manager, AT&T, to increase the guest experience.   We hope that you will come back and see us again in the future.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Location is very convenient to Orange County Airport (SNA) as well as Disney and Newport Beach.  Two-room concept with a living and separate bedroom area is helpful for travel with 3 kids ages 4, 6, and 11.    The bathroom was super small -- definitely only one person at a time -- bonus I guess if you want to sit down on the toilet and brush your teeth at the same time -- it is that small.    Biggest complaint was this hotel was very dirty -- dirty carpeting (white socks became dark after walking in the room), many guests left bags of food and room service in the hallway that were not picked up for hours, our room was not cleaned all day -- we were offered housekeeping at 5pm (not helpful), lobby floor had sticky tiles and dirty carpeting.    We stayed 2 nights -- after second
Manager Response: DTD28,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana Orange County Airport.  We appreciate the feedback as it helps us to continuiously improve our guest expierence.  We hope you will consider us again for your future trips to the Orange County Airport area.  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Although I live just a short distance from the hotel, it affords me the opportunity to spend quality time with out of town friends.  Proximity to John Wayne Airport and the excellent amenities make this my first choice.
Manager Response: Mavis,  Thank you so much for great review!  I'm glad we can be your local home away from home to meet with friends and family.  Please feel free to come back and visit us any time!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel twice and although it is dated it still is a fine choice for accomidation. The staff are very friendly and helpful and the complimentary Breakfast tatsy and Happy Hour is nice to enjoy after a busy day.The Wi-Fi can be spotty in some rooms.
Manager Response: BStatham,  Thank you so much for your positive review.  It is always great to have return guests come to visit us.  Hopefully we will get to see you again soon!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel two times now while visiting Disneyland. We love this hotel and all it's amenities and staff. The location is just a short trip to Disneyland and easy to get to the parking and back to the freeway. We would highly recommend for anyone to stay here.
Manager Response: Joanne,  Thank you so much for your great review of our hotel!  I agree that we have an awesome location that is convenient to so many places.  Within 20 minutes, you can be anywhere in the county; including Disneyland, the airport, Huntington Beach, Newport Beach, Fashion Island, South Coast Plaza, Angels Stadium and the Honda Center.  I hope you will come back and visit us soon.  Warmest Regards! Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Great valet staff, great hotel, great price!
Summary: My friends and I stayed at this hotel for a mini reunion of six lifelong friends. We booked two rooms and this hotel was perfect for what we needed and at a very economical rate! I must commend two of the valet staff, Ron and Salvador, who were outstanding throughout our stay. They always greeted us with a smile and asked if we needed any assistance or directions and even helped load our cars on our departure date even though we had self parked. Delightful young men who represent this hotel and create a great first and lasting impression!! Thank you again Ron and Savadore!  Our check in was effortless and quick. The atrium is beautiful and very peaceful looking as you walk in the hotel and to the elevator. We were concerned from reading reviews of this hotel that the air
Manager Response: Debbie,  Thank you so much for your stellar review!!  It is wonderful to know so many of our our team memebers were on point to make your stay a memorable one that will bring you back again.  I'll be sure to share your comments with the breakfast team and valet crew as well.  They are all awesome employees!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: room had mold and ants the 1st night and with no spare room to move into we were stuck in this pre-paid room, air could not keep up which gave room a musty smell. breakfast was excellant especially the lady at the omlet bar she was fun to watch work
Manager Response: Frank,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your thoughts on your recent stay.  Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel for the less enjoyable stay you had.  A clean and well cared for room is essential to any successful hotel operation.  More disappointing is we have an excellent housekeeping management team and can do better on ensuring a guest room is fully ready for a guest.  I am sorry to hear that we were unable to move your rooms due to the sold out night.  I hope that you see this stay as the exception and not the rule for the product and service that we provide our guests.  Please consider us again on your future travels to the area.    Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: I stayed in this hotel due to it's proximity to the airport. I called earlier in the day to let them know I would be checking in late. When I arrived the front desk already had me checked in and my room ready they just handed me a key and gave me directions to my room. No paperwork!!! The valet service is top notch. The guys were wonderful.   I do have a couple of complaints. The bathrooms are very small compared to other Embassy Suites and the HVAC system. You really do not have control of the temperature in the room. Depending on the outside temp you either get heat, neutral air or ac. All controlled by the hotel.
Manager Response: Sherri,  Thank you so much for the positive comments about our serivce!  We work hard to make sure each one of our guests have and enjoyable stay.  As part of our upcoming renovation, the guest room HVAC system is an area that we will be addressing.
