I hope that you will still consider us for your future travels to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Buffet-style Breakfast is still the best
Summary: Good breakfast,  however, while I understand location is the key, biggest negative is parking will cost upward of $15-$19 per night, even for customers and at times, may not be able to find a parking space
Manager Response: Keith,  Thank you very much for your feedback and comments.  I can cerntainly understand you qualms about the parking fee, we were even hesitatnt to being managing our parking as well.  However, due to unauthorized vehicles, guest from other hotels using our lot, and those looking for parking near the airport, we were forced to bring in a company to manage the lot and ensure parking for our registered guests.  In fact, we were the last full service hotel in Santa Ana, Irvine, Tustin, Costa Mesa, and Newport Beach to start charging for parking.  But, if a bright side can be found, when our self parking area is full, the valet team will valet your car for you at the self parking rate.  It is our goal to make sure each of our guests always have a place to park!  Thank you again for your comments!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: I truly loved this Embassy Suites hotel.  I got a courteous early checkin, complimentary breakfast, and a great happy hour.  They are conveniently located near restaurants and the Orange County airport and business areas,  I will definitely return and stay here again.
Manager Response: Ckckckckckck,  Thank you so much for the positive feedback!  It is wonderful to hear that you will join us again on future trips to the area.  Come back soon!  Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: I never actually signed up to use the valet service but that did not matter to the whole valet group. They helped me time and time again! One morning we got up to go to Disneyland and my rental car had a flat tire. They called a cab for me and then put my spare tire on when I was at the park.  The next day when I was getting nowhere with the rent a car place .. they stayed by my side, kept asking if they could help, and kept me laughing instead of crying! If the parking lot was full - they volunteered to park my car for free! I could go on and on with examples how they made my week at the hotel wonderful! Special shout out to Ron and Scott ... but the whole valet stuff was awesome!
Manager Response: NS,  Thank you so much for the VERY kind comments regarding our Valet team.  They were very hard to ensure each of our guests have a wonderful parking expierence.  Especially when the self parking area is full and offer valeting for the self parking rate.  I will pass your comments on to Ron and his entire valet team.  Thank you again for the feedback!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Got to orange county and decided to stay at the Embassy suites on business because I got such a great rate.  I grew up in this area and this is actually my first time staying at this hotel. The staff is friendly and the hotel is conveniently close to the airport, that's about all the good things I have to say about it.  This hotel definitely needs an update, it is very run down.  if you need a shuttle from the airport be sure to call ahead, I found that out the hard way and got sick of waiting so decided to take a taxi. Once I got to the hotel they inform me that you need to call ahead to get the shuttle.  The rooms are spacious but very outdated. The room I have had a view of the freeway and was very noisy all night long, even though I specifically asked for a quiet room.
Manager Response: Rjonesfwc,  I'm sorry to hear that you were unhappy with your stay.  I hope that you will consider us again once our hotel renovations have been compelted next year.  Thank you for your feedback!  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Had a nice experience.  We are repeat visitors to this hotel.  Enjoy seeing some of the same staff from year to year.  Very clean and well kept.  Enjoyed the restaurant.  Very good food.  We would return to this location.
Manager Response: Kay,  Thank you so much for your review.  It is always great to have repeat guests and getting each of you on a person level.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip frmo Plano!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Amenities are outstanding, breakfast, cocktail hour, pool, exercise facilities.. Disappointed in size of bathroom, quite small.  The meal in sports bar was overpriced. In making reservations nothing was indicated that there was a charge for overnight parking.  This came as a surprise when checking in..lastly, do not request room on pool side of hotel.  Quite noisy with traffic.
Manager Response: Richard,  Thank you very much for your review and positive scores regarding your stay with us.  We look forward to having you stay with us again on your next visit to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: The Santa Ana, Ca. Embassy Suites need to be severely renovated. Extremely poor HVAC. It is like a sauna in the hotel rooms at night. Maid carts left in the hall ways over night. Food being carried through the hallways uncovered by the buffet staff. Cigarettes littered all over the service area outside and below our room. It is like staying in a 3rd world country hotel. They turn off the A/C at night and you sweat all night long. There were ants in bathroom, the toilet seat was broken. The public restroom next their bar was a disaster every morning, dirty and now paper towels or toilet paper. Very poor supervisor on maintenance. They know the HVAC is substandard as they have notes in every room that it will turned off during the night. I would have slept better in a pup tent.
Manager Response: Raymond,  Thank you for your candid feedback of your stay with us. I apologize that we did not meet expectations and I am actively working with our housekeeping team to ensure cleanliness and comfort are our first priority. I am always looking for reviews to provide insight into our guest experience and I will keep your review in mind as we look towards refresh options. Thank you again for your feedback and I invite you back to stay with us the next time your travels bring you to the area.  Thank you, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: I was in town for business and then a family event and booked two rooms for my extended family.  This hotel is definitely older and doesn't have fancy decor but it is a good amount of space in a really central OC location (very close to everything, including SNA airport and right off the freeway).  My kids loved the reception and breakfast and the lovely koi pond and turtles in the atrium!  I would stay here again if I needed a place in the area.
Manager Response: DenverMommy,  Thank you for your review.  I'm so glad that we were an ideal location for your extended family.  Our location is a fantastic asset to us; so close to the beach, Disneyland Resort, airport, and the local shopping centers!   I hope that your travels bring you and your family back to the Orange County Airport area in the near future.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: While beginning to show its age (renovations underway) this is our favorite hotel primarily because of the long term friendly staff . The breakfasts are outstanding and the evening reception is nice also.  No other hotel matches the d√©cor of the open atrium.
Manager Response: Mr. Barry,  Thank you so much for your friendly comments regarding your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  It is always a pleasure to have your family stay with us.   It is one of our goals at Embassy Suites by Hilton to provide warm and friendly service to our guests.  Hope we get to see you again soon!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Convenient place to stay in the central OC
Summary: It was not our first stay at this Embassy Suites as it is convenient for a work project.  Yes, it is getting a little dated and could use a refresh in the rooms, but it is still a very comfortable property to stay at with a very good location close to Irvine and Newport Beach without breaking a budget.  Was a bit disappointed that they have started charging for parking as other hotels nearby do not.  The cooked to order egg breakfast is very good.
Manager Response: GeoTech,  Thank you so much for your kind response.  We are pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us and the services that we provide.  I hope that you will stay with us again on your next trip to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Very Unhappy A LOT of problems/Empty Promises/HOT Room/Just Bad service Overall @ East Dyer Road loc.  Took my mom there to celebrate Her 72nd Birthday (2nights) Matt @ front desk found out (1) He said he would like to send Mom a celebration gift to mom @ n/c (1 free dinner coupon & choc. covered strawberry Or cookies & milk) By 10PM the 2n day We never rec'd anything I Walked to the front desk saw matt, he said So Sorry, but they did Not have the Makings to make anything, so they didn't do anything  (2) The Room was HOT the AC was Not working called & Maintenance checked it out said they wound have to repair it The Next Day They gave us a Box Fan Very Uncomfortable  (3) We had a Balcony, but no where to sit I called & asked for 2 Folding chairs, was told NO we Don't have
Manager Response: Shelly,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts on your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  I'm sorry to hear about the less than stellar stay that you experienced with us.    Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel multiple area where we failed to meet your expectations.  The stay you had is not representative of Embassy Suites by Hilton nor what we have become known for worldwide.  I will personally communicate with Matt and my department heads regarding your review and make sure appropriate steps are taken to prevent these situations from happening again in the future.  I hope that you will still consider us again in the future.  Thank you again for your review.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Outdated Looking and Needs an Update
Summary: I stayed in room 829 for a total of 5 nights. The hotel looked very old, outdated, and most likely unmaintained because we had multiple problems with our stay. The first problem was I couldn't find a parking spot the first night I had a car. They should consider a parking garage. Second problem, the bathtub/shower wouldn't drain and almost overfilled. I take long showers, so it got up halfway up my lower leg and I'm a tall person. Third problem was the sink in the bathroom wouldn't drain either. Fourth problem, I couldn't get Ice from the Ice Machine because I didn't know where it was the first night. The ice machine is located in a storage looking room near the fire exit stairs by rooms ending in 23. I'm a loyal Hilton customer and I expected better. I've stayed at much better
Manager Response: Brian,  Thank you for taking the time to post.  I'm sorry you were dissatisfied with your stay.  I have shared your comments with some of the other managers here at the hotel and we are in agreement that better directional signage to the ice machines is in order.  I have instructed my chief engineer to place the order and you should see those posted within the next couple weeks.  Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel for your slow drains.  We appreciate you sharing your room number as it has allowed me to give direction to my team to correct the repair for future guests.  Additionally, in December, the hotel will be beginning a massive renovation that will be including both guest rooms and public spaces. We hope that you will consider us again for future travels.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: My family stayed here as part of a water polo tournament.  We had a King Suite.  The bed was very comfortable and room was clean.  The breakfast was very good.  Staff was nice and very friendly.  It's very convenient to Disneyland only 15 minutes away and beaches.
Manager Response: tpitboy,   We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your recent experience at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  I am so glad to read that you found our location, clean, comfortable, convenient to area attractions, and our service nice and friendly.  We hope to see you again, when your travels bring you back to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Not up to Embassy Suites standards. Average but expensive. I have stayed at other Embassy Suites in the area that were far better. Don't get me wrong, this is not a bad hotel, just not what one would expect from a Hilton related hotel.
Manager Response: David,  Thank you for sharing your thoughts on your recent stay.  I was saddened to hear that you believe our property was not properly priced in the Orange County Airport market and that we did not meet your expectations of an Embassy Suites by Hilton.  I will share your comments with the hotel's revenue management team for their consideration.  Thank you again for your posting and we hope you will stay with us again in the future.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Our family of 7 have been enjoying staycations at this Embassy Suites for way over a decade. We enjoy the comfortable atmosphere, the free breakfast and afternoon snack and its nice location. However, we were in for a big surprise as we pulled in and found to our surprise that what had always been user friendly parking was now valet. It seemed out of place with the comfortable, relaxed atmosphere, but the front desk told us we could self park, if we got a sticker and a little paper for inside the car from the valet desk outside. We went through these new time consuming procedures and parked as we always have. At checkout, after only one night's stay, we were shocked to be charged two days of parking, at $15.00 a day, and we didn't even use the 'valet'. What? Graciously the front
Manager Response: Jenae7,  Thank you for the review of your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  I am sorry to hear about your dissatisfaction with our parking offering.  Over the last several years, one of the biggest complaints that the hotel received was on it open parking arrangement.  With several other hotels on the block and close proximity to the airport, our hotel was frequently the host of several vehicles that were not guest of the hotel.  This not only left the hotel short of spaces, but created horrible problems for registered hotel guests looking for spaces when they returned in the evening.  This brought the hotel to a crossroads where it needed to choose between the registered guests and bringing in a parking management company or leaving an open unmanaged parking lot that was not meeting the needs of the guests.  Since the arrival of the marking management company, the hotel has not run out of parking spaces, has added valet parking, and even offers valet parking at the self parking price should the self parking area be full.  It is our goal to accommodate all of our guests and provide the very best service possible.  Thank you again for sharing your comments.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Stayed for 2 days. It's a very large and pretty hotel, convenient to the freeway and airport. We had a 2 room suite on the 7th floor with a beautiful mountain view. Upon entering the room, it smelled damp and musty. Although it appeared clean and well appointed, it looked old. The bed was comfortable, there were plenty of clean towels. The bathroom was a bit small, but I liked the large shelves in the shower. Free breakfast was nice, but the lines were long and the dining area was crowded. I did notice, after walking barefoot in the room, what appeared to be mouse droppings. We mentioned it to the desk when checking out and received no comment. Also, there were piles of dirty linens and room service dishes piled outside our room in the hallway both days.  It was ok for a couple
Manager Response: BCL37072,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  We appreciate your feedback.   Please rest assured that the possibility of any rodent activity in a guest room is not possible.  Each of our guest rooms are built with concrete walls, which are impenetrable to any pests or rodents.  However, I am concerned you room was not vacuumed properly and I will address the situation with our executive housekeeper and her team.    Additionally, I will also address the room service trays and linen at the end of the hall awaiting pick up by our housemen.  I'm sure there must be a better way to streamline housekeeping services while looking out for the interest of our guests.  If I can share a key tip for breakfast, arriving at the start of breakfast always provides for a more enjoyable and relaxing setting with a lot fewer guests and much more available seating.  Many of our guests wait till the last hour of breakfast and the congestion caused by their choices sometime make it a bit more chaotic.  Thank you again for sharing you thoughts on you recent stay.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager  Linen/Room Service Trays

Summary: The hotel is now old, outdated, and just completely unmaintained from the lobby with the dirty walls and floors, and the disgusting fish/turtle pond. To the outdated poorly kept rooms, that I can barely breath in! I only stayed a night and I booked for 3. Ive been before and it was not like this years ago. THE STAFF IS GREAT I didn't have to pay for my stay. I booked a suite and for the $220 a night it isn't nearly worth it!
Manager Response: Dedra,  Thank you for your stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel for your dissatisfaction with your recent stay.  It was very alarming to see that we missed the mark with you in so many areas.  However, if a silver lining can be found, I'm so glad to see that our service hit the target with you.  Part of our culture here at Embassy Suites by Hilton is to be gracious, engaging, and caring and it seems we did just that.  Thank you for your review; we appreciate you taking the time to share.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner

Summary: Wonderful place to stay.  Close to the airport with easy access to the freeways.  Most business activities are within easy reach.   Especially enjoy the managers receptions.  It's a good place to sit with a client and enjoy the atmosphere.  Pillows in the room are very comfortable.  This is a good choice for a place to stay.  (Request a high floor with view of the city.)
Manager Response: Reginald,  What a fantastic review!  Thank you so much!  We really appreciate the kind comments and having you stay with us this month.  Hopefully we can be your home away from home and see you around the hotel more often.  Thank you again for the review!  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: My go to business travel in OC
Summary: I was surprised by the recent negative reviews. This is my go to hotel when on business in Orange county. Convenient location right off the 55. The front desk is extremely helpful and the wait/housekeeping staff friendly. The rooms are nice and always clean. The bedrooms are normally very quiet unless of course your immediate neighbors are rude. And, no matter what floor I've been on, the water pressure in the showers is fabulous. As it is a popular hotel, I do recommend valet parking.
Manager Response: Lobrando,  Thank you so much for your kind comments.  It is always wonderful for our regular guest to take a moment and share their time tested experiences with us. We sincerely appreciate the praise and look forward to seeing your when your travels bring you back to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: This hotel didn't change bed sheet/blanket regularly.  My wife developed a rash on our first night stayed.  They charge me 200 per night plus 15 per day for parking.  Oh yeah, the wifi is really really slow.  I will never stay at this place again.
Manager Response: Jimmy,  Thank you for sharing your thought on the hotel's linen change protocol.  We greatly appreciate the feedback and understand your request. in California, Governor Brown and the State of California have declared a state of emergency due to the severe multi-year drought.  Hotels in the state have been limited, by law, on their water consumption.  This restriction no only includes water automatically being served in our restaurants, but consumption of water by our washers and load reductions.  To further our efforts, we have turned off our water features that do not support animal life.  For future stays, if you would like your sheets changed daily, please let us know and we would be happy to accommodate your request.  Thank you again for sharing your thought and we hope your wife is recovering well.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Stayed at this hotel MANY times in the past. Prices have gone up and they charge for parking now ($15 a day). Ants in our bed the first night there, moved to a room with a very leaky bathroom faucet. Will not be staying at this hotel again at these prices!
Manager Response: Thomas,  Thank you for sharing your sentiments on your recent stay at the Embassy Suite by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel for ants making their way into your room. This is certainly a first of me to respond to and I will make sure our engineering team takes action to make sure no other guests as affected by them. Additionally, I will make sure the team takes care of the leaky faucet as well.   We appreciate your feedback and hope that you will still consider us again when choosing your accommodations in the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Old, smelly, oversold, and terrible customer service!
Summary: I travel extensively for work and this is the WORST hotel I have stayed at in as long as I can remember.  Being an embassy suites brand, I expected more but was very disappointed. Upon arrival, the parking lot was completely full. It then took 20 minutes to check in because they appeared to be completely out of available rooms even though we pre-paid for our stay. Once we did get a room, we were told that the AAA discount for free parking we were promised wasn't available. After finally getting to our room, we were greeted with the most rank, moldy smell possible and the carpet was damp. It was as if the room was the basement level of an old pool pump room. The smell was so bad, I got a headache within 10 minutes and my asthma started to flare up. Once we decided to move rooms,
Manager Response: Joe,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay with the Trip Advisor community and the team at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North; we greatly appreciate the feedback.   Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel for the multiple areas where the hotel failed to meet your expectations.  Your stay was certainly not representative of what we strive to provide each one of our guests or that Embassy Suites by Hilton has come to build its reputation upon.    I believe that a clean room is at the very basic level of services we provide to our guests. We have an excellent director of housekeeping, which makes your experience even more frustrating to me. Additionally, she has been unable to provide me with a reasonable explanation as to why we failed to live up to our own high standards.  Thank you again for sharing your concerns with us; we greatly appreciate the feedback.   Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel during the USA Water Polo Junior Olympics. This hotel had been picked by the water ;polo club we were going with. The check-in was okay but we were advised by the hotel we should use Valet Parking. Soon afterwards we found out we were supposed to get free parking. I canceled the Valet Parking immediately and was not charged. The free breakfast was good and the free happy hour was good but inconsistent. At first we were not asked to show the paper they gave us to get the free happy hour drinks. The 3rd day we were told we needed to show it for everything. We were never asked for it during the free breakfast. Very inconsistent policies. House Keeping was okay and the bar/restaurant was over priced. However our bartender, Jose, was great. We enjoyed the time
Manager Response: Bob,  Thank you for your review and I'm sorry to hear that you were less than satisfied with your stay.  However, I'm very glad that you enjoyed the service provided by our team members.  Jose is a great bartender and we're lucky to have him on our team!  In late Q4, we will begin a total renovation of the hotel which includes both public spaces and guest rooms.  I hope that you will consider us again in the future.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Always looking for embassy suites hotels when traveling. This one did not fail to help us enjoy our summer vacation. Friendly staff and very clean rooms. Breakfast omelets made to order are exceptional. We have a family of 5, and the sofa sleeper saves us from having to get 2 rooms. Will stay here on our next trip to Disneyland once again.
Manager Response: Soria,  Thank you so much for your kind comments!  We're always happy to host families headed off to the "Happiest Place on Earth".  Today we will being having our monthly employee luncheon/meeting and I'll be sharing your review with the team.  Thank you again for your review of your stay!  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: My Daughter  and I ran down to Orange County to meet up with friends for shopping and dinner , even though we only live 1hour 45 minutes from this hotel we decided to enjoy drinks and dinner and not worry about the drive home . I have been a HILTON honors member since 2000, so I decided to just use my app and book the closest Hotel to our friends home , Boy was that a mistake to trust that this property would meet the HILTON experience that has had our loyalty for 15 years.  I have never had to read a review before staying at a HILTON family property , that was a big mistake because if you look on this site and YELP you will learn this property has been in need of a remodel and management change for YEARS!! We were greeted at check in by a unfriendly agent who gave no welcome or
Manager Response: Dakota,  Thank you for taking the time our of your busy schedule to review your recent stay in Santa Ana.  Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel for the less then standard experience that Embassy Suites by Hilton has come to build its reputation upon.  We certainly understand the our guest's requests for a renovation and ours is slated to begin in December and will include both guest rooms and public spaces.  We appreciate the feedback and will be sharing it with all of the departments that you mentioned in your review.  Thank you again for sharing your experience.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Our preference is always to stay at an Embassy Suites location. Unfortunately price point can keep us out, but we nonetheless always begin our search with Embassy Suites. If price was not a factor, we would definitely choose Embassy Suites 100% of the time.
Manager Response: Richard,  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts about the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport.  We appreciate your positive comments and certainly understand your concerns about the hotel's rate.  Unfortunately, many of the factors that determine any hotel's price point is driven by the hotels market and performance expectation imposed by external partners.    We thank you for regularly inquiring with Embassy Suites by Hilton and appreciate that you choose to stay with us whenever possible.  We hope to see you at our hotel again soon!  Very Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: This Embassy Suites is NOT to the quality standards expected of an Embassy Suites.   Yes,  it has the Manager's Reception and great breakfast,  but it lacks the the quality maintenance and furnishings in the two room suites and common areas.  The other Embassy Suites just a couple of miles from this one would be better selections until maintenance and updating are done here. The room was very humid because as the sign in the room says your heart and AC is determined by the hotel and outside temp.   All I know is the room was very humid, and I couldn't get rid of it.
Manager Response: J S,  Thank you for taking the time our of your busy schedule to review your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel that your room was more humid than you would have preferred.  Having staying in the hotel many times before, I can certainly understand what a guest experiences and the challenges that it presents for our guests.  The hotel has a 2 pipe system, which was state of the art when the hotel opened up in 1984.  However, in 2015, it leave some definite challenges to all parties concerned.  With the concrete construction of all of our guest room walls, it has prevented the hotel from upgrading the system to current 4 and 6 pipe systems which allow a guest to dial in a tempter more to their liking.  In 2016, one of the top priorities of the hotel‚Äôs capital plan is to find better solutions to our guests HVAC requirements.    Thank you again for sharing your thoughts on your stay.  We hope you will come back and see us again.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: We only stated one night at the hotel. We didn't have a chance to use any of the amenities but the hotel was clean, front desk staff was friendly and accommodating.  The indoor pool looked great. Rooms were a little dated but the bed was super comfy. Love that it had a desk that could double as a vanity with a light. Room was spacious. Would stay again.
Manager Response: L F,   Thank you for sharing your thoughts about your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  It is always so reassuring to read positive comments on the high level of service that we strive to provide each one of our guests.  All of Embassy Suites by Hilton's beds are made by Serta and if you're ever interested in bringing these items home, you might want to check out HiltonToHome.  Many of the great features about our rooms are available to our guests!  Thank you again for your review.  We hope that you will come back and see us again soon!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: We love staying here when travelling. Hotel is always clean, rooms clean. Amenities are unless, always feel like "special" guests! Never have had a bad experience here or at any of the other locations that we have stayed at.
Manager Response: Diane,  Thank you so much for your review.  We are delighted that you always enjoy your stays at Embassy Suites by Hilton and appreciate your continued loyalty to Hilton Worldwide's family of brands.  We look forward to having you as our "special" guest on your future trips to the Orange County Airport area.  Thank you again for sharing your thoughts.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: GREAT staff, but the hotel is icky and needs remodel.
Summary: The staff was great, the breakfast is pretty good, but the hotel rooms were not nice. The entire 10th floor smells like cigarette smoke. They don't allow smoking now, but it is the leftover nicotine smell from years ago. We had to change rooms, but it was still bad. Rooms and bathrooms are dingy. Toiletries are high end and very nice.
Manager Response: Kristen,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience in Santa Ana.  I'm sorry to hear that your stay was marred by the smell of cigarette smoke from our 4 smoking rooms.  During the upcoming renovation in late Q4, it is our anticipation that we will become a completely smoke free hotel so that no guests are impacted by smoking rooms.  Thank you for sharing your thoughts on the issue.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Scott & Kevin  I was in need of advise and directions, and these guys had it all! They listened to my needs and promptly gave a few choices that suited what I was looking for. I was very impressed with there politeness and curtesy. I would recommend using there knowledge of the surrounding area to anyone unsure of the area!   Thanks again Mike Griffith
Manager Response: Mr. Griffith,  Thank you so much for the positive comments regarding your stay at the Embassy Suites by HIlton Santa Ana - Orange COunty Airport North.  I will be sure to share your high praise with our parking management team and that they properly recognize their employees.  Going above and beyond for our guests is a goal we strive for at Embassy Suites by Hilton and I'm glad that we hit the mark.  Thank you for staying with us and I hope you will come back and visit us soon.    Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: I feel that this Hotel is too expensive for what you get. The Parking lot is overcrowded and expensive, considering a few miles away it is free. The internet access was inconsistent. There were unattended children everywhere. I had a similar experience on my last visit but decided to give it another try, unfortunately it has not changed.
Manager Response: Daniel,  Thank you for sharing your feedback on your recent stay with us.  I'm sorry to hear that you were unhappy with your stay.  We will take your comments under advisement as we continuously work to improve the guest experience.  Thank you for choosing Embassy Suites by Hilton and we hope you will consider some of our other locations in the future.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Close to the Airport in a very nice area.  Embassy is very consistent in their branding with the large rooms, happy hour, full service breakfast and gorgeous lobby area.   I typically try to locate an Embassy Suites while traveling for personal or business.
Manager Response: Tina,  Thank you for choosing the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North to be your home away from home for your recent travels.  We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us.  We work hard to provide a consistent offering throughout the brand and your feedback was a great compliment.  We hope you will stay with us again on your next travels to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Entire Staff was excellent, friendly & helpful in all departments.  WiFi is extremely slow with several disconnects.  Parking is a tight & full.  Beautiful facility & conveniently located for beaches & Disneyland
Manager Response: Larry,  Thank you so much for your recent review of your stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  I'm sorry to hear about the internet troubles that you experienced.  Please know that the hotel is working with our internet technology partner AT&T to come up with a better guest experience here at the hotel.  While such a major change cannot be completed instantaneously, we have been working for several months to derive the right solution that accomplishes the many challenges of a concrete building.  Thank you again for your review and we look forward to being of service to you again in the future.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: I had high hopes for this hotel.  The hotel was outdated - rooms were old and AC system was not reliable. You have to pay $15 a day for parking...Did I mention it is expensive?  Not my best Hilton experience.  Pros - The atrium was beautiful and the breakfast was tasty.
Manager Response: David,  Thank you for taking time of your busy schedule to share your recent experience at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  We greatly appreciate your feedback and are glad that you enjoyed the complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast.  We hope that you will come back and visit us again once our guest room portion of our upcoming renovation is completed.  Thank you again for sharing your thoughts.   Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: When I plan any trips I always look for the closest Embassy Suites...Love my experience every time I stay!  Service and cleanliness of the hotel is amazing.  I love their breakfast...yummy and happy hour drink selections!
Manager Response: Yvonne,  Thank you so much for your loyalty to the Embassy Suites by Hilton brand!!  Knowing that time and time again you choose to spend your hard earned dollars with us, could not be a bigger compliment! We appreciate the patronage and look forward to having you back as a guest at one of our many locations through out North and South America.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: We love this hotel. I have stayed there 5+ times. The breakfast has a wonderful variety. The staff always willing to help with issues. It's a safe area. I always sleep well there. Plus it sleeps many people if you are a larger family.
Manager Response: Sherine,  Thank you so much for taking the time out of your busy schedule to review your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  Your review touched on one of our key features that often get overlooked by travelers.  With each of our rooms being a two-room suite, there is much more room than your average hotel room.  Our rooms with two queen beds can sleep a maximum of 6 people with the sofa sleep in use in the parlor area.  To top if off, a family of 6 has their breakfast included with us.  Just think of the savings when you pull that cost off the room rate!  At Embassy Suites by Hilton we aim to provide a exceptional savings to our guests!  Thank you so much for bringing that feature up!  We hope to see you again soon when your travels bring you back to the central Orange County area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Stayed here to tour the area with 3 friends and attend the Pageant of the Masters in Laguna Beach.  We opted for the valet service, which was always prompt and efficient.  The check in, check out process was quick and hassle free.   The breakfast and especially the omelette station was great!   All the staff were very courteous and helpful.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Cay,  Thank you so much for you review and the positive comments about our valet team, guest service team, and our well known complimentary breakfast!  I'm so glad we were able to exceed your expectations and that you will come back again to stay with us.  We look forward to it!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Experience the Best in Hotel Stays
Summary: We have been staying at this hotel since our children were 5 and 10 years old, they are now 35 and 40 with children of their own.  We gave this hotel Bridal room as a gift to our daughter and now stay there with our grand children, need I say more!
Manager Response: George,  Thank you so much for your sharing your multigenerational experience at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North. The hotel just had it's 30th birthday last year!  We appreciate your MANY years of patronage and hope to someday be of service to your grandchildren's children.  Thank you again for staying with us!!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Ask for Mimi at the front desk. She'll take care of your stay. Breakfast is great. Lots of options. Valet parking and Internet may be a problem though. Try the District for a quick place to have several options for dinner. Gas station is next door if you need to return the car at the airport. Very convenient
Manager Response: Victor,  Thank you so much for your review of your recent stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  Mimi is a great team members and we are so glad to hear that she took care of all your stay needs.  I'll be sure to share your review with her and a word of my thanks for ensuring our guest's satisfaction.  We hope to see you again soon when your travels bring you back to the Orange County Airport area.   Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: good stay, worth the money.  I enjoyed the facility as it is open and very beatiful, particularly the Atrium with the Koi fish, turtles and vegetation.  The water fountains add a sense of relaxation to the experience, overall i would recommend the hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Lucy,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience!  Embassy Suites by Hilton's lush open atrium was a founding cornerstone of our brand and something that has set us apart from our competition.  We are so glad that our hotel's atmosphere provided you a sense of relaxation and we hope to see you again soon.    Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Would highly recommend this hotel to anyone staying in the Orange County area. The location was good and easy to get to and from. Our room was on the north side of the hotel which provided an excellent vantage point for the fireworks from the Theme Parks to the north.  The hotel staff was engaging and gracious hosts going out of their way to make us feel welcome and comfortable.
Manager Response: Dean,  So glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North!  Your comment about being able to see the fireworks form Disneyland is a tip most people don't know about and we appreciate you sharing!  Disneyland is about 8 miles away, so on occasion, it can be a challenge to see them clearly.    At Embassy Suites by Hilton, part of our service culture is to be gracious, engaging, and caring.  You couldn't have given us a better compliment!  Thank you so much! We really appreciate it.  Please know that the Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North team looks forward to be of service on your future travels to the area.  Respectfully, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: The staff at this hotel went out of their way to provide us a quiet and relaxing retreat for our 1 night away from caring for my dad on hospice for 8 months.  They even sent a bottle of wine and cheese & cracker plate to our room & wished us a relaxing stay on a hand written note.  This is above & beyond for a hotel in my opinion.  Embassy Suites has always provided a wonderful stay for us in the 20+ years we have stayed with them!
Manager Response: Carol,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review.  We are so pleased that your stay was enjoyable and an chance for you to recharge your batteries.  We look forward to being of service again when you need another local getaway.    Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: For our family of 5, the Embassy Suites was a perfect place to stay.  The room was clean, spacious, and easily accommodated our sleeping situation.  Breakfasts were absolutely delicious with a huge variety of foods.  We loved the Happy Hour in the lobby where both kids and adults could get free beverages:)  We enjoyed using the pool, hot tub, and fitness area over our stay as well.  I would highly recommend the Embassy Suites to other guests!
Manager Response: Gretchen,  Thank you so much for your kind comments.  We are very pleased that your family had a great stay and enjoyed the many amenities that we offer each of our guests.  We look forward to being of service to your family again, when your future travels bring you back to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Great breakfast, pool, evening reception and staff
Summary: Whenever in OC, Orange County, we prefer this hotel. The staff at desk clerk are friendly as are most of hotel staff we encounter. They seem like they enjoy working there. Breakfast has an omelet bar and evening reception is a added bonus. The kids like the indoor pool and riding the elevators. The only minuses are they now charge $15 for parking. -H. Olsen
Manager Response: Dear Olsen Family,  Thank you for taking the time to share what a fantastic time you had at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  Being an employee in Santa Ana, I can certainly tell you we do enjoy our jobs and have fun being here.  Within hour company, we had the highest employee satisfaction score last year!  We hope you will come back and see us soon and thanks again for the great comments!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Place needs a major overhaul!  The check in process was terrible and we were not told of the parking situation until the 2nd day.  Breakfast was cold and buffet was overcrowded from Thursday to Sunday.  We will never return to this place again.
Manager Response: Dear Ms. Scott,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry you were unhappy with our your stay here. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. I understand that your issues with the check-in process and parking have been addressed by our Director of Guest Services and we are very sorry this led to un-enjoyable stay at our hotel. We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.   Sincerely, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: I coach a select baseball team and we were in Santa Ana for a baseball tournament.  We checked in on Friday, June 26, 2015 and checked out on Friday, July 3, 2015.  I had 3 of my players staying in the room with me and from the day we checked in, all of us started experiencing allergy type sickness.  Each day the symptoms were getting worse and by Thursday, July 2, 2015, I could barely talk because of all the irritation to my throat and felt like I had flu like symptoms.  My body ached all over and I was extremely exhausted.  That is when I noticed the black mold in the bathroom.  It was on all edges of the mirror and in shower.  I immediately called the front desk and they came to my room and all they did was wipe down the area.  They did not attempt to look behind the mirror
Manager Response: Jacob,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your recent stay with us.  Additionally, it was a pleasure speaking with you on the phone yesterday regarding your concerns while our director of sales & marking was away on planned vacation and away from the workplace.  Please know that we take any reports on hazardous room conditions very seriously and the room that you indicated has been inspected by our hotel's team members. We appreciate your posting and look forward to continuing our correspondence with you.    Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Hotel, never a bad experience yet at an Embassy Suites Hotel
Summary: Great Room, evening reception is nice with open bar, Breakfast was fresh and hot and tasty. Rooms had everything you expect fridge and microwave. Bed was comfortable, Staff was good and attentive, Soda and stacks available from the Hotel shop near the front desk.
Manager Response: James,  So great to hear that you always have a wonderful experience with us.  Stay such as your is what Embassy Suites by Hilton has come to build its reputation on.  We're grateful for your kind comments and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Excellent Motel. Close to Disneyland. Great for the family. We stayed there six days and there was a lot to do right around the motel and the staff were very helpful. Recommend Lyon Air Museum. Also, Go Cart Racing walking distance from the motel. 15 minutes to Laguna Beach.
Manager Response: Staunia,  Thank you so much for your kind comments regarding your stay at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  It sounds like you had an excellent vacation!  We look forward to having you with us again when your travels bring you back to the Orange County Airport area.    Warmest Regards! Tim  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for three nights with no air conditioning and horrible wifi along with cable channels that are different in the bedroom versus the sitting area.  I would highly recommend to find another hotel.  The room was so humid mold was growing in the bathroom.  It was the worse stay at an Embassy Suite ever!!!
Manager Response: Michael,   Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry for the issues that you encountered with your room. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again in the future.   Thank you, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: This property did not compare well with other Embassy Suites that I have stayed at.  Both rooms & property appeared worn and tired and not well maintained. Paint worn, furniture tired, pink mildew on the shower head. The breakfast also was not as nice as other properties.  The parking availability also was poor.  I found it not be a good value for price charged.  Stayed here on business.  I will not stay here again if I can avoid it.
Manager Response: Donna,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry you were unhappy with our your stay. We will take your sentiments under review as we continually work to improve our guest experience. The condition of our suites is very important to us, as we aim to provide guests with the best accommodations and service. We are very sorry you encountered an uncomfortable stay at our hotel. During late Q4 of this year, we will begin an expansive renovation of our hotel which will include both guest rooms and public spaces.  We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.   Sincerely, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Embassy Suites-Santa Ana/Orange County Airport North, this hotel is showing its age.  The room had a musty smell.  Tiling on border of walk ways were chipping off.  D√©cor is very out dated.  Plants in center court had lots of dust.  Tops of elevators also were very dusty. Breakfast was still good, always lots of variety.
Manager Response: Harry,  Thank you for taking the time to share with us your recent experience at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  We greatly appreciate the feedback!  Starting in late Q4, the hotel will be undergoing a full renovation, including both guest rooms and public spaces.  While we know there will be a period of construction, everyone here at the hotel is excited for the new fresh look at features it will bring to the hotel.  We hope you will consider staying with us again on your future travels to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Tim

Summary: I stay at this hotel 4 times a year for an average stay of 3 nights each trip.  I stay because it is very convenient to my Corporate Office and the freeway.   I am annoyed that when I stay in April someone sideswiped my Avalanche and caused $4k in damage and the hotel did nothing for me.  Stayed there just a week ago and the hotel room just doesn't get cool enough for me and now they have imposed a valet parking fee on top of the hotel charges.  With the Room rate, parking fees and all the other taxes and fees these rooms now exceed $200.00 per night.  It's just frustrating when I know most of the staff and they recognize me.  It's been a good run Embassy but I may need to move on!
Manager Response: Jenifer,  Thank you for taking the time to share your past experience with us and for being a loyal customer of the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  We appreciate your patronage and glad that you feel at home here.    I can certainly understand your frustration with having your vehicle hit in a parking lot.  I had a similar experience at a shopping mall not too long ago.  I wish I knew who the person was that caused the damage.    In late Q4, the hotel will begin a full renovation of the hotel, including both guest rooms and public spaces. Additionally, upgrades to the hotel's HVAC/heating will be occurring as well.    I hope you will continue to consider us for your future travels to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Hotel staff was nice. Hotel is older. Restrooms really need to be updated. Paid for  a premium room and there was nothing premium about it. Website said you get unlimited snacks and drinks but vending machine was not working and there was only a couple of choices. Not the ones we would have enjoyed. Not happy to have to pay extra for parking.
Manager Response: Dear Robert,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay at our hotel. We sincerely appreciate your feedback and we‚Äôre very sorry you were unhappy with your stay here. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. The condition of our suites and property is very important to us as we aim to provide guests with the best accommodations and service.  We hope you will consider staying with us in the future.   Sincerely,  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: My team was there for a week.  The hotel was great!  There is a "stream" running through the lobby area with huge koi fish and turtles.  Breakfast was awesome and of course free happy hour after a hard days work.  I would stay there again!
Manager Response: Teresa,  Thank you so much for your wonderful comments.  We love our steam, waterfalls, and the turtles/koi too!  Having a lush open atrium is one of the founding principles of the Embassy Suites by Hilton brand and we couldn't be happier with it.  We look forward to having you stay with us again with your travels bring you back to the Orange County Airport area!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Good hotel but not the room
Summary: The hotel is nice with atrium, fish pond, waterfall, tree, etc.  The free breakfast is really good with variety of food, including some vegan options for us (fruit, cereal, oatmeal, bread, and fried potato).  The fried potato and oatmeal are the best.  However, the room is terrible.  It's old, outdated, and really need a renovation.  It's smell like someone smoke in the room even though we are on non-smoking floor.  We find out that it's the AC.  I don't think they ever change the filter.  There's black dust on the ceiling next to the vent.  Even though the room is large with separate living room, the bathroom is tiny.  There are broken parts in the bathroom like the hangers and the door would not close without slaming it.  The exhaust fan run all the time and make lot of noises.
Manager Response: Anhhuy H,  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North with us.  I was saddened to hear about the various issues you had in your guest room.  Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel for your less than stellar guest room experience.  There is certainly no excuse for our inability to property inspect and maintain your room.  I feel that a clean room in good condition is at the very basic level of service that we provide to our guests.  We have an excellent director of housekeeping and chief engineer which makes your experience even more frustrating to me. Additionally, neither of them have been able to provide me with a reasonable explanation as to why we failed to live up to our own high standards.    Again, thank you for taking the time to post your experience.  We hope that you will consider us again for your future travels to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Had an amazing stay with family. The suite was maintained very well and the staff was spot on with service. Scott, I assume is the valet parking manager, was really friendly and funny. The staff helped us through out our stay. Food was on par, breakfast was the greatest of all! We will be returning soon!
Manager Response: Javed,  We're so glad that you and your family had a wonderful stay with us!  I'll be sure to pass along your praise of Scott to our parking manager as well!  Glad to hear that you are returning to the area soon.  Please let us know if there is anything we can do to make your next stay with us a spectacular one as well.  Respectfully, Tim  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: We had a 7 day stay; Lovely hotel, great atmosphere, plenty of room, hospitality staff-excellent, room attendant-exceptional! We appreciated the overall experience since we are a family of 6 your breakfast was key;) Great breakfast!! Thank you for returning our curling irons too!
Manager Response: Nep6,  So glad you had an excellent stay with us!  It such a pleasure to be a choice hotel for business travelers on the weekdays and their families on the weekends.  We hope you will come back and visit us soon on your future travels to the area!  Warmest Regards, Tim  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: I recently stayed at this location and had great experiences with 3 employees!! Scott the parking valet was friendly, happy and very funny!! Leo the night clerk was welcoming and very friendly!! Andy was also a great person to come in contact with, Friendly, accomodating and helpful!!  When staff members go  out of their way to make you feel welcome it really stands out!! These 3 had great customer service skills!!
Manager Response: Chasity,  Thank you so much for your kind comments. I will be sure to share them with our team members!  We look forward to having you again on your future travels to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards! Tim  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Nice hotel, a bit worn around the edges. We needed a place to crash for three nights while on business in Irvine. This fit the bill. It was close by the business venue, and the cost for our budget. The atrium is great-nice and open. Parking is tight although there was plenty of it. Front desk was helpful and polite.
Manager Response: Dear ke39 -  Thank you for your review from your stay with us on your recent business trip. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your visit and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Excellent location, clean and welcoming lobby, great rooms, food was good and access was excellent! Transportation to the airport was one of the best I have ever experienced.  Internet service was slow and I think related to the high usage while I was there.
Manager Response: Dear 571janicer -  We appreciate your review of your stay with us. We are pleased you enjoyed the hotel and the service of our team. Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Came in to see family for a week and stayed here.  Beds were comfortable and the complex reasonably quiet - it was very busy while we were there.  Room was spacious and breakfast was reasonable for a hotel.  A little pricy for our tastes, but couldn't complain about the room or staff.
Manager Response: Bsnare,  Thank you very much for the favorable comments regarding your stay.  Out spacious rooms, free cooked-to-order breakfast, and friendly staff are some of our best features!  We look forward to have you as our guests again on your future travels to the orange county airport area!  Regards, Tim  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: The rooms were very clean and comfy. The staff were very friendly and accommodating.  The food was good and the atmosphere was very inviting. I will stay there again if I'm ever in the area.  I felt safe in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Sharva H -  Thank you very much for your review. I am pleased that you enjoyed our wonderful staff and the services of the hotel.  We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you on your next visit to the Orange County area.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Good stay for the night. Had a party for my grandma there. Food was great. Service was great. Had a good time. Beds were really comfortable. The complimentary breakfast was awesome! Wasn't thrilled on how the parking arrangement was.
Manager Response: Dear Romalyn A -  We appreciate your review. We are pleased enjoyed your experience with us in the celebration of your grandmother's birthday...we will share your comments with our team.  Thank you for your business and we hope to serve you again in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary Heading: Convenient location but long overdue for an overhaul
Summary: Let me begin by saying I like the Embassy Suites brand but this hotel is long overdue for an overhaul.  Just about everything in the room was old, dirty, worn or faded. The power outlets were loose and the bedside lamp did not work until I jiggled the power cord.   The wireless internet has marginal speed with a weak signal that sometimes would drop out.  I was also annoyed by the $15 parking charge. This is just another way of jacking up the room rate in a less obvious way.  Hopefully they will get this place brought up to expectations soon but until then I will be staying somewhere else in the area.
Manager Response: Bob,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us.  I am happy to say that in late Q4 we will be beginning a major renovation of the hotel, including both public spaces and guest rooms.  I hope that you will consider staying with us again in the future.  Warmest Regards, Tim  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites by Hilton Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: The hotel has many of the amenities that I am looking for when I travel and the suite style is quite nice.  The room is more than spacious and allows you to have others over to visit comfortably.  The location is not the best, but the condition of the hotel is pretty good and the staff are friendly.  The breakfast buffet in the morning is quite tasty and at no additional charge, a real bargain.
Manager Response: Dear Blaine G -  Thank you for your review. We are pleased you enjoyed the service of our staff and the hotel amenities. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary Heading: Some good things and some not so good things
Summary: This hotel is older and has some wonder character.  I like the lobby and eating area. Very large, koi pond with turtles.  Free breakfast and cocktails in the evening.  Parking is minimal unless you valet for $17.  Upon leaving I noticed a mini van with the passenger side window broken out.  HVAC either cools when temp is over 70, or cools when outside temp is under 55.  However, the night time temp when I was there was in the low 60's and it was very cold not being able to heat the place.  The tub was dirty and there are not many plugs, which I have multiple devices to charge. Wifi was very week on the 8th floor.  Good size rooms.  There is not a tangible channel guide, just the one that is on the tv, and they do not have HLN, which I enjoy.  Narrow, but decent fitness center
Manager Response: Dear Terry J -  Thank you for your review of your recent stay with us. We are pleased you enjoyed the character of the hotel and our complimentary breakfast and evening reception. We will follow up on the issues you noted. We appreciate your business and hope to serve you again on your future visits to Orange County.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: This is our go to hotel every time we are in Southern California.  Best Location, great staff, nice complimentary breakfast.  The hotel is always classy and clean.  Definitely will use every-time I'm in the area.
Manager Response: Dear islandlover0209 -  We appreciate your review of your recent stay with us. Our team is pleased to hear you enjoyed the service of the staff and the hotel facilities. Thank you for your loyalty to us and we look forward to serving you again.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: I love staying at Embassy Suites for many reasons including their delicious breakfast buffet and spacious suites for my family of 4. If you do not mind the 10 minute drive to Disneyland, this is a perfect place to stay at a great value. (Compared to hotels in walking distance of Disneyland)Not to mention, they have a really nice indoor pool and hot tub, which my children love no matter what the weather is like outside. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Liveth R -  Thank you for your review...it sounds like you and your family enjoyed the many things to do in Orange County. We will share your kind comments with our team. We appreciate your business and we look forward to serving you again on future visits to our area.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary Heading: Older property, built over 30 years ago
Summary: To the general manager of the property. I appreciate your reading my review. Let me add some additional comments. Our room on the 9 th floor was hot at night, the sink counter in the bedroom was broken in half and poorly repaired. The TV didn't work in the bedroom as someone disconnected all the power supply cords. The alarm clock was not functional. In the bathroom, their were holes in the wall where items had been removed by hotel MAINTENCE persons. At. The morning Cook to order breakfast bar, there are no sneeze guards to protect your meal from being sprayed with saliva by people standing in line and talking. These correction would greatly improve your guests stay.
Manager Response: Raymond,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  We greatly appreciate the feedback and suggestions for guest rooms and the breakfast area.  We will take your comments under consideration in anticipation of our upcoming major renovation that is schedule to begin at the end of this year.  Thank you again for your feedback!  Warmest Regards,  Timothy Wagner, CRDE Assistant General Manager

Summary: Freeway side rooms are extremely noisy.  Had to change to other side. Limited Room Temperature Control.  Woke up freezing. Thermostat is controlled by Hotel.  Only control you have is when the Temperature outside is below a certain temperature or above a certain temperature.  Very cold in mornings without ability to turn on the heat. Multiple Coi Ponds and waterfalls result in a smelly and humid hotel. Not worthy to carry the Hilton name.
Manager Response: Paul,  Please accept my apology on behalf of the hotel for the troubles you experienced with our HVAC system and its difficulties. Having staying in the hotel many times before, I can certainly understand what a guest experiences and the challenges that it presents for our guests.  The hotel does indeed have a 2 pipe system, which was state of the art when the hotel opened up in 1984. However, in 2015, it leave some definite challenges to all parties concerned. With the concrete construction of all of our guest room walls, it has prevented the hotel from upgrading the system to current 4 and 6 pipe systems which allow a guest to dial in a tempter more to their liking. In 2016, one of the top priorities of the hotel‚Äôs renovation is to find better solutions to our guests HVAC requirements.   Additionally, please accept my apologies for not being able to sleep well due to road noise in the guest room.  We all certainly have our sleeping preferences and I am a light sleeper too.  Your tip about requesting a room on the non freeway side a is a great tip for light sleepers.  Thank you for sharing.  I certainly hope that you will consider us again in the future!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner, CRDE Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Nice looking Hotel, Terrible HVAC policy.
Summary: This hotel is nice looking but an older property. This issue according to the manager is has a two pipe system for heating and cooling. They can only do one or the other so in their infinite wisdom, the shut everything down between 53 degrees and 70 degrees temperatures. Doesn't sound too bad until you try to sleep and the only way you can cool your room down is to open a window or sliding glass door to the outside. Sounds reasonable, except they are next to California Highway 55 which is a freeway. All night long the traffic noise will keep you awake unless you are used to living next to a freeway.
Manager Response: Raymond,  Thank you for your recent stay and review of the Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.   Please accept my apology on behalf of the hotel for the troubles you experienced with our HVAC system and its difficulties. Having staying in the hotel many times before, I can certainly understand what a guest experiences and the challenges that it presents for our guests.  The hotel does indeed have a 2 pipe system, which was state of the art when the hotel opened up in 1984. However, in 2015, it leave some definite challenges to all parties concerned. With the concrete construction of all of our guest room walls, it has prevented the hotel from upgrading the system to current 4 and 6 pipe systems which allow a guest to dial in a tempter more to their liking. In 2016, one of the top priorities of the hotel‚Äôs renovation is to find better solutions to our guests HVAC requirements.   I certainly hope that you will consider us again in the future!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner, CRDE Assistant General Manager

Summary: Beautiful hotel. Friendly staff. Free breakfast. Free happy hour. Free bus shuttle. Nice rooms. Fabulous sports bar and menu. Very kid friendly. Pool, fitness room & jacuzzi. Amazing coy carp and turtles in middle of hotel. Kept my7 yr old very happy with free fish food from reception. Highly recommend to stay here.
Manager Response: Jane!  Thank you so much for your wonderful comments regarding your recent stay with us!  We are so pleased you enjoyed the hotel and the many amenities that it has to offer all of our guests. We look forward to being of service again during your future travels to the Orange County area.    Respectfully, Timothy Wagner, CRDE Assistant General Manager

Summary Heading: Very poor place to stay when the temperatures are not right for the hotel.
Summary: Nice hotel if you don't need air conditioning. They do not operate their HVAC system when the outside temperature is between 53 to 70 degrees. It is in what the management calls the neutral position for the HVAC system. It was so hot over Memorial Day week end during the night we opened the sliding door to let in the outside air. This worked fine for awhile, the traffic noise form the freeway kept us awake all night long. They could have turned on the cooling system and if it get's to cold they have extra blankets in the drawers in the room. But there is no way to get cooler air in the hotel. Bad system. I would not stay there unless the temperature  was either below 53 degrees or over 70 degrees or you will not be comfortable. In other words, I would never stay there again
Manager Response: Jane,  Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to review your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  Please accept my apology on behalf of the hotel for the troubles your experienced with our HVAC system and its difficulties.  Having staying in the hotel many times before, I can certainly understand what a guest experiences and the challenges that it presents for our guests.  The hotel has a 2 pipe system, which was state of the art when the hotel opened up in 1984.  However, in 2015, it leave some definite challenges to all parties concerned.  With the concrete construction of all of our guest room walls, it has prevented the hotel from upgrading the system to current 4 and 6 pipe systems which allow a guest to dial in a tempter more to their liking.  In 2016, one of the top priorities of the hotel‚Äôs renovation is to find better solutions to our guests HVAC requirements.   I certainly hope that you will consider us again in the future!  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner, CRDE Assistant General Manager

Summary: I like Embassy Suites (I tend to stay at Hilton-branded properties when I travel).  Great location - within walking distance to the office and several restaurants (McCormick, El Torito).  I like the 2-room suite concept - plenty of room to spread out, with a dedicated working area (desk).  I had an end unit, tucked back in a quite alcove - very nice.  Comfortable bed and pillows.  Clean, good climate control.  Nice cooked-to-order breakfast included.  A really good value.  If back to Orange County, I'll be back.  Super close to John Wayne Airport - makes for quick.easy in and out.  And you earn Hilton HHonors points, too.
Manager Response: Dear ViajeroJBW -  Thank you for your review of your stay with us. We are pleased you enjoyed your stay with us during your recent business trip. We appreciate your business and your loyalty to the Hilton family of hotels and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: We love Embassy Suites.  It's so nice to have a complete breakfast each morning & happy hour each night.  All the staff is so nice & good workers.  The rooms are so comfortable & nice (except the bathroom fan wouldn't shut off & the person above us must have brought his own bar bell set as it sounded like pounding on the floor.)  Other than that, it was very nice.  We ate dinner in the bar/grille & the ribs were delicious, as well as the salmon.
Manager Response: Dear Patty R -  I was very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay at our hotel. Thank you very much for acknowledging the friendly and accommodating staff, we are striving to create that environment for all our guests so I am pleased to read you felt their hospitality. I appreciate you recommending the hotel and hope to see you back soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Very welcoming staff.  Our room was very comfortable and clean, housekeeping friendly and did a great job! Atrium and breakfast area was clean and always had a relaxing spot to sit.  Easy access to freeway made getting around the area a breeze.  Only complaint didn't like having to pay for parking; as a guest parking should not be extra.  Charge the people attending the seminars, etc but not your guests!
Manager Response: Dear BchBaby21 -  Thank you for your review from your recent stay with us. We are pleased you enjoyed our staff service and the amenities of our hotel. We appreciate your staying with us and we look forward to serving you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary Heading: Not for business traveller, Very poor internet
Summary: I chose this hotel as I wanted to give Embassy a go again. I travel every or every other week around US. I contacted them about internet quality as I use VPN and get frustrated about lack of quality when on the road. I was told before booking they have a "premium" option for $6 which is free to gold and diamond HHonors. Cut long story short, I am in a room near a router and the Internet (paid for) is terrible. Unless you want to sit in lobby and work you will not be productive. It took ages to load a google map last night, I gave up and I am posting this using cell network. I have had better internet quality in th ethics world. I feel mislead and should have stayed at a better served hotel. For geeks out there on free HHOnors the Download is 0.35MB Download is upload at 0.06MB
Manager Response: Dear Paul A -  Thank you for the feedback on your stay with us. I would like to apologize for our the issues you experienced with our Internet service. We use such valuable feedback from customers such as you to help us improve the hotel. I hope you will give us another try in the future; we would love the opportunity to earn back your trust.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: We stayed over there for 4 nights, and were very pleased.  The hotel lobby and atrium are beautiful.  The staff were always friendly, and helpful, and always made us feel welcome.  The room was large and spacious, and well appointed. The only issue would be the way too soft bed, and pillows.  The breakfast area with the cooked to order omelet bar was great, especially for free.  There was also a free 2 hour happy hour with free snacks, and free hard and soft drinks, every day!  The indoor pool and hot tub were very nice.    Just a few little minor things, were the terrible internet, that would not stay connected, on 3 different devices. The tricky parking in too tight spaces. Just as a note; The last 2 days of our stay, there was a group of 216 high school kids there that were
Manager Response: Dear TS1959 -  Thank you for your review of your recent stay with us. We are pleased you enjoyed your stay and the service of our team. We will share your comments on the issues you experienced with our team for follow up. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Overall, we love Embassy Suites and usually stay because of all the hotel has to offer. Only issues were the central air not providing comfort at certain times and the bathroom needs some attention as it looks a little worn. Otherwise, loved our stay as usual.
Manager Response: Dear Frank V -  Thank you for staying with us and posting your comments on TripAdvisor. I am glad you enjoyed your stay; I do apologize for the issues you experienced with the bathroom and air conditioning. We will share your comments with our team for follow up. Thank you for your business and we hope to serve you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Incredible customer experience from the moment the valet staff, Scott and Salvidor, greeted me at the front entrance through cocktail hour, breakfast and the housekeeping staff. I was made to feel like family.  This would be my ONLY place to stay when planning a trip to Orange County, CA.
