Manager Response: Dear Dean G -  Thank you for your review from your recent stay. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the service from Scott and Salvadore.  We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: The room was perfect for our family.  It allowed for some private time away from the kids with the 2 room suite.  I was able to watch the game while the kids watched kid shows. The location is close to freeway, 15 minutes from the beach, and walking distance to restaurants. When we stayed, there was a field trip and kids everywhere.  We heard kids running up and down the hallway and it made for a sleepless night.
Manager Response: Dear 399ericap -  Thank you for your review. We are happy to hear our two room suites were a perfect fit for your family. I am sorry that you were disturbed by noise during your stay. We appreciate your staying with us and we hope to serve you on future visits to Orange County.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Nice Hilton Property. It could stand a update on d√©cor. That being said, I would normally have rated this property a 3 to a 3.5. However the people at this property make this easily a 4 star hotel.   On the day that I arrived, their airport shuttle was broken. When I called the property they asked me to just get a cab and they would reimburse me the money, which they promptly did (in cash) at check in.   Every associate that I encountered from the Check in desk to the manager's reception to the restaurant were both friendly and professional. They even had a replacement shuttle ready and waiting the following morning.
Manager Response: Dear forteiii -  Thank you for your tripadvisor review...we are so pleased to hear you enjoyed the service of our staff. We apologize for the inconvenience caused by our airport shuttle. We appreciate your business and hope to serve you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: This Embassy Suites is one of the BEST hotels in the country! I have personally stay in over 30 hotels per year with my business travel and it always great to come back to Santa Ana, CA  The management and staff are Simply The BEST! DD, Las Vegas, NV
Manager Response: Dear Doug D -  We appreciate your review of your stay. We are so pleased to hear you had another great stay with us. Thank you very much for your business and we look forward to serving you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary Heading: 1 Week Stay, Wed-Wed for daughters graduation
Summary: Property is kept in excellent condition with attention to detail at their utmost. Courtesy and friendliness is the best. The staff is at their best, 100% of the time. From the desk staff, to the Valet Staff (Thanks Scott and Salvidore ! You guys are number ONE !!! )  I've seen some ratings where nothing but a White Linen spread with perfection lives, but that is not reality nor is it real life. Life is not perfect, so accept Great, not Perfect. For those people seeking perfection ?  They should concern themselves with WHY their spouses chose them, because they, themselves are not perfect. No one is. Period. ! Overall, The one thing I would change is the "cheap" feeling commode seats.   This is coming from a couple from Chicago, and we know good service when we see it.
Manager Response: Dear jerry s -  Thank you for your review. On behalf of our entire team, we thank you for staying with us during your daughter's graduation. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and the service from our team, especially Scott and Salvadore.  We appreciate your business and hope to serve you again.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary Heading: Not what I am used to
Summary: I stay at Embassy all the time.  This one was lacking.  Hope you get into the shower before your neighbor or you will be like me and get no water. Also the breakfast is only good if you are the first few in line. The noise of the freeway was like they were driving through my room even though the traffic was blocks away.
Manager Response: HeatherA41,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  I am sorry to hear about he problem that you experienced with the hotel's domestic hot water system.  Each of our rooms should be balanced so that there is no water pressure loss such as you experienced.  So that other guests that stay in that room do not have a similar experience, I've referred the issue to our Chief Engineer for correction.  Additionally, I'm sorry to hear that the hotel's location adjacent to the freeway caused you to not get a good night's sleep.  Great tip you shared on the complimentary breakfast!  Arriving early is certainly a great way to avoid longer line and have a more leisurely experience.  We know most of our guests like to sleep in a little bit and the last hour and a half of breakfast is quite a bit busier.    Thank you again for staying with us. I hope you will consider us again on your future travels to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager

Summary: Ask for a room with less or no road noise.  I was on the 9th floor and could hear every car, motorcycle and plane that went by.  Also, the free shuttle wasn't running from the airport and they promised to reimburse me for my taxi.  I wasn't able to get a receipt from my taxi driver and the hotel refused to reimburse me.  Wasn't impressed.
Manager Response: Dear Thomas D -  We appreciate your comments from your stay with us and we are sorry to hear you experienced some problems during your stay. We will share your comments with our team and work to improve on the issues you noted.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: The clear roof protected atrium in the center of the hotel makes you feel like you are in Hawaii.  Waterfall, Koi fish, and turtles to entertain the kids while having a wonderful, buffet breakfast.  Staff are all quite friendly and helpful.  Very clean and comfortable.  I loved having a sliding door to outside and views since many hotels today do not have that.  I would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Kathy H -  We appreciate your sharing your comments from your stay with us. We are happy to hear you enjoyed our staff and the ambiance of the hotel.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you again in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Overall I liked this hotel and would stay again if need be. The staff was very friendly and helpful. We enjoyed the daily free breakfast and evening reception. My only complaints had to be the bad internet reception in our room and with how cold our room was and that we could not control the thermostat at this time of year. We had to ask for 4 extra blankets to keep us warm at night. Other than that we like the place.
Manager Response: Dear Reynaldo A -  Thank you for reviewing your stay with us. We are pleased you enjoyed our staff and the hotel. I apologize for the issues you experienced with the Internet and room temperature. We will share these comments with our team to follow up.  We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you on future visits to Orange County.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Great stay - staff, all the amenities - would stay again. They have a reception for guests in the evening and their dining room was a fun place to eat.  Lounge areas with spaces for quiet conversation.
Manager Response: Dear lacruz928 -  We appreciate your review from your recent stay with us. We are pleased you enjoyed our hotel and our staff, and especially our restaurant. Thank you for staying with us and we hope to serve you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom

Summary: Great hotel I would stay there again when I'm back in town. Awesome staff and the amenities are awesomne. They have a great indoor pool and  awesome bar. There food there is also very good.       Great hotel I would stay there again when I'm back in town. Awesome staff and the amenities are awesomne. They have a great indoor pool and awesome bar. There food there is also very good.
Manager Response: Jose,  Thank you for your kind words regarding your excellent stay at our property.  We greatly appreciate the time you took to complete this online review!  We hope your future travels bring you back to the Orange County area soon, so that we can be of service once more!    Very Respectfully,  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: Stayed here on a business trip and I was greatly pleased by the variety of food/drinks at the free breakfast and the closeness to the huge dining/shopping center called the District (less than a mile away). My room was cold, but the front desk delivered a space heater which helped.
Manager Response: ArizonaTLC,  Thank you for your review of your stay at our property.  I'm so glad that our guest services team was able to meet all of your needs during your stay and that you enjoyed the attraction in the vicinity of the hotel.  We look forward to being of service to you again, when your travels bring you back to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards,  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: Staff in the kitchen & some of the front desk personnel were courteous other than that no word from manager.    I had issues with check in as room  wasn't available when I arrived at 3 p.m.  I had to wait 1 hour and 37 minutes to get my room.  I got to the room and the sheets were dirty.  Notified front desk and got a maid with an attitude who threw my pillows on the floor while she changed my sheets and had the audacity to ask if I wanted another blanket.  Seriously?  If the sheets are dirty why wouldn't I want a clean blanket?   The hotel is a very nice hotel but management doesn't seem to care much about us as guests as I never got a call from management as to my issues.  I got into another room and the sheets had holes in them.
Manager Response: Ananrivera,  Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to review your recent stay at our hotel.  I was saddened to read that we failed to meet your expectations in both service and product.  I will personally be sharing your comments with our executive housekeeper and front office manager for corrective actions.  Please know that we strive to provide ever guest an enjoyable stay and Embassy Suites Hotels has come to build its reputation on that philosophy.  We hope that you will consider staying with us again in the future.  Warmest Regards,  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary Heading: Embassy Suites OC Airport N Delivers!
Summary: Hotel staff was excellent.  Friendly, responsive, accommodating.  Free breakfast is top notch, and the kids love the indoor pond with large fish and turtles.  Rooms are clean.  Great for families on a budget.  We've stayed here several times now, each time for 8 days+.  Location is central to all SoCal theme parks, the beach, and other points of interest.  Minutes of OC John Wayne Airport (SNA).  Great value.  We will be back.
Manager Response: Michael,  Thank you so much for your kind words.  It elates my team to know that you and your family consider this place to be your choice of hotels in the Orange County area.  Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you again sometime soon!  Timothy Wagner, CRDE Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: We will always try to stop at the Embassy Suites group of hotels  - often the LAX branch. So we new what to expect when we came to this branch  -  and were not disappointed. The hotesl hves a 'prison cells' look about them  but the  green foliage and koi carp filled pools throughout the ground floor give them  a unique look . The rooms/suites are very large  and the beds VERY comfortable. A family of 5 can easily be accomodated in these and so it is very cost effective when taking into account the excellent (free) breakfast  provided. Plenty of food choices, hot and cold, including a freshly made omelette station. The  drinks,  fresh  fruit and pastries are a bonus!   We were impressed by the complimentary evening snacks and drink  - the  hot cheesy nachos were yummy!! The wi-fi
Manager Response: Dear wt175 -  We appreciate your review from your stay with us.  We are very pleased to hear you had a wonderful visit with us.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Stayed there for 5 days, 2 of those 5 days I received no room service. Unfriendly staff, bad internet and cable service. Overall one of the worst hotel stays ever! I will not be visiting this nightmare of a place again.
Manager Response: Dear Yvonne G -  I'm so sorry for your poor experience this week at our hotel. Please be assured I will be discussing your comments with our management team to work on immediate improvements. We take pride in providing the best in lodging and service so our lapses during your stay are being taken very seriously.  Thank you for sharing your comments with us.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: We have stayed at several Embassy Suites around the country without any complaints.  However, at this one we were disappointed with the cleanliness of our room.  The bed covers had what looked like wine stains and we found old grapes on the floor in the bedroom.  The trash can had not been completely emptied as there were grape stems still in the bottom.  On the positive side, the evening reception was very good and the bartender very accommodating and the cooked to order breakfast in the morning was all we could ask for.  Management did comp us some extra points as a result of our experience with the cleanliness.  One unclear point was the parking charge posted but we did not pay, perhaps because of our Hilton Honors level.
Manager Response: Dear Howard R -  We appreciate your review of your recent stay with us.  I certainly understand the unpleasant surprise with the housekeeping issues in your room...I apologize for that happening to you.  We will follow up with our housekeeping team immediately.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our evening reception and cooked to order breakfast.  Thank you for your business and we hope to serve you again in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel several times a year for more than 5 years.  (We switched to this hotel from a neighboring competitor when their quality went down.)  We love their breakfasts and afternoon happy hours.  Staff is friendly and very attentive.  What is disappointing is they now are charging for parking.  No improvement on the parking area; an additional fee for something that has been free all these years.
Manager Response: Dear John G -  Thank you for your review of your recent stay with us.  We are please to hear you enjoyed the service from our staff and our complimentary cooked to order breakfast, as well as our complimentary evening reception.  We recently moved to managed parking and added the option of valet parking, being one of the last of the full service airport hotels to do so.  We appreciate your business and hope to continue serving you on your future visits to Orange County.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary Heading: booked double but recived king when we called 3 times already
Summary: Not happy with check in.  Clerk put 4 of us in a king bed. You don't do that to people who called from the moring asking to check in and Christy assure me at 11 am with our request.  I spoke to her.  Now we 4 end up at 3:30 pm room with a king.  It's not even mid night and you do this to a family. Why did Christy assure us a room blocked at 11 am?  I will write to corporate about this not caring service.
Manager Response: Dear Gerald P -  Thank you for posting a review regarding your stay at our hotel on Trip Advisor. I apologize for the issues you had with our giving you the wrong room type at check in.  I note that our team did get you moved to a room with two beds, but obviously we should have had the correct room type when you first arrived.  We will follow up with our team to correct this for the future.  We appreciate your business.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: My room looked liked it had not been remodelled sice the 70s and smelled like mold but if you keep the window open its like being on the freeway with the noise.   The internet barely works, its about equal to dial up speeds. Lots of options in a the area Go somewhere else!!!
Manager Response: Dear Stacey D -  Thank you for the feedback on your stay with us. I would like to apologize for our failing to meet all of your expectations. We use such valuable feedback from customers such as you to help us improve the hotel. I hope you will give us another try in the future; we would love the opportunity to earn back your trust.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: I travel to Southern California regularly for business and have stayed at many properties.  This hotel location has become my favorite!  Close to all major freeways, great accommodations by having your own personal suite, the staff is extremely courteous and remembers you from previous visits and they have the best 'free' breakfast of any hotel I have ever stayed.  The afternoon social is on the light side.  If you like to drink you will love it, but the food is not that great save the veggies.  The room service is just ok, that is why I only gave it 4 stars.  But you have to realize that most people will either eat out or not eat so I guess that is the reason the dinner options are just ok.  Since I feel so at home I even prefer to drive a little longer and return to this
Manager Response: Dear julieta 16 -  We appreciate your review from your recent stay with us.  We are very pleased that you enjoyed our staff service and especially our Complimentary Cooked to Order breakfast.  Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to serving you again.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Everything was typical of Embassy except for the large amount of parking space reserved for valet, leaving not enough parking for non-valet parking customers.  It was frustrating to come back late at night and have to spend so much time circling the parking lot trying to find a place to park. Especially when we already paid $15 additional to park.  In addition parking stalls were extremely small. We had to crawl into our car from one side multiple times and came home with new door ding dents in our car.
Manager Response: Ashleigh,   Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the difficulties that you experienced with parking during your stay. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.  Warmest Regards,  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: Love this place and would recommend it to anyone.  Staff went out of their way to make us feel at home.  Rooms comfortable.  Great breakfast.  Evening reception an added bonus.  Shuttle was a nice way to get around.
Manager Response: Dear Belinda H -  Thank you for your review...we are pleased you enjoyed the hotel, our staff, and our many amenities.  We will share your comments with our team.  We appreciate your staying with us and we look forward to serving you again in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: I moved from another hotel closer to the airport that was a little too noisy / not great to this location. Great grounds and amenities (large fitness room, pool, hot tub, bar, breakfast / evening reception area). The rooms are dated, but comfortable. The air conditioning is a very old system of either heat or cool for the entire building, so there isn't much ability to fine-tune the temperature in your room.  Staff is extremely friendly and helpful. The top floor (10) is for high-status HH members and has automated vending machines for snacks. Valet parking is available for about $19.  I would stay here again as it is convenient to the local highways to get to where you want to go.
Manager Response: Dear Jon E -   We appreciate your comments from your recent stay with us.  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and the service of our staff.  Thank you very much for your business and we hope to serve you again on your next visit to Orange County.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Very nice hotel. Quiet, so able to work in the evenings.  Room service food was delicious.  Proximity to freeway was good due to business travel. Disneyland is nearby so it would be a nice place to come back to with family.  Only thing I didnt like is that the room was too cold and there was no way to adjust the temparature.  May be better for a summer trip.
Manager Response: Dear Ana G -  Thank you for your review.  We are pleased you enjoyed your room, the service, and our room service food...we will share your comments with our team.  We appreciate your choosing us for your travel needs and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: My suite was impeccably clean and tidy, the restaurant was reliably good (this is mostly a traveller's hotel, not a night spot), and on weekend days, improved by the presence of children and high school kids on their way to athletic even, holidays, or family events. I put "comfortable" in the title of this review, and thought of giving the place three stars--but it deserves four, just because it IS so comfortable. I was in the building for three full days and felt pretty much at home from the start. The staff at the desk were especially helpful when my transport back to LAX did not materialize on my final day--young people, but competent and capable.
Manager Response: Dear Ciceronian -   We appreciate your wonderful review of our hotel and staff.  We are pleased you had a great stay with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Thank you for your business.  Kindest regards,  Tom Pugh

Summary: Due to a flight delay the night before, the person I spoke with "accidentally" released my room which caused some confusion the next morning when I checked in.  The hotel made arrangements to correct this employees mistake and made sure that I checked into my room the next morning. I was pleased with the staff as they changed my room to a remodeled one as I had originally booked.  My stay was delightful.  Breakfast was great!
Manager Response: Dear Patricia V -  We appreciate your sharing your comments from your stay with us.  We apologize for the error on your reservation.  We are pleased that our staff got this corrected and you enjoyed your visit.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Hotel is very dated, smells musty and never enough staff in the restaurant/bar if it fills up to about half capacity.  The bar was also not very clean, likely a rsult of not having enough staff on duty.
Manager Response: Dear Mark F -  We appreciate your review of your recent stay with us.  We are sorry to hear of the issues you experienced...we will follow up with our staff on these immediately.  Thank you for your business and we hope to serve you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Since this was our first stay at this hotel, I called the Guest Services Manager (Adam Colley) to share our needs/expectations. After a delightful 2-week stay, I can say that all our needs were met and surpassed ! Thank you Mr. Colley for your professionalism and making our stay enjoyable.  This hotel has the happiest staff we've seen in all our travels. Their manners and hospitality are second to none. The facility is always clean and our suite was comfortable,spacious and well-furnished. Housekeeping is consistently excellent.  Some people who deserve our recognition and thanks for their professionalism: 1. Front Desk: Mr. Zimmerman for a smooth check-in and Ms. Reena for ongoing excellent service. 2. Breakfast: Ms. Angela & Claudia for taking care of us everyday; and Mr.
Manager Response: Dear ashwest -  Thank you for your wonderful review and the recognition on our team members.  We are pleased you enjoyed your extended stay with us, and on behalf of our entire team, thank you for your business.  We hope to have you back with us again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: This is a tough review so let me just list out the pros and cons.  Pros:  The exterior is beautiful Rooms with a patio are a BIG plus The breakfast was good but just your standard ES breakfast Most of the staff was super nice The rooms are nice, love having a separate living room to work and watch TV in Great location right next to the highway and just a few minutes from the airport  Cons:  The rooms need some updating, TV's are tiny The bathroom is so small, no way more than one person can fit in there at a time There is one guy working at the front desk who is rude and does not seem like he wants to be there They start taking down the breakfast at 8:45, very frustrating especially since they quit serving at 9 NBC was not working, what up with that??? Overpriced and have to pay
Manager Response: Dear Sorrells 13 -  We appreciate your review of your stay with us.  We are pleased to hear you overall enjoyed you stay and we thank you for the constructive feedback for improvement.  We will share your comments with our staff for their follow up.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Conveniently located just off the freeway. Overall appearance of property inside and out very pleasing. Breakfast selection excellent especially cook to order omelets. Room size and layout generous. Beds very comfortable.  Would recommend to family and friends.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to Stay for Business
Summary: Flew in for a business trip. Complimentary shuttle from and to hotel a plus. Rooms are large and provide what you need. Complimentary breakfast and "Happy Hour" does the trick! Staff are terrific. Big bummer that there is not free wi-fi. It is 2015 right?
Manager Response: Dear sdaraio -  We appreciate your review and your choosing us for your recent business trip.  We are pleased you enjoyed the hotel and our amenities.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary Heading: If I could rate a 6 I would...
Summary: I travel almost every week for my job, I stay at a lot of hotels (Hilton brand mostly). I don't get to see my family as often as I would like (10 kids..all natural...one wife, original). I always get concerned when taking the whole zoo somewhere how we will be received and this hotel and its staff could not have been more patient and accommodating. Very helpful from the bell staff all the way to housekeeping. Breakfast was wonderful, accommodations were clean and  tidy, the pool was well taken care of and the staff impeccable. Close enough to Disney, Knott's Berry Farm and the beach that we hardly noticed the drive. Thank you all for such a wonderful stay and treatment!
Manager Response: Dear Aaron B -  Thank you for your review of your stay with us.  We are so pleased to hear you and your family enjoyed your stay with us.  It sounds like you had the opportunity to enjoy our attractions in Orange County.  We appreciate your business and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: I remember coming to the hotel for brunch 30+ years ago and it looks like it has not changed since then.  My room smelled musty even though on a non-smoking floor and the desk chair was not able to be adjusted so I had to use bed pillows to make it comfortable to get work done.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice My grandkids only want to stay at your hotel.It had everything we needed.They loved the pool and hot tub.We loved happy hour.Nice soft beds .The location was great not too far for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Rachelle,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your comments about your recent stay with us.  I'm so glad to hear that our location was a perfect fit for you and your grandkids!  We look forward to have you stay with us again in the near future.  Thanks again for your kind comments!  Warmest Regards,  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: My family and I stayed at this location back in January for a Disneyland trip. The guest service right from the get-go was phenomenal. Mitchell at the front desk was very friendly, welcoming, and answered all of my questions. The breakfast staff deserves some major kudos. They were the best breakfast crew we have ever experienced. Every morning they were happy, quick to help, and always checking to make sure there was nothing else we needed. They made us feel very welcome and their genuine morning greetings always started our day off right. In addition to a wonderful breakfast crew, nothing beats eating breakfast in the hotel's beautiful atrium area. I usually have the hubby bring breakfast up while we hurry to get everyone ready for the day, but we made sure to wake up with
Manager Response: Morgan,  Thank you so much for reviewing your stay with us in January.  I'm so sorry to hear about your allergies and that they didn't mesh well with our hotel.  However, if a bright side can be found, I'm glad that the rest of your stay wonderful and accented by great guest service.  Thanks again for taking the time to share!  Warmest Regards,  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary Heading: Great staff and great place to stay
Summary: Spent a week here and loved it. Very comfortable and quiet room. Staff was excellent. Will definitely stay here again. Embassy Suites are one of my favorite. Morning breakfast is plentiful and filling; manager's evening reception is always needed after a long day of work. Only criticism is that manager's reception snacks need to be more than chips and salsa.
Manager Response: Lee,  Thank you so much for the kind comments!  We're so glad that you had an enjoyable stay.  We look forward to being of service again, when your travels bring you back to the Santa Ana - Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards,  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: We stayed at your hotel during mid February 2015.  We had a great experience with your valet team of Darius and Ron, and your Front Desk staff.  The room was clean and we had a restful stay.  Thanks again for a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Dear Fun4ourgang-  Thank you for your review of your stay with us.  We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed the hotel and service, especially from Darius, Ron, and our front office team.  We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: The vending machines on the Diamond Member floor didn't work.  I was billed for parking when I didn't have a car and I used the Hotel's airport shuttle. Other than that, it was pretty good.  I will probably stay there again.
Manager Response: Lanford,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay with us at the Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  We greatly appreciate your feedback!    Please accept my apology on behalf of the hotel for the billing error that you experienced.  I am so glad to hear that the front desk was able to resolve the mistake before you even departed the hotel.   I have passed your note about the Premium Suites credenza along to our engineering team to make sure all of the mechanical components are functioning correctly.   Thank you again for your comments and we look forward to have you stay with us again on your next trip to the Orange County Airport area.  Very Respectfully,  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: My only problems were paying for parking (I stayed here a year ago and there were not any charges) and the room was cold.  Other than that, this is an excellent facility.  The breakfast was excellent as were the exercise facilities.
Manager Response: Dan,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay with us.  It is always thrilling to hear guest have excellent stays with us.  We look forward to having you back with us on your next trip to the Orange County area.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: I feel like I was robbed. I travel for business and this was my first time in Santa Ana. When I arrived, the Valet came out and told me there was a $4/day charge for Valet service. What he didn't tell me is there is a $15/day charge for parking. That I found out on check out.
Manager Response: John,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North. Please accept my apology on behalf of the hotel that you were caught off guard by our published charges. We work diligently to make sure all charges, fess, and taxes are published on our websites, confirmation letters, reservation centers, and even work to make sure 3rd party travel agents, such as Expedia.com, have all the relevant information to pass their travelers. We hope that you will still consider staying with us again in the future.  Warmest Regards, Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary Heading: Not what I expected from an Embassy Suites for sure...
Summary: Where to start?  I was staying here for business for 6 days, Sunday to Saturday.  I normally stay at an Embassy whenever I can since you know what you are getting normally, and I say normally.  Upon check in, where I was not greeted as a gold member nor given a room upgrade or even the waters you are supposed to get - not even put on a Hilton Honors Floor.  But it was kind of late so maybe others checked in before me.  I get to my room, and the room is warm so I go to change the temp - well the hotel runs a "two pipe system" meaning you really can't change the temp - a sign states between 55-70 the hotel does NOT run AC - I call front desk and get told the same thing - they suggested opening the balcony door...I'd just flew across the country and really wanted to go to sleep and
Manager Response: Dear Snaglpus00-  I'm so sorry for your poor experience this week at our hotel. Please be assured I will be discussing your comments with our management team to work on immediate improvements. We take pride in providing the best in lodging and service so our lapses during your stay are being taken very seriously. Again, on behalf of the staff and management - I offer our apologies.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: The facility and staff are top notch...I highly recommend the brand and location to family vacation and business travel. Excellent service and value! The made to order breakfasts and exceptionally clean facilities exceeded my expectations.
Manager Response: Dear Charles G -  We appreciate your review from your recent stay with us.  Our team is very pleased that you enjoyed the hotel and the service from our staff.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: We were on vacation in the area and met up with some friends at a nightclub. A few of them had a little bit too much to drink and a 2 Hour Drive ahead of them. I was not comfortable in letting them make that long drive after having a long night. So I jumped on my Hilton honors app and locked down two adjoining rooms at the Embassy suites. The staff was quick to take care of us and the next morning everybody was very refreshed and ate an amazing custom made to order breakfast. Thank you all for making everybody enjoy there stay and keeping all of us safe.
Manager Response: Dear Dennisbynum -  We appreciate your review from your stay with us.  We are happy to hear that our Hilton HHonors app worked well for you and that you enjoyed your stay.  Thank you for your loyalty to the Hilton family of hotels and we look forward to serving again.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: If the Manager's reception is meant to be a welcome and make you feel good about the experience, it comes up short. There are no top shelf liquors; the food is AM/PM snacks and even the bar tender asks you to add your own garnish into your drink. The breakfast sign says "cook to order", yet when I asked for a poached egg, I was offered "fried to order". The food quality was poor. The overall experience felt like a low grade school or hospital buffet, not a class hotel spread.
Manager Response: 189robertv -  Thank you for your review from your stay with us.  We are sorry to hear the complimentary evening reception and our complimentary breakfast was not up to your expectations and we apologize.  We appreciate your business and hope to serve you again in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Overall we loved this hotel, we were their for a getaway cruise during the super bowl Sunday, it was close to south coast plaza, the beach and freeways. the restaurant and bar was reasonably priced. Will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel S -  We appreciate your review from your stay with us.  Our team is very pleased to hear you had a great stay and we look forward to your return.  Thank you for your business.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Excellent service, very clean, great food, very family friendly!  I'm incredibly impressed that for the same price of local hotels, you get a much larger room, wonderful service & great hospitality!  We will be returning here FOR SURE! ...NOT TO MENTION...it's 15 minutes from the beach, 19 minutes from Disneyland...WONDERFUL LOCATION
Manager Response: Dear Aimee C -   Thank you for staying with us and posting your comments on TripAdvisor.  It sounds like you made the best of your time in Orange County and saw some of our greatest attractions.  We are pleased you enjoyed the service of our staff and the hotel.  We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: It seems many of the embassy suites we have stayed at have rooms that are a little tired. The decore typically seems dated. Nevertheless, the staff is always friendly and the rooms are clean. The breakfast is always a selling point for us. I liked how this hotel had trash cans in the room for recycling. I wish more did. This by far is the most interestingly design exterior and interior lobby for an embassy suites.  I did not like how the living room had a 32 in tv on a dresser. It was too small an too high to watch from the sofa. Sorry Hilton I am not going to pay for wifi!!
Manager Response: Dear Tgsd -  Thank you for your review.  We are happy to hear you enjoyed our staff service and the hotel.  We appreciate your business and we hope to serve you again and your next trip to Orange County.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Service was outstanding.  Nicest hotel staff I've experienced in a long time. I would recommend this hotel to all travelers for business or pleasure.  Hilton Honors had made an error in booking the reservation but the hotel staff went above and beyond resolving the issue - with no help from Hilton Honors.
Manager Response: Dear Clark J -  We appreciate your review of your stay with us.  We are pleased to hear that our team took good care of you in an unfortunate situation...our team will be delighted by your kudos.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you again.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary Heading: Plumbing could use a little work
Summary: I stayed here for a couple days last summer when most of my usual haunts in Anaheim were sold out for the timeframe I was going to be in town.  I was not impressed.  My lasting memory of this place is the black gunk that came up out of the bathroom sink on multiple occasions.  I can kind of forgive the first time (okay, that's a bit of a stretch, but as you can see from my reviews I can give some benefit of the doubt).  But after maintenance came and "fixed" it the gunk came back two days later.  Needless to say, I drank bottled water and used the bar sink when brushing my teeth that week.
Manager Response: Dear JohnS_2563 -  Thank you for your review.  You have really stretched my memory on what caused the plumbing issue back in July!  I certainly apologize for the problem you experienced.  We are pleased that we have not had any further issues recently, but we will ensure our engineering team keeps an eye out for this.  We appreciate your business and hope you will give us another chance in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary Heading: The best staff you will find
Summary: I travel about 30% of the year and sometimes have the opportunity to stay at some of the best five star hotels.  The staff at the Embassy Suites are as attentive and courteous as any staff I have encountered.  The hotel itself is a beautiful structure.  I can't wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear Gary H -  Thank you so much for your review...our team will be excited to receive your compliments.  We appreciate your business and hope to serve you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Look no further if breakfast is important to you. The people here are very friendly and will make your eggs the way you like them. For free though I recommend you leave a tip because they deserve it. And if you need restaurant recommendations, talk to Mimi at the counter. She's the best receptionist I've ever encountered. She represents their brand well.
Manager Response: Victor,  Thank you so much for sharing your kind comments about your expierence with us at the Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  I'll be sure to pass your comments along to Mimi and the breakfast team.  We look forward to having you back as our guest!  Warmest Regards,  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: Parking  was horrible.  Started a motor cycle outside my room at 5 AM and raced the engine for 15 minutes to warm it up.  Had my reservation without wifi even though the title of my room type was wifi and breakfast.
Manager Response: William,  Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to review our hotel.  I'm sorry to hear about the motorcycle that started up in early in the morning and Wi-Fi troubles.  Guest feedback is always appreciated and helps us to improve our guest experience.  I hope that you will still consider us again in the future when you travel to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards,  Timothy Wagner Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary Heading: Beautiful property, wonderful location (next to SNA) amazing staff
Summary: I stayed 2 nights and enjoyed everything about the hotel. The only thing I would've liked better was if the rooms had an extra fan. They don't use air or heat during certain temps. 55-70 means no heat or air. It did get a bit warm. They offer portable heater but not a fan. It wasn't unbearable but definitely could've been more comfortable. Besides that awesome staff great water features!
Manager Response: Dear Kimberly M -  We appreciate your review of your stay...we are so pleased to hear you enjoyed the hotel and the staff.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you again.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: My husband and I had a woderful experience staying at the Embassy Suites hotel in Santa Ana Orage County Airport North.  The breakfast food and service was top notch.  Our room, to the pool area and breakfast area were always clean and tidy.  The staff made us feel comfortable and welcome.  Our only complaint was the $15.00 parking fee they added to the room rate.  It isn't located in a large downtown city with limited parking so this fee seemed very unnecessary.
Manager Response: Dear brendal657-  Thank you for your review...we are pleased you enjoyed your stay with us.  We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: front desk poor service had to wait several minutes before acknowledged, room smelled and fans could not be turned off  will not stay at this property again, from the outside it looks nice, but the furnishing are old, needs to be updated,
Manager Response: Dear Joseph S -  Thank you for the feedback on your stay with us. I would like to apologize for our staff failing to meet all of your expectations. We use such valuable feedback from customers such as you to help us improve the hotel. I hope you will give us another try in the future; we would love the opportunity to earn back your trust.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: We have stayed in this hotel a few times. It is new and modern and 5 minutes from John Wayne Airport.  Convenient for any place you want to go in Orange County.  The rooms are very nice as is typical of Spring Hill.  The breakfast is the best of this class hotel and the lady that takes care of this one does an excellent job.  I would recommend this hotel to business or leisure travelers.
Manager Response: Dear 249sh -  We appreciate your taking time to review your stay and we are pleased you enjoyed your visit to Orange County.  We look forward to serving you in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: I stayed at this hotel with a very large group over New Years. I travel with groups often, and I appreciate it when a hotel makes us feel we are valued guests to them. This overall was not the case with this hotel.  We arrived after a 28 hour bus trip after 5:00 pm, and a number of our rooms were not yet ready, and were not available until after 6:00 pm. This is completely unacceptable. The excuse was that they were sold out the night before. Well, you KNOW when you are sold out, and you KNOW when a group requiring 95 rooms is checking in. In either of those cases, you bring in extra staff if needed to meet the checkin deadline for rooms being ready.  Throughout our stay, there were many times that adequate towels were not placed in each room. When there are 5 people in a room,
Manager Response: Dear subtchr -  Thank you for your review from your group's stay with us.  I apologize for the problems you had with the check in process, guestroom towels, and the one morning at breakfast.  I am pleased to hear the banquet functions and the other days breakfasts went very well.  We appreciate your feedback and we will follow up with our team to ensure these issues are corrected for the future.  We look forward to serving you again.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Great location close to John Wayne Airport. Easy on and off the 55 makes it a good starting or ending point, but be aware of the traffic! The staff is extremely friendly and helpful. Large and comfortable rooms. The fitness area overlooks the pool making it good for parents need to get their workout in and can multitask. A large business center (for those who don't carry theirs). A nice solid older building so you hear less noise!
Manager Response: Dear Richard K -  Thank you for your review...we are so pleased to hear you enjoyed our wonderful staff and the hotel.  We thank you for your business and hope to serve you on your next visit to Orange County.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Heating and cooling is only available when outside temps are below 55F or above 70F. Portable heat is made available which I consider to be a fire hazard. Also there are not enough heaters for all guests. Our room was likely in the high 50's in a late December stay. $15.00 fee for self parking though if you return late in the evening there is likely to be no spaces. Yes you still pay the fee.
Manager Response: Dear 584mistyb -  Thank you for the feedback on your stay with us. I would like to apologize for our failing to meet all of your expectations. We use such valuable feedback from customers such as you to help us improve the hotel. I hope you will give us another try in the future; we would love the opportunity to earn back your trust.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Service at this hotel was marginal.  Our overall experience was good, but one or two employees who were not trained to meet customer needs left us with less than an excellence experience. That mainly took place at check-in.  The breakfast is superior.
Manager Response: Dear Richard N -  We appreciate your review from your recent stay with us.  We are pleased that the hotel, our location, and our complimentary breakfast met your expectations.  We apologize for the issues you had with a few of our staff that did not provide the proper level of service...we will follow up.  Thank you for your business and we hope to serve you again.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: We were in the area to visit Knotts Berry Farm and needed a room large enough to accommodate 2 adults and 4 children and this was one of the best we could find in the area.  The pool was a must for the kiddos! The pool area was my favorite of any Embassy Suites we've ever stayed at. It was clean, the air was breathable and the echoing that usually drives us crazy at indoor pools was minimal.  Our room was large, it actually felt a little larger than other Embassy Suites we've stayed at across the country. It had a nice large patio, we didn't really use it, but it was a nice touch, and we would probably use it on other trips. The room was a little rundown in areas, which didn't bother us, but I'm sure it would others. The room also had a small mini fridge, sink and I believe
Manager Response: Marilynsmum,  Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  I was pleased to read that we were about to meet the needs of your family.  Your comments regarding your room, our sports bar, and the complimentary breakfast offering will be shared with our team members so that we can continuously look for ways to improve the guest experience.  Thank you again for stay with us and we hope that you will stay with us again!  Warmest Regards, Tim  Timothy R. Wagner Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: Would highly recommend this Hotel to anyone.  The staff was very courteous and professional and the Hotel was very nice and well kept.  The price was also resonable.  The complimentary breakfast was excellent.
Manager Response: Allyn,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your Chrstimas Day stay with us.  We hope that you and your family had an enjoyable holiday and it was our privledge to be of service on such a special occasion.  I'll be sure to share your comments about the staff with them at our next employee luncheon.  Thank you again for review and we hope to see you back at the hotel in the near future!  Respectfully, Tim  Timothy R. Wagner, CRDE Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: We stayed at Embassy Suites, Santa Ana, great hotel, treated us wonderful, would stay there again. great complimentary breakfast and complimentary drinks & snacks  in evening great value! kids loved the pool adults the hottub
Manager Response: Jacqueline,  Thank you for making us your home away from home while you brought your family to visit the Disneyland Resort.  Your positive review our of amenities and complimentary services is greatly appreciated.  We hope that you and your family will come back to visit us soon!  Sincerely, Tim  Timothy R. Wagner, CRDE Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: As usual, the staff, accommodations and complimentary breakfast were great.  Our late arrival was met with the usual great customer service and our room was nice and warm on that very cold evening.  The staff in the eating area are very accommodating and eager to please.  Our checkout was swift and the valet assistance had our vehicle ready, before exiting the hotel.
Manager Response: Shirleen,  Thank you so much for your kind comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We are so please that meet all of your expectations.  It would be our pleasure to have you as our guest again when your travels bring you back to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards, Tim  Timothy R. Wagner, CRDE Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange Coutny Airport North

Summary: We chose this hotel because it had a separate living area so that when our baby went to sleep early in the evening we didn't have to be silent or tiptoe around him (we could stay up in the living area and watch TV, relax, etc.)  However, the door separating the living area from the bedroom wouldn't shut, and squeaked horribly, so it completely defeated the purpose of choosing this hotel.  Then, the bathroom is in the bedroom which is normally ideal - but in a hotel where the point is to have a separate living space, the bathroom should be accessible from the living area without going through the bedroom. So to add to the noise of the squeaky doors, and the door not working/separating us - every time you used the bathroom the toilet flush would make this loud noise in the
Manager Response: Dear Lindsey A -  Thank you for your review...I apologize for the problems with the doors in your room that woke your baby.  We will have our engineering team go through our guestrooms to ensure we get this corrected.  We appreciate your taking time to share your comments and we hope to serve you in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: I left a long message in the previous frame.  Andy at the front desk and handling my reservation was wonderful.  Restaurant - wonderful.  Hot drinks Christmas day and night - wonderful.  Breakfast great.  Thank you! ! !
Manager Response: Dear Sharon R -  We appreciate your review of your stay with us.  We are so pleased to hear you enjoyed your stay and the service provided by Andy.  We have shared your comments and kudos with him.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you again.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: My family chose to stay here because although it is a little far from Disney, we could still spend the day at the parks without the same crowds and chaos at the hotel. We did have a rental car so getting around was and a breeze. You will pay for parking if you have a car and it was and round 15$ a day. It's  also within walking distance of a few great restaurants. We love Embassy Suites because of the perks. Fresh breakfast, afternoon drinks with snacks and bigger rooms for the five of us make it a family retreat. Although this hotel could use some updating, it exceeded our expectations. The staff were all kind and helpful. This was a great way to visit southern California. We would choose this hotel again.
Manager Response: Sfun1,  Thank you so much for your great comments!  We are so glad that your family had an enjoyable time with us.  We hope we can be your home away from home again on your next travels to the Orange County Airport / Disneyland area.  Warmest Regards,  Timothy R. Wagner, CRDE Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary Heading: I cant believe they charge for parking
Summary: $15 per day per car - not good at all - we had 3 cars so it was $45 extra per day - really upsetting - And it was something they just started doing so the staff didnt really handle the situation smoothly
Manager Response: 650kimberlyb,  Thank you for your review of your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  We greatly appreciate your feedback about our parking offering.  A sense of disorginazation is certaily far from the level of service we strive to provide all of our guests here at the hotel.  In January, parking gates are going to be installed to assist us with providing a smoother seamless guest expierence. Thank you again for sharing your comments!  Warmest Regards,  Timothy R. Wagner, CRDE Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary Heading: much better properties in the area, bad deal
Summary: This is not a great property. It is an older building and very very loud on the freeway side. There is no heating or cooling between 55 and 70 (see photo) The room smelled like mold when opening the door and the smell persisted. My toilet seat was broken. One of two elevators was broken. The managers reception is minimal, unlike most Embassy Suites, this one was pita, chips, salsa and bean dip (approx. 5 bucks worth of food). The first morning I ordered eggs over medium well, they came out raw, uncooked egg whites, the next morning the cook was better. For dinner I ordered a New York steak and was served sirloin, the owner must cut corners on every little thing and honestly it was the worst overall Hilton property I have ever stayed at..The staff is very nice but management is
Manager Response: Scott P,  Thank you for taking the time out of your busy schedule to write a review for your recent stay at the Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  I was saddened to read about the multiple areas where we failed to meet your expectations and have shared your review with my various department managers for investigation and corrective actions where needed.  Thank you again for sharing your expierence with us.  I hope that you will consider stay with us again when your travels bring you back to the Orange County Airport area.  Warmest Regards,  Timothy R. Wagner, CRDE Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: Rooms were large & beautiful but: -air conditioning/air circulation didn't work in both rooms, so balconys' had to be opened  -there is rule at managers reception 5:30-7:30pm to not give more than one drink per person.... & they wouldn't give you another drink if drink monitor saw from the drink station that you still had some drink!  & @ 7pm drink monitor got more strict with all disgruntled adults there!  -also needed special blue reception slip to get your one drink, your room card was unacceptable!  -workers at breakfast in a hurry for everyone to finish, though there was an hour before it should finish.     Our bad service was reported to Embassey Suites Santa Ana-Airport.  There are few Embassey Suites we would not recommend and this is one of them....it's too bad.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback and we sincerely apologize for the issues that you experienced during our complimentary service hours in the evening and complimentary breakfast. We will be sure to take your comments about our property under consideration as we re-evaluate guest needs and continually work to improve our guest experience. We hope you will consider staying with us again the next time your travels bring you to our area.   Thank you,  Timothy R. Wagner, CRDE Assistant General Manager Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North

Summary: We had a reunion at the Embassy Suites in Santa Ana, 17 people. I was beyond impressed with this hotel. The location was fantastic, the staff the friendliest ever. Ron our valet was guy was a hit with the whole family. I will look into Embassy Suites for all future travel, best hotel stay ever. I highly recommend this hotel, especially this location.
Manager Response: Dear L L -  Thank you for your TripAdvisor review...we are pleased to hear you enjoyed your reunion.  I am very happy to hear that our staff provided excellent service and note your special recognition of Ron.  We will share your kudos with everyone.  On behalf of the entire team here, thank you for your business.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary Heading: A great value all the way around
Summary: The size of the room was impressive but what I was truly amazed was the free HH drinks and the full breakfast in the morning.  When I booked and I found out that breakfast in the morning was included, I expected a spread of pastries.  I was surprised to find a full omelet bar!  The service of the wait staff was stupendous!  Better than in some restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear karlaro-  Thank you so much for your review...we are very pleased that you enjoyed our staff service and our amenities, especially our complimentary cooked to order breakfast.  We appreciate your staying with us and look forward to serving you again in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: This establishment meet and exceeded all my expectations. I had a wonderful stay. The entire staff went out of their way to make me feel welcome and comfortable. As a solo traveler safety was also important to me. There was not one moment that I felt uncomfortable or leery. Will definitely be returning.
Manager Response: Dear Janet M -  We appreciate your review of your stay with us.  We are very pleased to hear you enjoyed our staff service and the hotel.  On behalf of our entire team, thank you for your business and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: I had the occasion to stay at this Embassy Suites location for one night while in town for business.  This location had great front office staff who were ready and able to assist with any request.  I was greeted by two front desk staff, promptly given a cold bottle of water and a small bag of snacks.  I love the atrium feel of this, and many other Embassy Suites locations.  My room was in good condition and had all of the anticipated amenities.  The cook to order omelet station is a nice way to start the day.
Manager Response: Dear Shannon H -  We appreciate your review of your recent stay with us.  We are pleased to hear you enjoyed your business trip.  We thank you for the compliments on the staff, guestroom, and our breakfast.  We look forward to serving you again soon, and thank you for your business.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: We stay at this hotel on November for Thanksgiving for our family vacation. Excellent Hotel, Great Customer Service.  Their employees make you feel that you are at home.  Room were clean.  Food was great.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra C -  Thank you for spending your holiday with us and for your review.  We are very pleased to hear you enjoyed the hotel and the hospitality of our staff.  We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: This used to be a nice hotel but it has become very rundown. Our room smelled so badly of mold and mildew that we had to leave the windows open. The hotel staff was nice and polite and tried to be helpful, but they can only do so much when the property is run down.
Manager Response: Dear GarysJen -  Thank you for posting a review regarding your stay at our hotel on Trip Advisor.  I apologize for the issues you experienced during your stay. I have passed on your comments to our housekeeping manager and will follow up with her to insure we correct the issues you mentioned.   I am pleased that our staff was polite and helpful to you. I appreciate your patronage I hope you will give us another try in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: This hotel has an overwhelming perfume-like odor everywhere.  It's as if they are trying to cover up other odors.  If you are sensitive to odors, don't stay here.  I didn't even know I was this sensitive.  I had a headache and congestion the entire trip.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth R -  We appreciate your review from your stay with us.  We will follow up with our team on the cleaning product odor to correct this.  We thank you for your business and hope to serve you in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: We stay in the area every Thursday night during the school year.  I have tried almost every hotel in the area except this one, and decided to give it a try.  I was so disappointed.  The hotel was dated.  Our room was somewhat dirty.  The worst part was the internet.  It took me nearly 30 minutes to connect (had to call down to get the code so I would not be charged $7).  In the bedroom, the internet was unusable.  In the living area, it was okay.  The computers in the business center would not bring up the internet at all.    Breakfast was very decent.  I wish I had been able to enjoy the omelet bar but the line was too long.   Reliable internet is imperative when we stay in the area so unfortunately, we won't be coming back.
Manager Response: Cheryl,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us.  Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel for the internet service that was not up to your expectations.  We certainly understand how important it is to be able to stay connected to the online world and how it can greatly impact our guests from completing their business.  A couple months ago the hotel began working with Hilton's StayConnected team and AT&T to upgrade the hotel's guest internet technology.  This upgrade will include more access points to increase coverage areas and replacing some older equipment to open up the "internet pipeline".  The project is in the conclusion of its planning stages and it is our hope to see the upgraded equipment installed by quarter two of 2015.    Thank you again for your feedback.  Respectfully, Tim

Summary Heading: Very reasonable place.  Kids can be in room and you still  have privacy
Summary: This Embassy Suites has many good qualities:  1.  Free Airport Shuttle from Orange County Airport 2.  Free Parking 3.  Great Car Rental on site 4.  Beautiful building 5.  Large Suites with private bedroom 6.  Great rates 7.  Free Cocktails 8.  Free Breakfast 9.  Near Disneyland 10 Great Service
Manager Response: mybeach101,  Thank you so much for the kind comments and the top 10 list of reasons why the Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North is a great place to stay.  I hope that you and your family will stay with us again when your travels bring you back to the Orange County airport area.  Warmest Regards, Tim

Summary: My wife and I stayed here for 4 nights recently. To a person the staff was outstanding...friendly, pleasant, helpful, happy. Our room on the 9th floor was fine with a very very comfortable bed. The people staying in the room above us opened their sliding door to their balcony about 6 every morning. The sliding door sounded like a steam roller in our room on the floor below. The cooked to order breakfast every day was really outstanding. We ate in the hotel grill one night and their cobb salad and pasta were really excellent. A good handy location and a staff which was exceptional.
Manager Response: tlctlc49022,  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your comments regarding your recent stay with us at the Embassy Suites Santa Ana - Orange County Airport North.  I've submitted a work order to have the slider in 1027 looked at so that hopefully there will be no more steam roller effects for other guests.  Thank you again for sharing your thoughts! I'm so glad to hear that you had a enjoyable experience with us and received great customer service.   Warmest Regards, Tim

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel before and many other Embassy Suites over the years.  Really appreciate the breakfast and the happy hour.  Always good service and clean, nice rooms.  They seem to be located in areas where many people travel.  Always happy to stay at an Embassy Suite and I in turn recommend them friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear Nana T -  We appreciate your returning to stay with us and your review.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed the staff and our hotel and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kindest regards, Tom

Summary: This hotel is located a few miles away from the Disneyland resort or about half an hour drive with most traffic. Parking (small, and narrow) is behind the hotel.  Staff was friendly and more than helpful. Greeted promptly and room keys were offered immediately. Check in and lobby staff were helpful.   Room was a suite with a separate bedroom and living room. Spacious was the bedroom. Bathroom and room were up to date and modern. Well stocked and clean was the room. Temperature was comfortably set requiring no changes for later night and morning. Central temperature was in working order.   The bathroom and bedroom were in great keep through the visit of two nights. Water pressure and temperature were comfortable. The shower head was nice..    The bedroom carpet and decor were to
Manager Response: Dear Denny T -  We appreciate your review of your recent stay with us.  Our team and I are pleased you enjoyed the service you received.  Thank you for your business and we look forward to serving you again.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: This hotel is great,very quiet,the grounds are beautiful on the inside interior of the hotel,has a little river with fish and turtles,very quaint. This hotel is in a great location ,has great staff.And the breakfast is the BEST I've ever had at a hotel,many many choices. My only complaint would be, the rooms need to be updated and I wish they had firmer beds. But never the less I will always book here when in the area.
Manager Response: Dear beachgirl60 -  Thank you for your review of our hotel.  We are pleased you enjoyed the staff, our atrium area, and our complimentary cooked to order breakfast.  We appreciate your business and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary Heading: Not Bad But Defnitely Needs Work
Summary: I stayed here for two nights while on a business trip.  Location of the hotel is great.  Room was spacious and the same layout of other ES that I have stayed at.  The room is dated and needs some TLC especially in the bathroom.  Bathroom wallpaper was turning colors and and bubbling in certain areas.  The metal door frame and other metal trim areas in the bathroom are rusting.  I did have some left over hair in my sink and shower, so it does make me wonder how "clean" the room really is.  There was also some sticky stuff on the ottoman.  So attention to cleaning detail should be better.  Staff was friendly at the desk when I needed stamps and at check-in.  Staff was also very friendly at breakfast.  Breakfast was good overall.  I would stay here again, but it does need some
Manager Response: Dear Tiffanie U -  Thank you for your review of our hotel.  I certainly understand your concern with the housekeeping and maintenance issues you had in your room...I apologize for this not being up to our normal high standards.  We will share this with our team for their immediate attention.  We are pleased that our front desk and breakfast staff provided great service.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you back soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Great location to visit suppliers in SoCal and also see Disney.  This was my second trip to this hotel and it hasn't failed to please.  I love the setting...the garden area reminds me of home (Florida) and the evening reception was great for watching the World Series although the Royals didn't make it this year...
Manager Response: Dear James W -  We appreciate your review of our hotel.  Our team is happy to hear you enjoyed your trip to Orange County.  Hopefully your Royals make it back to the World Series again next year.  Thank  you for your business and we hope you stay with us again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary Heading: A bit dated but fine for the price
Summary: When you walk in you think you've gone back in time to the 80s. However, the room was clean and comfortable and totally fine for a one night stay on a business trip. I loved the fact I could keep my window open at night instead of running the air. I felt bad for not even using the spacious lounge room at all during my stay!
Manager Response: Dear mark_mb -  Thank you for your review...we are pleased you enjoyed our spacious two room suites on your business trip.  We appreciate your business and hope to serve you again on future trips to Orange County.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Great place to stay, soft pillow, friendly staff, and clean hotel including lobby, room, and meeting facilities. Easy, speedy check in and out. Convenient location. Convenient shuttle to and from the airport, with minimal wait.
Manager Response: Dear Karen N -  Thank you for your review.  We are pleased our staff and hotel services were perfect for your recent business trip to Orange County.  We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary Heading: friendly front desk staff, quiet hotel
Summary: checked into this embassy the night before a flight out from john wayne airport.  Andy at the front desk was very helpful with the room assignment and questions we had.  He even made it a point to find us and apologize for some rude young foreign students who were way to pushy while we checked in. Nice rooms and a beautiful and spacious lobby area.
Manager Response: Dear john b -  We appreciate your review of your stay with us.  I am pleased to hear you enjoyed the hotel and especially the service provided by Andy...we will share your thank you with him.  Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to serving you again.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Beautiful lobby with waterfalls, jungles, koi fish, and nice wine reception in the evenings (free), plus delicious made-to-order omelets for breakfast (free).  Super helpful, patient, sweet staff.  Very convenient for travelers flying in/out of John Wayne Airport in Orange County.  Huge suites with 2 TVs, 2 rooms, fridge, 2 desks, large armoire and dresser, granite countertops, comfy beds, quiet surroundings.  Lots of parking, easy access to freeways, Enterprise rent-a-car onsite (cheaper than airport Enterprise because of lower taxes).  My only suggestion is to bring your own coffee creamer and keep it in the fridge.  Other than that, it was a perfect stay.
Manager Response: Dear LivPH -   Thank you for your TripAdvisor review.  Our entire team is happy to hear you enjoyed the service of our staff and the hotel during your stay with us.  We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: breakfast, dinner, lunch - generall all food is junk, processed, nothing organic or fresh! please avoid this hotel if you're planning to eat something healthy. room is a bit noisy. decor is antique (70's)
Manager Response: Dear Gaspar L -  We appreciate your sharing your comments from your stay with us.  We are sorry to hear you did not enjoy our breakfast or restaurant.  I have shared your feedback with our team for their follow up.  Thank you for your business and we hope you will stay with us again in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: We enjoyed our stay and the complimentary breakfast was wonderful!  The bed was very comfortable and the pillows were a real treat, I want some! Parking was convenient which is a must in that area.  It was a close hop to Disneyland and surrounded by great shopping.
Manager Response: Dear Charles N -  Thank you for your review...it sounds like you got to enjoy the Orange County area during your stay.  Myself and our team are happy you enjoyed the room and amenities of our hotel and we look forward to serving you in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: I enjoyed my stay, but not enough tables during breakfast time.  Nice breakfast, but we ate in the room.  Ask for more soaps, shampoos, etc.  not enough is left in the room.  Other than that my family enjoyed our stay!!!
Manager Response: Dear Michael H -  We thank you for your review of your stay here.  Our team is happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and we have noted your feedback on breakfast and guestroom supplies.  We appreciate your business and we look forward to serving you again.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: I have been to Embassy many times before for business in other parts of the country.  This property was nice and within the realm of what I expected.  The drapery, bed linens and towels were all nice quality and clean.  The staff was friendly and professional.  The ladies and gentlemen who work at the front desk are the stars of the show.  I spoke to at least 5 different front staff (different days and times of day) and every single one was courteous, fulfilled the request that was made and had a smile and something nice to say as they did it.  They welcomed us back each evening and asked about our day.  My only complaint was that there were some ants in the sleeper sofa when we checked in.  The sheets and the cushions were clean but there were probably some crumbs caught in the
Manager Response: Dear lilnap -  We appreciate your reviewing your stay with us.  I am happy to hear you enjoyed the service of the staff and the atrium area.  I apologize for there being ants in your initial room, but pleased our team got you relocated.  Thank you for staying with us and hope you return on your next visit to Orange County.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: The Embassy Suites is unique in the fact that it has an atrium in the middle.This one had a great little stream with turtles and gold fish swimming around. Kids love this and the little paths made it fun for them. I was able to eat my breakfast right by the stream and it was a nice experience.  The beds were very comfortable and it had a large balcony off the back. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Randall Z -   We thank you for your review on TripAdvisor.  I am pleased you enjoyed the ambiance of the atrium area and our comfortable beds.  We appreciate your business and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: We were in charge of our class reunion and had a great experience with this hotel. We chose this venue because of the location, friendliness of staff and overall appearance. The Event staff (Jean) are AMAZING! They went beyond our expectations. We ordered the three entree buffet and the food was WONDERFUL. Thank you to all the staff that made this a great party!
Manager Response: Dear Norm B -  Thank you for your review and we enjoyed hosting your reunion.  We are all pleased to hear you had a great time and enjoyed the service of our hotel team.  We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you in the future.  Kindest regards, Tom Pugh

Summary: Ok so our stay started by walking into a dimly lit king suite. Spacious room but very dated when I went to lay my daughter for a nap I smelled something foul.... Like rotten fish (you know what I mean) we figured put it was coming from the bed. The sheets had not been changed from the previous guest. YUCK!! They upgraded us and were very nice about the entire situation. I will not be staying here again the level of cleanliness is far below average and we stay at nicer hotels for less $$ in Denver all the time. I'm so disappointed and just generally feel gross staying here the house keepers need to be fired ASAP as I see this is the biggest complaint.
